席卷细软，逃之夭夭
xíjuǎn xìruǎn，táozhīyāoyāo
make off with all the valuables one can lay hands on
那个会计卷逃没几天就被抓获了。
After the tornado there were several loose pet birds flying around the forest.
Lóngjuǎnfēng zhīhòu，jǐ zhī táopǎo de chǒngwùniǎo zài shùlín zhōuwéi fēixíng。
龙卷风之后，几只逃跑的宠物鸟在树林周围飞行。
They mayor may have bolted with taxpayer\'s money.
Shìzhǎng kěnéng juǎn zhe nàshuìrén de qián táopǎo le。
市长可能卷着纳税人的钱逃跑了。
卷入漩涡
juǎnrù xuánwō
be drawn into a whirlpool
卷入一场纠纷
juǎnrù yìcháng jiūfēn
be involved in a dispute
因为卷入贿赂案，他愤而引咎辞职。
Yīnwéi juǎnrù huìlùàn，tā fènér yǐnjiù cízhí。
Because he was involved in the bribery, he acknowledged his mistake and resigned.
他一来，立脚点就错了，深深卷入了派系之争。
卷入水中
莫名其妙地卷入一场诉讼。
Three big shopping retail companies have been involved in a price war.
三大零售公司卷入了一场价格战。
I was involved in a car accident on this freeway last week.
上周就在这个高速公路上，我被卷入到一起交通事故中。
That company seems to have been involved in some rather dishonest carrying-on last year.
去年，那家公司似乎被卷入到一场不道德的交易中。
A prosecutor was caught up in Justice Department scandal.
一名检察官卷入了司法部丑闻。
A famous artist got caught up in nightclub shooting.
一名著名艺术家被卷入了夜总会枪击事件。
The rivers of blood still run deep in many poor countries involved in civil war.
在很多卷入内战的贫穷国家，血流成河仍是屡见不鲜。
to be caught up in sth
被卷入某事
to be {or} get mixed up in sth
被卷入某事
Several executives are involved in the scandal.
数名高级官员卷入丑闻。
He was tangled into this situation by his debts.
Tā yīnwèi zhàiwù ér juǎnrùle zhè jiàn shìqing。
他因为债务而卷入了这件事情。
The members were involved in a tilt.
Chéngyuánmen juǎnrùle fēnzhēng。
成员们卷入了纷争。

juǎnqǐ xiùzi

我们不能只关心孩子智力因素的训练，而忽略了非智力因素的培养。
Wǒmen bùnéng zhǐ guānxīn háizi zhìlì yīnsù de xùnliàn，ér hūlüè le fēizhìlì yīnsù de péiyǎng。
We should concern ourselves with the intellectual factors as well as the non-intellectual ones of our children.
奥运会前的最后一次封闭式训练，我国乒乓球队状态良好。
Àoyùnhuì qián de zuìhòu yícì fēngbìshì xùnliàn，wǒguó pīngpāngqiúduì zhuàngtài liánghǎo。
The players of the national table tennis team performed well in the last closed training before the Olympics.
不论走在哪里，你都要牢记父训。
Bùlùn zǒuzài nǎlǐ，nǐ dōuyào láojì fùxùn。
Keep what your father told you firmly in mind wherever you go.
从书中学到的很多古训，至今都在指导着我的人生。
Cóng shū zhōng xuédào de hěnduō gǔxùn，zhìjīn dōu zài zhǐdǎo zhe wǒ de rénshēng。
Many of the old maxims that I learned from books have been guiding my life up to now.
虚假招聘惯常的伎俩是先收费后培训，最后毫无音讯。
Xūjiǎ zhāopìn guàncháng de jìliǎng shì xiān shōufèi hòu péixùn，zuìhòu háowú yīnxùn。
A common trick of fake employment is to charge first, offer training and then disappear completely.
弟弟刚军训回来，黑瘦黑瘦的。
Dìdi gāng jūnxùn huílái，hēishòu hēishòu de。
Back from military training, my brother is black and slim.
他偷了家里的钱，被父亲狠狠的教训了一顿。
Tā tōu le jiā lǐ de qián，bèi fùqīn hěnhěn de jiàoxùn le yídùn。
He stole money from home, and was chided seriously by his father.
我们解释两个事情时，应避免互训。
Wǒmen jiěshì liǎnggè shìqing shí，yīng bìmiǎn hùxùn。
When we explain two things, we should avoid circular reference.
“你就是个混球儿！”那个小男孩的妈妈大声训斥他。
“Nǐ jiùshì gè húnqiúr！”nàge xiǎonánhái de māma dàshēng xùnchì tā。
&quot;You are a little shit!&quot; The mother yelled at her little boy.
这次训练，教练把三个班混编在一起了。
Zhècì xùnliàn，jiàoliàn bǎ sāngè bān hùnbiān zài yìqǐ le。
The coach mixed the three classes for this exercise.
这位智者的训诫使我豁然开朗，明白了很多道理
Zhèwèi zhìzhě de xùnjiè shǐ wǒ huōrán kāilǎng，míngbai le hěnduō dàolǐ
The sage\'s sermon suddenly cleared my view and made me understand many theories.
王先生在家中发现了一本《王氏家训集解》。
Wáng xiānshēng zài jiā zhōng fāxiàn le yì běn《Wángshìjiāxùnjíjiě》。
Mr. Wang discovered a copy of Collection of Wang\'s Instructions at home.
他为了参加比赛一直加大训练强度。
Tā wèi le cānjiā bǐsài yìzhí jiādà xùnliàn qiángdù。
He has been increasing the intensity of his training for the match.
儿子在离开家时父亲再三叮咛他不要忘记家训。
Érzi zài líkāi jiā shí fùqīn zàisān dīngníng tā búyào wàngjì jiāxùn。
Before his son left, the father warned him again and again that he should never forget the family motto.
教官正在校场训练新招收的士兵。
Jiàoguān zhèngzài xiàochǎng xùnliàn xīn zhāoshōu de shìbīng。
The drillmaster is training the new soldiers at the drill ground.
新的一期培训班，将于下个学期开班。
Xīn de yì qī péixùnbān，jiāngyú xià gè xuéqī kāibān。
A new training course will begin next semester.
在军训期间，我们每天都要进行5公里的拉练。
Zài jūnxùn qījiān，wǒmen měitiān dōuyào jìnxíng wǔgōnglǐ de lāliàn。
During military training, we should have a 5km hike and field training every day.
每年我院都要对领导班子进行培训。
Měinián wǒ yuàn dōuyào duì lǐngdǎo bānzi jìnxíng péixùn。
The leadership groups are trained in our college every year.
我要参加明天的培训班，学习新路规。
Wǒ yào cānjiā míngtiān de péixùnbān，xuéxí xīn lùguī。
I’ll attend the training class tomorrow to learn new railway rules and regulations.
魔术师的各种神奇技艺都是艰苦训练出来的。
Móshùshī de gèzhǒng shénqí jìyì dōushì jiānkǔ xùnliàn chūlái de。
All magic skills of magicians are learned through hard training.
训练场上那个大爬梯太高了，很难爬。
Xùnliànchǎng shàng nàge dà pátī tài gāo le，hěnnán pá。
The great staircase in the training ground is too high to climb over.
军训时，教官让我们把床整平正后出门站队。
Jūnxùn shí，jiàoguān ràng wǒmen bǎ chuáng zhěngpíng zhènghòu chūmén zhànduì。
During military training, the drill master asked us to fold the quilts neatly before going out and standing in line.
经过刻苦训练，他的球技已经日臻纯熟了。
Jīngguò kèkǔ xùnliàn，tā de qiújì yǐjing rìzhēn chúnshú le。
Due to his hard practice, his ball skills are improving day by day.
经过多年训练，他的表演日益入彀。
Jīngguò duōnián xùnliàn，tā de biǎoyǎn rìyì rùgòu。
After years of training, his performance increasingly conforms to normal standards.
全家人都来到大门外，准备跪接圣训。
Quánjiā rén dōu láidào dàmén wài，zhǔnbèi guìjiē shèngxùn。
All the family came to the gates, ready to receive the emperor\'s order on bended knees.
中国古代读书人都以圣训作为自己的行为准则。
Zhōngguó gǔdài dúshūrén dōu yǐ shèngxùn zuòwéi zìjǐ de xíngwéi zhǔnzé。
Scholars in ancient China all took sages\' sermons as their norm of behavior.
这本书介绍了很多伊斯兰教的圣训。
Zhèběnshū jièshào le hěnduō yīsīlánjiào de shèngxùn。
This book introduces many Islamic commandments.
我思前想后还是决定参加这个培训。
Wǒ sīqián xiǎnghòu háishì juédìng cānjiā zhège péixùn。
After much consideration, I decided to attend this training.
父亲给予我的庭训，几十年后我记忆犹新。
Fùqīn jǐyǔ wǒ de tíngxùn，jǐ shí nián hòu wǒ jìyì yóuxīn。
The earnest teachings my father once gave me linger on in my mind scores of years later.
解放军战士挺拔的动作是刻苦训练的结果。
Jiěfàngjūn zhànshì tǐngbá de dòngzuò shì kèkǔ xùnliàn de jiéguǒ。
The soldiers look vigorous and forceful partly because of the long-term hard training.
丽丽心情兀臬地注视着父亲，等待着父亲的训斥。
Lìlì xīnqíng wūniè de zhùshì zhe fùqīn，děngdài zhe fùqīn de xùnchì。
Lily looks at her father restlessly, waiting to be approached.
日语里有训读的词语。
Rìyǔ lǐ yǒu xùndú de cíyǔ。
Some characters in Japanese are the same in Chinese, only with a different pronunciation.
老师的谆谆训诲我永远不会忘记。
Lǎoshī de zhūnzhūn xùnhuì wǒ yǒngyuǎn búhuì wàngjì。
I will always keep the teachers\' instruction in my mind.
他昨天被训诫了一通，所以心情不大好。
Tā zuótiān bèi xùnjiè le yítòng，suǒyǐ xīnqíng búdà hǎo。
He feels upset because he was reprimanded yesterday.
训令下来了，他们很紧张。
Xùnlìng xiàlái le，tāmen hěn jǐnzhāng。
They are anxious because the written instruction from superiors have come.
请领导训示，我们一定改正。
Qǐng lǐngdǎo xùnshì，wǒmen yídìng gǎizhèng。
Sir, please give us some instructions and we will correct our behaviour accordingly.
我们的训条是只选对的不选贵的。
Wǒmen de xùntiáo shì zhǐ xuǎn duì de bùxuǎn guì de。
Our belief is to choose the right one rather than the expensive one.
训育下一代要讲究方法，不能过分溺爱。
Xùnyù xiàyídài yào jiǎngjiū fāngfǎ，bùnéng guòfèn nìài。
One should pay attention to the ways of morally educating the next generation and should not spoil them.
训育主任也不能乱打人啊。
Xùnyù zhǔrèn yě bùnéng luàndǎ rén a。
Even a moral educator should not beat others without reason.
学校的训谕我们一直铭记在心 ，受益不浅。
Xuéxiào de xùnyù wǒmen yìzhí míngjì zài xīn，shòuyì bùqiǎn。
We have stored in our mind and learned a lot from the school instruction.
老师的训喻我们记了一辈子。
Lǎoshī de xùnyù wǒmen jì le yíbèizi。
We have held the teacher\'s instruction in mind all our lives.
事情到今天，你再训责他也没有用了。
Shìqíng dào jīntiān，nǐ zài xùnzé tā yě méiyǒu yòng le。
What\'s done is done. Further reprimanding him will not fix anything.
英勇的人民之师训练有素，所向披靡。
Yīngyǒng de rénmín zhī shī xùnliàn yǒusù，suǒ xiàng pīmí。
The brave army of the people is well trained and has had uninterrupted success.
所有宇航员都必须经过严格的体能训练。
Suǒyǒu yǔhángyuán dōu bìxū jīngguò yángé de tǐnéng xùnliàn。
All astronauts must go through strict physical training.
妈妈看到他的站相不好，于是每天训练他的站姿。
Māma kàndào tā de zhàn xiàng bùhǎo，yúshì měitiān xùnliàn tā de zhànzī。
His mother thinks he has bad posture, so she gives him posture training ever day.
在成为正式员工之前，你们要进行相应的职业培训。
Zài chéngwéi zhèngshì yuángōng zhīqián，nǐmen yào jìnxíng xiāngyìng de zhíyè péixùn。
Before becoming part of the official staff, you have to take relevant vocational training.
主教练虽然在训练时对我们很严厉，但私下里却是个慈祥的老人。
Zhǔjiàoliàn suīrán zài xùnliàn shí duì wǒmen hěn yánlì，dàn sīxià lǐ què shì gè cíxiáng de lǎorén。
Though the coach is very strict with us during training, he is an amiable old man in private.
要想成位一名合格的模特，走台的训练是必不可少的。
Yàoxiǎng chéngwéi yìmíng hégé de mótè，zǒutái de xùnliàn shì bìbùkěshǎo de。
Training for the way to walk and stand onstage is indispensable for being a qualified model.
只要总结好经验教训，败亡之后还可重生。
Zhǐyào zǒngjié hǎo jīngyàn jiàoxùn，bàiwáng zhīhòu hái kě chóngshēng。
As long as you learn from your failures, you always have the chance to succeed.
他们顶着烈日在训练。
Tāmen dǐngzhe lièrì zài xùnliàn。
They do their training facing the sun.
我从这件事中吸取了教训。
Wǒ cóng zhèjiàn shì zhōng xīqǔle jiàoxùn.
I drew lessons from this.
年轻人犯点错误是难免的，关键要从中吸取教训。
Niánqīngrén fàn diǎn cuòwù shì nánmiǎn de，guānjiàn yào cóngzhōng xīqǔjiàoxùn.
It\'s unavoidable that young people will make mistakes. The important thing is that they learn from them.
新教师需要培训。
Xīn jiàoshī xūyào péixùn.
New teachers need training.

We offer eight languages over four years of study, from absolute beginners to advanced learners.
Wǒmen zài sìnián xuéxí qījiān nèi tígōng cóng wánquán chūxuézhě péixùn dào gāojí xuéyuán péixùn de bāzhǒng yǔyán péixùn。
我们在四年学习期间内提供从完全初学者培训到高级学员培训的八种语言培训。
I need to lecture my son about his low grades.
我儿子学习很差，得教训教训他了。
Furthermore, new teachers were not being trained fast enough to replace the trained teachers who were leaving the profession.
Cǐwài，xīn rù zhí de jiàoshī yóuyú méiyǒu jíshí jiēshòu péixùn，hái bùnéng qǔdài nàxiē shòu guò péixùn zhǔnbèi lígǎng de jiàoshī。
此外，新入职的教师由于没有及时接受培训，还不能取代那些受过培训准备离岗的教师。
We believe that it will improve the range of education and training opportunities, especially in vocational areas.
Wǒmen xiāngxìn tā néng zuìdà xiàndù de tígāo jiàoyù hé péixùn de jīhuì，yóuqíshì zhíyè péixùn lǐngyù。
我们相信它能最大限度的提高教育和培训的机会，尤其是职业培训领域。
Outdoor education is the area of teacher training concerned with training for outdoor activities.
Hùwài jiàoyù shì zhǐ shèjí hùwài huódòng péixùn de jiàoshī péixùn lǐngyù。
户外教育是指涉及户外活动培训的教师培训领域。

Zhè bǐ yùsuàn wèi jiēshòu péixùnzhě tígōng zhíyè jìnxiū péixùn。
这笔预算为接受培训者提供职业进修培训。

to train nurses at a hospital
在医院培训护士
Athletes train to be in condition
运动员训练以保持良好的竞技状态。
Medical experts will train health care workers to identify and treat patients with the disease.
医学专家们将训练医护人员，让他们能够够辨别这种疾病，并对患者进行治疗。
Your time is up, it\'s someone else\'s turn on the training equipment now.
你的时间到了，现在轮到别人使用训练设备了。
Jenny\'s dog is so funny, he has been trained to sit up and beg.
詹妮的狗太有趣儿了，经过训练，他能坐在地上抬起前脚做乞求的姿势了。
He stopped his ears from listening to his father\'s lecture.
他堵住了自己的耳朵，不听父亲的教训。
We offer personal trainer that is charged per hour.
我们提供私人培训，按小时收费。
She is training for the annual race.
她在为每年一次的田径比赛做训练。
The company offers a week-long training for new staff on how to use the computers.
公司为新员工提供为期一周的电脑知识培训。
The policeman had to spend one month in training before being allowed to rejoin his unit.
这名警察在重返警队前需要接受一个月的培训。
It\'s too sad that he learned the lesson until the accident.
直到事故发生之后他才得到了教训，真是太遗憾了。
My mom grounded me, because of my bad grades.
我考砸了，被妈妈教训了。
She is training from eight in the morning until noon.
她从早上八点一直训练到中午才结束。
I\'ll be away on a training course next week.
下周我会去参加一门培训课程。
His face was red when his mother pulled him up.
妈妈训斥他的时候，他脸都红了。
Don\'t blame yourself, just put it down as an experience.
别自责了，权把它当作一次经验教训吧。
He is training really hard for the next competition.
他正在为下场比赛非常刻苦地训练。
Stop carpeting him, he already realized that he made a big mistake.
不要再训斥他了，他已经意识到犯了个大错误了。
The soldiers had to practice their drill formations daily.
士兵每天都进行队列训练。
The mother took her son to task for his low marks.
母亲训斥儿子，因为他考试拿了低分。
The pediatric registered nurses have advanced training in the care of acutely ill children.
在职的儿科护士都受过高级培训，可以护理好重症儿童。
Not all companies have had to cut back on training.
不是所有公司都得削减培训费用。
Neither of them danced as children, but they caught the dancing bug while training to become teachers.

吸取教训，避免重犯错误
xīqǔ jiàoxùn，bìmiǎn chóngfàn cuòwù
draw a lesson from past errors so as to prevent their recurrence
吸取教训
xīqǔ jiàoxùn 
draw a lesson (or moral) from sth.; take warning from sth.
做人要吃一堑长一智，善于吸取教训。
Zuò rén yào chī yíqiàn zhǎng yízhì，shànyú xīqǔ jiàoxùn。
One should be good at learning from their experiences: a fall into the pit, can contribute to a gain in your wit.
年轻人犯点错误是难免的，关键要从中吸取教训。
Niánqīngrén fàn diǎn cuòwù shì nánmiǎn de，guānjiàn yào cóngzhōng xīqǔjiàoxùn.
It\'s unavoidable that young people will make mistakes. The important thing is that they learn from them.
吸取教训
xīqǔ jiàoxùn 
draw a lesson
我从这件事中吸取了教训。
Wǒ cóng zhèjiàn shì zhōng xīqǔle jiàoxùn.
I drew lessons from this.
小伙子别打蔫儿，吸取教训接着干。
跌跤不怕，重要的是要能吸取教训。
从挫败中吸取教训
从失败中吸取教训。
吸取前人的经验教训就可以少交点学费。
to learn from one\'s mistakes
从错误中吸取教训
This terrible experience has left us sadder but wiser.
Zhè chǎng kěpà de jīnglì ràng wǒmen cóngzhōng xīqǔle jiàoxùn。

从表面上看，许多教训并不是每个人都吸取了。

cǎntòng de jiàoxùn 
a bitter lesson

draw a lesson from past errors so as to prevent their recurrence
反面的教训
fǎnmiàn de jiàoxùn
a lesson learnt from negative (or bitter) experience; wisdom won from hard knocks
用鲜血换来的教训
yòngxiānxuè huànlái de jiàoxùn 
a lesson paid for in blood
记取这个血的教训
jìqǔ zhège xuè de jiàoxùn
bear firmly in mind this lesson learned at the cost of blood
血的教训
xuè de jiàoxùn 
a lesson paid for with blood; lesson written in blood
吸取教训
xīqǔ jiàoxùn

他教训了儿子一顿。
Tā jiàoxùn le érzi yídùn。
He gave his son a lecture.

xiě līnlīn de jiàoxùn
a bitter lesson

yánkù de jiàoxùn
a bitter lesson
我一时一刻也不能忘记这个教训。

I shall never forget this lesson.

He stole money from home, and was chided seriously by his father.
只要总结好经验教训，败亡之后还可重生。

As long as you learn from your failures, you always have the chance to succeed.

to teach sb a lesson
[fig] 给某人一个教训
No lesson seems to have been learnt from this tragedy.
Rénmen sìhū méiyǒu cóng zhè chǎng zāinàn zhōng jíqǔjiàoxùn。

这些令人恐惧的事件结束之后，有许多教训值得汲取。
Seemingly many lessons are simply not learned by everyone.
Cóng biǎomiàn shàng kàn，xǔduō jiàoxùn bìng búshì měi gè rén dōu xīqǔ le。
从表面上看，许多教训并不是每个人都吸取了。
Mr. Smith lectured the student for being late.
Shǐmìsī xiānsheng jiàoxùn le chídào de xuésheng。
史密斯先生教训了迟到的学生。
This terrible experience has left us sadder but wiser.
Zhè chǎng kěpà de jīnglì ràng wǒmen cóngzhōng xīqǔle jiàoxùn。
这场可怕的经历让我们从中吸取了教训。

顺应世界之潮流
shùnyìng shìjiè zhī cháoliú 
adapt oneself to (or go along with) world trends
顺应历史发展的潮流
shùnyìng lìshǐ fāzhǎn de cháoliú
conform to the historical trend of the times; go with the tide of historical development
随顺潮流
认清时务，顺应潮流。
He was able to make it because he swam with the tide.
正因为顺应潮流，他才获得了成功。
A leeward tide is dangerous for small boats.
Shùnfēngcháo duì xiǎo chuán láishuō shì wēixiǎn de。
顺风潮对小船来说是危险的。
I want to be in the swim with modern fashion.

我想顺应当今时尚潮流。

柜子受潮走形了。

地区经济融合成为世界上不可阻挡的潮流。

追逐潮流的年轻消费者不再一味追求首饰的昂贵材质。
Experimentation and the latest fashion held no appeal for him.
Xīn de chángshì hé cháoliú duì tā méiyǒu xīyǐnlì。
新的尝试和潮流对他没有吸引力。
The latest crop of handbags are setting new trends this fall.
Zuì xīn yì pī shǒutíbāo zhèngzài yǐnlǐng jīnqiū de cháoliú。
最新一批手提包正在引领今秋的潮流。
Now glitzy novels are out of vogue, people are writing more about real issues.
Wéiměi xiǎoshuō xiànzài yǐjīng búshì cháoliú，rénmen gèng xǐhuan xiěxiě xiànshíwèntí。
唯美小说现在已经不是潮流，人们更喜欢写写现实问题。
He, as a designer, never goes with the tide.
Zuòwéi yì míng shèjìzhě，tā cóngbù gēnsuí cháoliú。
作为一名设计者，他从不跟随潮流。
I want to be in the swim with modern fashion.
Wǒ xiǎng shùnyìng dāngjīn shíshàng cháoliú。
我想顺应当今时尚潮流。
That actress can set the trend with anything she wears.
Nà wèi nǚyǎnyuán chuān shénme yīfu dōu kěyǐ yǐnlǐng cháoliú。
那位女演员穿什么衣服都可以引领潮流。
He\'s swimming with the tide.
Tā jǐngēn cháoliú。
他紧跟潮流。
The urban renaissance was swimming with the tide of a new economic trend.
Chéngshì de wényì fùxīng bànsuízhe yì gǔ jīngjì qūshì de xīn cháoliú。
城市的文艺复兴伴随着一股经济趋势的新潮流。
Dave is in the swim and knows all of the latest gossip.
Dàifū shì gè gǎn de shàng cháoliú de rén，tā liǎojiě suǒyǒu zuì xīn de bāguà xiāoxi。
戴夫是个赶得上潮流的人，他了解所有最新的八卦消息。
The currents well up.
Cháoliú xiōngyǒng。
潮流汹涌。
He followed current trends.
Tā jǐngēn dāngqián cháoliú。
他紧跟当前潮流。
In periods of high merger activity there is a bandwagon effect with more and more firms seeking to engage in takeover activity.
Cháoliú xiàoyìng huì zài dàliàng hébìng de jiēduàn chūxiàn，yuèláiyuè duō de gōngsī xīwàng jiārù dào jiēguǎn huódòng zhōng。
潮流效应会在大量合并的阶段出现，越来越多的公司希望加入到接管活动中。
They rode the same wave of popular patriotism.
Tāmen yě jiārùle nàgǔ àiguózhǔyì de cháoliú。
他们也加入了那股爱国主义的潮流。
The eager is a tidal phenomenon of rivers.
河水上涨是一种河流的潮汐现象。
Soon the water will become slack, and the tide will turn.
Hěnkuài shuǐliú jiù zhìhuǎn le，cháoxī jiùyào biàn le。
很快水流就滞缓了，潮汐就要变了。
影片在高潮处突然定格，使观众迷惑不解。
Yǐngpiàn zài gāocháo chù tūrán dìnggé，shǐ guānzhòng míhuòbùjiě。
A freeze shot appeared at the climax, which puzzled the audience.
潮湿地区的花岗岩，水分已深深浸入内部，随时会崩解。
Cháoshī dìqū de huāgāngyán，shuǐfèn yǐ shēnshēn jìnrù nèibù，suíshí huì bēngjiě。
The granite from damp regions breaks apart easily as moisture goes  deep inside it.
把氯化钙放在干燥的地方，防止潮解
The fungi eventually deliquesced.
Zhēnjūn zuìzhōng huì cháojiě。
真菌最终会潮解。
This type of salt deliquesces easily.
Zhè lèi yán yìyú cháojiě。
这类盐易于潮解。
Dave is in the swim and knows all of the latest gossip.
Dàifū shì gè gǎn de shàng cháoliú de rén，tā liǎojiě suǒyǒu zuì xīn de bāguà xiāoxi。
戴夫是个赶得上潮流的人，他了解所有最新的八卦消息。
The flood of questions left her bewildered and confused.
Cháoshuǐ bān de wèntí shǐ tā kùnhuòbùjiě。
潮水般的问题使她困惑不解。
他的后背上有一大片潮红。
Tā de hòubèi shàng yǒu yí dàpiàn cháohóng。
There are a vast stretch of flush on his back.
她羞得脸上一片潮红。
Tā xiū de liǎnshàng yípiàn cháohóng。
Her face turned red with embarrassment.
人家一夸，她脸上就泛起红潮。
Rénjiā yì kuā，tā liǎn shàngjiù fàn qǐ hóngcháo。
She blushes when praised.
连日发烧，脸色潮红。
羞的两颊潮红，低下了头。
欢乐的人群潮水般地涌向天安门广场。
Huānlè de rénqún cháoshuǐbān de yǒng xiàng Tiān\'ānmén Guǎngchǎng。
Crowds of joyous people streamed into Tian\'anmen Square from all directions.
潮剧主要流行于潮州汕头一带。
Cháojù zhǔyào liúxíng yú Cháozhōu Shàntóu yídài。
Chaozhou opera is popular mainly in the areas around Chaozhou and Shantou.
潮绣是生产于广东潮州地区的工艺品。
Cháoxiù shì shēngchǎn yú Guǎngdōng Cháozhōu dìqū de gōngyìpǐn。
Chaozhou embroidery is a craftwork produced in Chaozhou, Guangdong Province.
股票的价格随着市场潮涨潮落。
Gǔpiào de jiàgé suí zhe shìchǎng cháozhǎng cháoluò。
The price of stock moves up and down with the market.
不可逆转的历史潮流
bùkě nìzhuǎn de lìshǐ cháoliú
an irreversible trend of history
早潮
zǎocháo 
morning tide
花如海，歌如潮。
Huā rú hǎi, gē rú cháo。 
A sea of flowers; a tidal wave of songs.
火柴潮了。
Huǒchái cháo le。
The matches have got damp.
这屋子太潮。
Zhè wūzi tài cháo。
The room is too damp.
下了七八天雨，屋子里什么都是潮呼呼的。
Xià le qībā tiān yǔ，wūzi lǐ shénme dōushì cháohūhu de。
After a week\'s rain, everything in the house became damp and clammy.
历史潮流
lìshǐ cháoliú 
historical trend
顺应世界之潮流
shùnyìng shìjiè zhī cháoliú 
adapt oneself to (or go along with) world trends
仓库里潮气太大，粮食就容易发霉。
Cāngkù lǐ cháoqì tài dà，liángshi jiù róngyì fāméi。
The grain is liable to mildew when the humidity in the barn is too high.
这间屋子太潮湿，不适宜住人。
Zhè jiān wūzi tài cháoshī，bú shìyí zhù rén。
This room is too damp to live in.
潮水上涨了。
Cháoshuǐ shàngzhǎng le。
The tide is coming in.
欢乐的人群潮水般地涌向天安门广场。
Huānlè de rénqún cháoshuǐbān de yǒng xiàng Tiān\'ānmén Guǎngchǎng。
Crowds of joyous people streamed into Tian\'anmen Square from all directions.
心事如潮涌
xīnshì rú cháoyǒng 
one\'s mind seething with all kinds of thoughts
达到高潮
dádào gāocháo 
reach a high tide; come to a climax
迎接技术革新高潮的到来
yíngjiē jìshù géxīn gāocháo de dàolái 
hail the arrival of a high tide of technical innovation
处于低潮
chǔyú dīcháo 
be at a low tide; be at a low ebb
低潮线
dīcháoxiàn 
low water mark
衣服有点儿发潮。
Yīfu yǒudiǎnr fā cháo。
The clothes feel a bit damp.
反潮流而动
fǎn cháoliú ér dòng
act against the prevailing mood (or current)
雨季里东西容易返潮。
Yǔjì lǐ dōngxi róngyì fǎncháo。
Things get damp easily in the rainy season.
防潮纸
fángcháozhǐ
moistureproof paper; tarred paper
防潮砖
fángcháozhuān
moistureproof brick
防潮堰堤
fángcháo yàndī
tidal barrage
闹风潮
nào fēngcháo
agitate (for a strike, etc.)
高潮线
gāocháoxiàn
high-water mark (or line)
全剧的高潮
quán jù de gāocháo
the climax of the play
闹工潮
nào gōngcháo
go on strike
与时代潮流合拍
yǔ shídài cháoliú hépāi
in step with the trend of the times
人家一夸，她脸上就泛起红潮。
Rénjiā yì kuā，tā liǎn shàngjiù fàn qǐ hóngcháo。
She blushes when praised.
思想回潮
sīxiǎnghuícháo 
an ideological relapse (or retrogression)
农村迷信活动有所回潮。
Nóngcūn míxìn huódòngyǒu suǒ huícháo。
There is a revival of superstitious practices in the countryside.
知道这消息以后，她心潮激荡。
Zhīdào zhè xiāoxi yǐhòu，tā xīncháo jīdàng。
When she heard the news, her heart leapt.
极“左”思潮
jí“zuǒ”sīcháo 
ultra-&quot;Left&quot; trend of thought
运动已进入高潮。
Yùndònɡ yǐ jìnrù ɡāocháo。
The movement has reached a high tide.
革命的狂潮
gémìng de kuángcháo
turbulent revolutionary movement; unrestrained spread of the revolution
革命的浪潮
gémìng de làngcháo
the tide of revolution
罢工浪潮
bàgōnglàngcháo
a wave of strikes
潮水落了。
Cháoshuǐ luò le。
The tide is low (or out).
逆时代潮流而动
nì shídài cháoliú ér dòng
go against the trend of the times
革命怒潮汹涌澎湃。
Gémìngnùcháo xiōngyǒngpéngpài。
The raging tide of revolution surges forward.
这一段为故事的高潮作了铺垫。
Zhè yíduàn wèi gùshì de gāocháo zuò le pūdiàn。
This passage foreshadows the climax of the story.
心潮起伏
xīncháo qǐfú
one\'s mind being in a tumult
心潮起落
xīncháo qǐluò
one\'s mind being in a tumult
抢购风潮
qiǎnggòu fēngcháo
panic purchasing; panic buying spree
掀起群众性体育锻炼的热潮
xiānqǐ qúnzhòngxìng tǐyù duànliàn de rècháo
unfold a vigorous mass campaign for sports and physical training
全国掀起了如火如荼的改革热潮。
Quánguó xiānqǐ le rúhuǒrútú de gǎigé rècháo。
Reform is catching on like fire throughout the country.
革命的潮流汹涌澎湃，势不可挡。
Gémìng de cháoliú xiōngyǒng péngpài，shìbùkědāng。
The revolution is surging forward irresistibly.
这屋子阴，东西容易受潮。
Zhè wūzi yīn，dōngxi róngyì shòucháo。
The room gets no sun and things easily become damp.
顺应历史发展的潮流
shùnyìng lìshǐ fāzhǎn de cháoliú
conform to the historical trend of the times; go with the tide of historical development
文艺思潮
wényì sīcháo
trends of thought in art and literature
思潮起伏
sīcháo qǐfú
disquieting thoughts surging in one\'s mind
把运动推向高潮
bǎ yùndòng tuīxiàng gāocháo 
push the movement to a climax
潮水退了。
Cháoshuǐ tuì le。
The tide has receded. or The tide is on the ebb.
逆历史潮流而动的人终将被人民所唾弃。
Nì lìshǐ cháoliú ér dòng de rén zhōng jiāngbèi rénmín suǒ tuòqì。
Those who go against the trend of history will be cast aside by the people.
心血来潮，忘乎所以
Xīnxuèláicháo，wànghūsuǒyǐ 
be carried away by a sudden impulse; lose one\'s head in a moment of excitement
这样潮湿的天气我实在不习惯。
Zhèyàngcháoshī de tiānqì wǒ shízai bùxíguàn。
I just can\'t get used to this damp weather.
她心潮翻滚，无法入睡。
Tā xīncháo fāngǔn，wúfǎ rùshuì。
Her mind being in a tumult, she could not go to sleep.
新潮服装
xīncháo fúzhuāng
new fashions
汹涌澎湃的历史潮流
xiōngyǒngpéngpài de lìshǐ cháoliú
a tempestuous historical trend
修正主义思潮
xiūzhèngzhǔyì sīcháo
revisionist trend
月亮对潮汐的影响
yuèliangduì cháoxī de yǐngxiǎng
the influence of the moon on the tides
潮砂造型
cháoshā zàoxínɡ
green sand moulding
潮涨了。
Cháo zhǎng le。

正在涨潮。
Zhèngzài zhǎngcháo。
The tide is at the flood.
潮水的涨落
cháoshuǐ de zhǎngluò

一阵寒潮
yízhèn hán cháo 
a cold spell

bùkě zǔdǎng de lìshǐ cháoliú 
an irresistible historical trend
思潮
sīcháo
trend of thought; ideological trend
潮湿地区的花岗岩，水分已深深浸入内部，随时会崩解。
Cháoshī dìqū de huāgāngyán，shuǐfèn yǐ shēnshēn jìnrù nèibù，suíshí huì bēngjiě。
The granite from damp regions breaks apart easily as moisture goes  deep inside it.
节日的街头总是人群潮动。
Jiérì de jiētóu zǒngshì rénqún cháodòng。
On festivals, people always move forward like waves on the street.
海里的潮锋迅速向岸边靠近，他快速地跑开了。
Hǎilǐ de cháofēng xùnsù xiàng ànbiān kàojìn，tā kuàisù de pǎokāi le。
When high tide came in, he ran away quickly.
这些潮干的衣服最好不要立即放进柜子里。
Zhèxiē cháogān de yīfu zuìhǎo búyào lìjí fàngjìn guìzi lǐ。
These slightly damp clothes shouldn\'t be placed into the cabinet until they are dry.
他的后背上有一大片潮红。
Tā de hòubèi shàng yǒu yí dàpiàn cháohóng。
There are a vast stretch of flush on his back.
她羞得脸上一片潮红。
Tā xiū de liǎnshàng yípiàn cháohóng。
Her face turned red with embarrassment.
连天阴雨，被子也变得潮乎乎的。
Liántiān yīnyǔ，bèizi yě biàn de cháohūhū de。
Several days of cloudy and rainy weather had left the quilt pretty damp.
雨后潮润的空气让人感觉很清新。
Yǔhòu cháorùn de kōngqì ràng rén gǎnjué hěnqīngxīn。
The moist air that follows a rain shower makes one feel refreshed.
登上领奖台的那一刻，他激动得两眼潮润。
Dēngshàng lǐngjiǎngtái de nà yíkè，tā jīdòng de liǎngyǎn cháorùn。
He was so excited that his eyes filled with tears when he stepped up to the platform.
赶上改革开放的潮头，他下海经商了。
Gǎnshàng gǎigé kāifàng de cháotóu，tā xiàhǎi jīngshāng le。
Following the policy of reform and opening, he resigned from his position and became a businessman.
我国已经能够利用潮汐来发电了。
Wǒ guó yǐjing nénggòu lìyòng cháoxī lái fādiàn le。
We are able to generate electricity from tidal energy.
他从小生活在海边，能够准确地判断潮信的到来。
Tā cóng xiǎo shēnghuó zài hǎibiān，nénggòu zhǔnquè de pànduàn cháoxìn de dàolái。
Since he has lived along the ocean since his childhood, he can  accurately predict the tides.
因为潮信，她决定休息一天。
Yīnwéi cháoxìn，tā juédìng xiūxi yì tiān。
Because she having her period, she decided to take a day off.
在很远处，潮汛轰鸣。
Zài hěnyuǎnchù，cháoxùn hōngmíng。
Long distance away, the spring tide is roaring.
又是下班的时间，一路上车潮汹涌。
Yòu shì xiàbān de shíjiān，yílùshàng chēcháo xiōngyǒng。
It\'s off-duty time again, cars are surging forward like waves all the way.
我们要做好陈粮的防潮工作。
Wǒmen yào zuòhǎo chénliáng de fángcháo gōngzuò。
We should protect our previously harvested surplus grain from water damage.
赤潮的出现使海洋生物的生存受到了威胁。
Chìcháo de chūxiàn shǐ hǎiyáng shēngwù de shēngcún shòudào le wēixié。
The appearance of the red tide has brought threat to the halo bios\' existence.
现在社会上出书的热潮一浪高过一浪。
Xiànzài shèhuìshàng chūshū de rècháo yílàng gāoguò yílàng。
There is now an increased upsurge of book-publishing in society.
这个房间太潮湿了，请把除湿器打开。
Zhège fángjiān tài cháoshī le，qǐng bǎ chúshīqì dǎkāi。
The room is too damp, please turn on the dehumidifier.
这里真是春潮涌动，春意盎然。
Zhèlǐ zhēnshì chūncháo yǒngdòng，chūnyì àngrán。
With the spring tide coming, spring is in the air here.
渤海的潮声带来了春讯。
Bóhǎi de cháoshēng dàilái le chūnxùn。
The sound of the Bohai sea tides brings the message that spring has arrived.
90年代初，弃官从商形成一股热潮。
90 niándài chū,qìguān cóngshāng xíngchéng yì gǔ rècháo.
In the early 90s, there was an increase of people resigning from office and entering into business.
影片在高潮处突然定格，使观众迷惑不解。
Yǐngpiàn zài gāocháo chù tūrán dìnggé，shǐ guānzhòng míhuòbùjiě。
A freeze shot appeared at the climax, which puzzled the audience.
仿生建筑已经成为一种新的潮流。
Fǎngshēng jiànzhù yǐjing chéngwéi yìzhǒng xīn de cháoliú。
Bionic architecture has become a new trend.
孩子们趁着赶潮的时候拾贝壳。
Háizimen chèn zhe gǎncháo de shíhou shí bèiké。
The children collect shells when the tide ebbs.
年轻人喜欢赶潮流。
Niánqīngrén xǐhuan gǎn cháoliú.
Young people are keen on following the trend.
每年到钱塘江观潮的人都很多。
Měinián dào Qiántáng Jiāng guāncháo de rén dōu hěnduō。
Lots of people come to Qiantang River every year to see the tides.
他总在旁边观潮，不好好干活。
Tā zǒngzài pángbiān guāncháo，bùhǎohǎo gànhuó。
He is always a spectator and doesn\'t work very hard.
我站在浩浩的江水旁，心潮澎湃。
Wǒ zhànzài hàohào de jiāngshuǐ páng，xīncháopéngpài。
Standing beside the mighty river, I am very thrilled.
他急着出门，只好把很潮的衣服放进了烘干机。
Tā jí zhe chūmén，zhǐhǎo bǎ hěncháo de yīfu fàngjìn le hōnggānjī。
He was anxious to go out, and could only put the wet clothes into the dryer.
他把潮湿的衣服放在烘笼上烤着。
Tā bǎ cháoshī de yīfu fàngzài hōnglóng shàng kǎo zhe。
He left the wet clothes on the warming basket to dry.
中国文学潮流遭遇了急变，白话叙事替代文言咏叹。
Zhōngguó wénxué cháoliú zāoyù le jíbiàn，báihuà xùshì tìdài wényán yǒngtàn。
The trend of Chinese literature experienced a sudden change. Narrating in colloquial language replaced chanting in classical Chinese.
近世以来，科技发展迅猛，科技化浪潮席卷全球。
Jìnshì yǐlái，kējì fāzhǎn xùnměng，kējìhuà làngcháo xíjuǎn quánqiú。
In modern times, science and technology are developing very quickly and influencing the whole world.
今晚他心血来潮，一口气写下了好几首短诗。
Jīnwǎn tā xīnxuè láicháo，yì kǒu qì xiěxià le hǎo jǐ shǒu duǎnshī。
He has been seized by a whim tonight and is writing several short poems at one sitting.
她第一次来潮是在初中一年级。
Tā dìyīcì láicháo shì zài chū zhōng yīniánjí。
She had her first period when she was a first-year student in junior middle school.
为名人立传成了一个时代的潮流。
Wèi míngrén lìzhuàn chéng le yígè shídài de cháoliú。
Writing biographies of famous people has become a trend.
我们要做好防潮工作，预防粮食霉损。
Wǒmen yào zuòhǎo fángcháo gōngzuò，yùfáng liángshí méisǔn。
We should take precautions against the damp, to prevent the grain from going mouldy.
此时的大海表面平静，内里却积蓄着再次涨潮的力量。
Cǐshí de dàhǎi biǎomiàn píngjìng，nèilǐ què jīxù zhe zàicì zhǎngcháo de lìliang。
The sea looks calm on the surface right now, while inside, it accumulates the power for the next rise of the tide.
在潮湿闷热而且没有空调的环境里，人人都是一身黏湿。
Zài cháoshī mènrè érqiě méiyǒu kōngtiáo de huánjìng lǐ，rénrén dōushì yìshēn niánshī。
In the damp and muggy environment without an air-conditioner, everyone feels sticky and wet.
他喜欢在海上弄潮冲浪，他觉得那种感觉很过瘾。
Tā xǐhuan zài hǎi shàng nòngcháo chōnglàng，tā juédé nàzhǒng gǎnjué hěnguòyǐn。
He likes to ride the tides and surf on the sea. The feeling is wonderful for him.
这是一本趋时的杂志，很能引领潮流。
Zhè shì yìběn qūshí de zázhì，hěnnéng yǐnlǐng cháoliú。
It\'s a trendy magazine, which can lead fashion.
侵略者的暴行引发了人民战争的高潮。
Qīnlüèzhě de bàoxíng yǐnfā le rénmín zhànzhēng de gāocháo。
The aggressors\' atrocities aroused a surge in the people\'s war.
势不可挡的时尚风潮对他好像毫无影响，他依然保持着自己朴素的特点。
Shìbùkědǎng de shíshàng fēngcháo duì tā hǎo xiàng háowú yǐngxiǎng，tā yīrán bǎochí zhe zìjǐ pǔsù de tèdiǎn。
Irresistible fashion trends don\'t seem to have any influence on him, he still keeps his simple style.
潮湿的墙角上布满了地毯般的绿色苔藓。
Cháoshī de qiángjiǎo shàng bùmǎn le dìtǎn bān de lǜsè táixiǎn。
There is carpet-like lichen all over the moist corner of the wall.
故事的结局再一次将演出推向高潮。
Gùshì de jiéjú zài yícì jiāng yǎnchū tuī xiàng gāocháo。
The ending of the story pushed the performance to another climax.
人民群众将反抗伪政权的斗争推向了高潮。
Rénmín qúnzhòng jiāng fǎnkàng wěizhèngquán de dòuzhēng tuī xiàng le gāocháo。
The masses have pushed the struggle against the puppet government to a climax.
水面漪澜不平，我也心潮澎湃。
Shuǐmiàn yīlán bùpíng，wǒ yě xīncháo péngpai。
As water ripples and billows, my heart is full of thoughts and emotions too.
只有因应时代的潮流和发展，才能生存下去。
Zhǐyǒu yīnyìng shídài de cháoliú hé fāzhǎn，cáinéng shēngcún xiàqù。
Only by moving with trends and developments can we survive.
社会上兴起了一股研究马克思有机体理论的热潮。
Shèhuìshàng xīngqǐ le yìgǔ yánjiū Mǎkèsī yǒujītǐ lǐlùn de rècháo。
There is a surge of research into Marxist organic theory in society.
微软公司在软件行业称雄有年，好评如潮。
Wēiruǎn gōngsī zài ruǎnjiàn hángyè chēngxióng yǒunián，hǎopíng rúcháo。
The software company has been in the leading position of the software industry for years, gaining lots of favourable comments.
在新时期的经济大潮中，拥有主动权是关键。
Zài xīn shíqī de jīngjì dàcháo zhōng，yōngyǒu zhǔdòngquán shì guānjiàn。
In the economic trend of the new era, having the initiative is the key.
这些货物怕潮，储存的时候别忘了放干燥剂。
Zhèxiē huòwù pà cháo，chǔcún de shíhou bié wàng le fàng gānzàojì。
These goods are susceptible to water, remember to add a desiccant when you store them.
个人主义思潮的盛行会危及集体利益。
Gèrénzhǔyì sīcháo de shèngxíng huì wēijí jítǐ lìyì。
Prevalence of individualism will jeopardize collective interests.
电脑包装箱里有好多用于防震隔潮的泡沫塑料。
Diànnǎo bāozhuāngxiāng lǐ yǒu hǎoduō yòngyú fángzhèn gécháo de pàomò sùliào。
There is a lot of anti-shock waterproof foam in a computer packing box.

gōngcháo

Jùqíng dádào gāocháo。
The plot reached its climax.

平淡无奇的文章
píngdànwúqí de wénzhāng
a pedestrian piece of writing

píngdànwúwèi de tánhuà

平淡无奇的文章
píngdànwúqí de wénzhāng
a pedestrian piece of writing

春分一过，树木的枝杈上就显出淡淡的绿意。
She told me her story with a thin smile.
Tā dàndàn de xiàozhe，wèi wǒ jiǎngshùle tā de gùshi。
她淡淡地笑着，为我讲述了她的故事。
The water was running at normal winter level with just a tinge of color.

然后她可以用铅笔淡淡地标出一条瞄准线。
The wine has a light, dry fruity flavour and delicate bouquet.
Zhèzhǒng jiǔ yǒu yìzhǒng dàndàn de guǒ xiāng hé wēimiào de jiǔ xiāng。
这种酒有一种淡淡的果香和微妙的酒香。

这些花多为淡紫色，紫色和蓝色，与淡柠檬黄的花不同。
Her face was tear-stained, her clothes creased and her pale blonde curls dull with dust.
Tā mǎn liǎn shì lèi，yīfu zhòubābā de，dàn jīnsè de juǎnfā yīn chéntǔ ér àndàn。
她满脸是泪，衣服皱巴巴的，淡金色的卷发因尘土而暗淡。

Tā de yíngjiē fēicháng lěngdàn。
她的迎接非常冷淡。
They shook hands rather listlessly.
Tāmen hěn lěngdàn de wòlewò shǒu。
他们很冷淡地握了握手。
I applied my attention prosaically to my routine.
Wǒ bǎ wǒ de zhùyìlì tóurùdàole píngdàn wúwèi de rìcháng shìwù zhīzhōng。
我把我的注意力投入到了平淡无味的日常事务之中。
The young man spoke so mundanely of university life.
Nàgè niánqīngrén bǎ dàxué shēnghuó jiǎngde rúcǐ píngdàn。
那个年轻人把大学生活讲得如此平淡。
The cook is a light seasoner.
Chúshī tiáo de wèi yǒudiǎn dàn。
厨师调的味有点淡。
They are extremely inhospitable these days.
Zhèxiē tiān lái，tāmen jíqí lěngdàn。
这些天来，他们极其冷淡。
His remarks always vivify an otherwise dull story.
Tā de jiǎnghuà zǒng néng ràng yuánběn píngdànwúqí de gùshi biàn de xǔxǔrúshēng。
他的讲话总能让原本平淡无奇的故事变得栩栩如生。
This action will negate the effect of my efforts.
Zhè zhǒng xíngdòng jiāng huì chōngdàn wǒ de nǔlì dàilái de xiàoguǒ。
这种行动将会冲淡我的努力带来的效果。
The jeweler\'s mind game is to convince lovers that the size of a gemstone reflects the depth of their feelings.
Zhūbǎoshāng xīnlǐ de suànpán shì ràng qínglǚmen xiāngxìn bǎoshí de dàxiǎo fǎnyìngle tāmen gǎnqíng de nóngdàn。
珠宝商心里的算盘是让情侣们相信宝石的大小反映了他们感情的浓淡。
His advisers soft-pedaled the president\'s blunder.
Zǒngtǒng de gùwèn duì zǒngtǒng de cuòwù qīngmiáodànxiě。
总统的顾问对总统的错误轻描淡写。
She behaves apathetically these days.
Tā zhèxiē tiān biǎoxiàn de hěn dànmò。
她这些天表现的很淡漠。
He took it lightly.
Tā duì cǐ dànránchùzhī。
他对此淡然处之。
He ate a bland diet because of his colitis.
Tā huànyǒu dàchángyán，suǒyǐ zhǐchī qīngdàn de shíwù。
他患有大肠炎，所以只吃清淡的食物。
He stoically accepted all suffering.
Tā dànrán de jiēshòule suǒyǒu de kǔnàn。
他淡然地接受了所有的苦难。
The outlook is bleak.
qiánjǐng àndànwúguāng。
前景黯淡无光。
Even that glum forecast may be too optimistic.
jíshǐshì shàngshù àndàn de yùcè kěnéng yě guòyúlèguān。

dilute the solution
冲淡戏剧效果

weaken the dramatic effect

Zuòwéi yìzhǒng dìngliànggōngyìng，tāmen měitiān huòdé yí kuài miànbāo hé yì píng niúnǎi。
作为一种定量供应，他们每天获得一块面包和一瓶牛奶。
Also in the milk was a bay leaf, a few slices of onion and three or four cloves.
Niúnǎi zhōng yě yǒu yí piàn yuèguìshù yè、jǐpiàn yángcōng hé sānsìméi dīngxiāng zǐ。
牛奶中也有一片月桂树叶、几片洋葱和三四枚丁香籽。
Add the eggs and milk and stir with a knife until mixture is well blended.
Jiārù jīdàn hé niúnǎi，ránhòu yòng dāo jiǎobàn zhídào chōngfèn hùnhé。
加入鸡蛋和牛奶，然后用刀搅拌直到充分混合。
Gradually add the warm milk, and bring to the boil stirring constantly.
Mànmàn tiānjiā wēn niúnǎi，búduàn jiǎobàn，zhídào fèiténg。
慢慢添加温牛奶，不断搅拌，直到沸腾。
The baby elephants drink a bottle of milk in seconds.
Yòu xiàng yíhuìr hē guāng le yìpíng niúnǎi。
幼象一会儿喝光了一瓶牛奶。
He broke my lamp and spilled his milk.
Tā dǎsuìle wǒ de dēng，bǎ tā de niúnǎi jiànle yí dì。
他打碎了我的灯，把他的牛奶溅了一地。
I assured him that the milk wasn\'t spoiled.
Wǒ xiàng tā bǎozhèng niúnǎi méiyǒu biànzhì。
我向他保证牛奶没有变质。
Corrupt milk can cause several illnesses.
Biànzhì de niúnǎi néng yǐnfā duō zhǒng jíbìng。
变质的牛奶能引发多种疾病。
We creamed the milk the next day because we did it by hand.
Wǒmen dì-èr tiān piēqùle niúnǎi de biǎomiàn，yīnwèi wǒmen shì yòng shǒu zuò de。
我们第二天撇去了牛奶的表面，因为我们是用手做的。
Then simply crunch the ingredients together and add milk.
Ránhòu zhǐxū jiāng yuánliào yìqǐ yāsuì，jiāshàng niúnǎi。
然后只需将原料一起压碎，加上牛奶。
The government hiked up the price of milk by over 40%.
Niúnǎi bèi zhèngfǔ tíjiàle chāoguò bǎifēn zhī sìshí。
牛奶被政府提价了超过40%。
Put the milk in a saucepan over gentle heat and stir in the sugar until it is dissolved.
Bǎ niúnǎi fàngrù yòng wénhuǒ jiārè de guō zhōng bìng jiā táng jiǎobàn zhízhì rónghuà。
把牛奶放入用文火加热的锅中并加糖搅拌直至溶化。
In the next few years, consumers will be prepared to pay a small premium for real milk.
Jiēxiàlái de jǐ nián zhōng，gùkè jiāng zhǔnbèi hǎo wèi zhēnzhèng de niúnǎi zhīfù yìdiǎn yìjià。
接下来的几年中，顾客将准备好为真正的牛奶支付一点溢价。
Before our milk recorders disappear on holiday they do bring the annual summary for our milk year.
Zài wǒmen de niúnǎi jìlùyuánmen xiūjià zhīqián，tāmen jiāoláile wǒmen de niándù zǒngjié。
在我们的牛奶记录员们休假之前，他们交来了我们的年度总结。
He probably cannot afford to get his fill of milk.
Huòxǔ tā méiyǒu qián lái jìnqíng hē niúnǎi。
或许他没有钱来尽情喝牛奶。
It must be pretty cold for the milk to freeze.
Tiān tài lěng le，niúnǎi dōu dòngzhù le。
天太冷了，牛奶都冻住了。
He took the glass of milk and took a large gulp.
Tā hēle yì bēi niúnǎi，yòu chīle yí dà duī dōngxi。
他喝了一杯牛奶，又吃了一大堆东西。
If it is too thick，beat in some more hot milk.
Rúguǒ tài chóule jiù zài jiā xiē rè niúnǎi。
如果太稠了就再加些热牛奶。
The baby is crying over spilt milk.
Háizi wèi yì chūlái de niúnǎi kūqì。
孩子为溢出来的牛奶哭泣。
The land is flowing with milk and honey.
Dìshàng mǎn shì niúnǎi hé fēngmì。

The milk will keep until next week.
Niúnǎi jiāng bèi bǎoliú dào xià yì zhōu。

Shèngxià de chá、niúnǎi hé guǒzhī bèi liú zuò túzhōng yǐnyòng。
剩下的茶、牛奶和果汁被留作途中饮用。
The spoiled milk went through me like a dose of salts.
Biànzhì de niúnǎi yíxiàzi jiù ràng wǒ hēle xiàqù。

Not a bit of milk was left in the house.
Jiālǐ yìdiǎn niúnǎi yě méi liúxià。

Tā yòng niúnǎi zīyǎng pífū。
她用牛奶滋养皮肤。

Dàorù jiàomǔ hùnhéwù，shèngyú de niúnǎi，huángyóu hé yán。

She reached back to give Sam a glass of milk.
Tā xiàng hòu yǎng dìgěi Sàmǔ yì bēi niúnǎi。
她向后仰递给萨姆一杯牛奶。
They washed down the cookies with a glass of milk.
Tāmen yòng niúnǎi chōngsòng bǐnggān。
他们用牛奶冲送饼干。
He wiped up the spilled milk with a paper towel.
Tā yòng zhǐjīn cādiàole jiàn chūlái de niúnǎi。
他用纸巾擦掉了溅出来的牛奶。
They supplemented their diet with milk.
Tāmen jiāng niúnǎi zēngjiā dào rìcháng shípǔ zhōng。
他们将牛奶增加到日常食谱中。
She asked her son to finish up the milk.
Tā ràng tā de érzi bǎ niúnǎi hēguāng。
她让她的儿子把牛奶喝光。
Water and milk and blood are liquid substances.
Shuǐ、niúnǎi hé xuè dōushì yèzhuàng wùzhì。
水、牛奶和血都是液状物质。
Skimmed milk is much thinner than whole milk.
Tuōzhī niúnǎi bǐ quánzhī nǎi yào xī de duō。
脱脂牛奶比全脂奶要稀的多。
The cream has turned--we have to throw it out.
Niúnǎi biànzhì le。
牛奶变质了。
The milk spilled across the floor.
Niúnǎi sǎle yí dì。
牛奶洒了一地。
The cat lapped up the milk.
Zhè zhī māo tānlán de tiǎnshí gānjìng le niúnǎi。
这只猫贪婪地舔食干净了牛奶。
The milk has soured.
Niúnǎi suān le。
牛奶酸了。
Cow\'s milk contains about 4.7% lactose.
Niúnǎi hányǒu dàyuē 4.7% de rǔtáng。
牛奶含有大约4.7%的乳糖。
Milk is left in a large lidded mug.
Niúnǎi shèng zài yí gè dàgài bēi lǐ。
牛奶剩在一个大盖杯里。

The milk curdled.
Niúnǎi jiéchéng níngrǔ le。

The milk caseated.
Niúnǎi biànchéng gānlào le。
牛奶变成干酪了。
No milk whatsoever is left.
Yìdiǎnr niúnǎi dōu méiyǒu shèngxià。
一点儿牛奶都没有剩下。
We need to milk the cattle every morning before sunrise.
每天早上日出前，我们都得给牛挤奶。
The cow is fresh.
Zhè tóu mǔniú yòu kě chóngxīn chǎn nǎi le。
这头母牛又可重新产奶了。
她尽心尽力陪侍生病的奶奶，奶奶夸她是个好孩子。
Tā jìnxīn jìnlì péishì shēngbìng de nǎinai，nǎinai kuā tā shì gè hǎoháizi。
She takes good care of her sick grandma, and was praised by her as a good child.
今天是奶奶的80寿诞，全家人聚在一起给奶奶祝寿。
Jīntiān shì nǎinai de bā0 shòudàn，quánjiā rén jùzài yìqǐ gěi nǎinai zhùshòu。
Today is grandma\'s 80th birthday, and all the family have got together to congratulate her.
宝宝奶声奶气地对奶奶说：“我想吃苹果！”
Bǎobao nǎishēng nǎiqì de duì nǎinai shuō：“wǒ xiǎng chī píngguǒ！”
The baby says childishly to the nan: “I wanna an apple.”
奶奶特别宠爱小孙儿。
Nǎinǎi tèbié chǒng\'ài xiǎosūn\'ér。
Grandma dotes on her little grandson.
你不该跟你奶奶顶嘴。
Nǐ bù gāi gēn nǐ nǎinɑi dǐngzuǐ。
You shouldn\'t talk back to your grandmother.
他爷爷奶奶惯着他，他要什么就给什么。
Tā yéye nǎinai guàn zhe tā，tā yào shénme jiù gěi shénme。
His grandparents indulge him by giving him anything he asks for.
不许和奶奶还嘴，这不礼貌。
Bùxǔ hé nǎinai huánzuǐ，zhè bùlǐmào。
Don\'t answer back to your grandmother; it\'s not polite.
奶奶上了年纪，腿脚不那么灵便了。
Nǎinai shàng le niánjì，tuǐjiǎo bú nàme língbiàn le。
Granny is stricken in years and isn\'t so surefooted as before.
奶奶最疼小孙子。
Nǎinai zuì téngxiǎo sūnzi。
Granny dotes on her little grandson.
这位老奶奶的腿脚还很利落。
Zhèwèi lǎo nǎinai de tuǐjiǎo hái hěn lìluo。
This old lady still moves briskly.
快把这好消息告诉奶奶，让她老人家喜欢喜欢。
Kuài bǎ zhè hǎo xiāoxi gàosù nǎinai，ràng tā lǎorénjia xǐhuan xǐhuan。
Tell Grandma the good news quick. She\'ll be delighted to hear it.
他带了些南边的土产来孝敬他奶奶。
Tā dài le xiē nánbian de tǔchǎn lái xiàojìngtā nǎinai。
He brought his grandmother some local produce from the south as a gift.
过去奶奶常在暗弱的烛光下缝补全家的衣服。
Guòqù nǎinai cháng zài ànruò de zhúguāng xià féngbǔ quánjiā de yīfu。
Grandma used to mend clothes for the whole family under dim candle light.
奶奶觉得板床比“席梦思”睡着舒服。
Nǎinai juédé bǎnchuáng bǐ“xímèngsī”shuì zhe shūfu。
Grandmother feels sleeping on plank bed is more comfortable than on the spring mattress.
小明经常伴同奶奶散步。
Xiǎo Míng jīngcháng bàntóng nǎinai sànbù。
Xiaoming often accompanies his grandmother on walks.
奶奶告诉我们，过去一般是吃不到背令水果的。
Nǎinai gàosù wǒmen，guòqù yìbān shì chībúdào bèilìng shuǐguǒ de。
Grandma told us that in the past it was almost impossible to have out-of-season.
老奶奶正在向孩子们讲踆乌的传说。
Lǎonǎinai zhèngzài xiàng háizimen jiǎng cūnwū de chuánshuō。
The old grandma is telling the children a legend of an imaginary golden bird that has three feet and lives in the sun.
快给老奶奶打扇。
Kuài gěi lǎonǎinai dǎshàn。
Hurry up and fan your grandmother.
从奶奶这辈人起，女人就都是大脚了。
Cóng nǎinai zhè bèi rén qǐ，nǚrén jiù dōushì dàjiǎo le。
From my grandmothers generations forward women\'s feet have been unbound.
奶奶把这几张大票封好，准备当压岁钱给我们。
Nǎinai bǎ zhèjǐzhāng dàpiào fēnghǎo，zhǔnbèi dāng yāsuìqián gěi wǒmen。
Grandma sealed the 100 Yuan notes in envelopes to give to the children as New Year\'s gifts.
快睡觉的时候，他帮奶奶打开了电热毯。
Kuài shuìjiào de shíhou，tā bāng nǎinai dǎkāi le diànrètǎn。
He helped his grandmother turn on the electric blanket when they were about to sleep.
奶奶说佩带宝玉可以发祥避邪，可她不信。
Nǎinai shuō pèidài bǎoyù kěyǐ fāxiáng bìxié，kě tā bú xìn。
She doesn\'t believe grandma when she says that wearing jade helps one avoid evil.
小明坚信没有什么仙家法旨，并劝奶奶也不要相信。
Xiǎo Míng jiānxìn méiyǒu shénme xiānjiā fǎzhǐ，bìng quàn nǎinai yě búyào xiāngxìn。
Xiao Ming doesn’t believe in the power of Buddha and tries to dissuade his grandma from that belief.
奶奶年轻的时候，每天晚上都要纺线。
Nǎinai niánqīng de shíhou，měitiān wǎnshàng dōuyào fǎngxiàn。
My grandmother busied herself with spinning every night when she was young.
奶奶眼花了，认针的时候总要拿个放大镜。
Nǎinai yǎn huā le，rèn zhēn de shíhou zǒng yào ná gè fàngdàjìng。
My grandmother has poor eyesight and has to use a magnifying glass to thread her needles.
今晚的月亮有些模糊，奶奶说那是风晕。
Jīnwǎn de yuèliàng yǒuxiē móhu，nǎinai shuō nà shì fēngyùn。
The moon tonight is a little hazy, my grandmother calls it a sign of windy weather.
上个世纪20年代，奶奶以缝穷为“职业”。
Shàng gè shìjì èrshí niándài，nǎinai yǐ féngqióng wéi“zhíyè”。
My grandmother sewed and mended clothes for a pittance in order to make a living in the 1920s.
她隔三岔五的去照顾她的奶奶。
Tā gésān chàwǔ de qù zhàogù tā de nǎinai。
She goes to take care of her grandmother from time to time.
奶奶最爱听的是河北梆子。
Nǎinai zuì àitīng de shì Héběi bāngzi。
Hebei clapping opera is grandma\'s favorite.
奶奶最爱吃红果儿淹渍的咸菜。
Nǎinai zuì àichī hóngguǒr yānzì de xiáncài。
Grandma loved haw-pickled cabbage the most.
奶奶喜欢听徽剧，高兴时还会唱上两句。
Nǎinai xǐhuan tīng huījù，gāoxìng shí hái huì chàng shàng liǎng jù。
Grandma loved Hui Drama. She even sings one, or two sentences when she is happy.
奶奶在疗养院将息数日后，精神变得好多了。
Nǎinai zài liáoyǎngyuàn jiāngxī shùrì hòu，jīngshén biàn de hǎo duō le。
After several days\' recuperation in hospital, grandma feels much better now.
妈妈端出一碗新鲜的水果浆汁给奶奶喝。
Māma duānchū yìwǎn xīnxiān de shuǐguǒ jiāngzhī gěi nǎinai hē。
Mother serves grandma a bowel of fresh juice.
那个老奶奶做过接生婆。
Nàge lǎonǎinai zuòguò jiēshēngpó。
That old lady used to be a midwife.
每当妈妈要惩罚小明的时候，奶奶就成了小明的救命稻草。
Měi dāng māma yào chéngfá Xiǎo Míng de shíhou，nǎinai jiù chéng le Xiǎo Míng de jiùmìng dàocǎo。
Whenever Xiaoming\'s mother punishes him, he reaches for grandmother as a last straw.
这位老奶奶已经居孀三十多年了。
Zhèwèi lǎonǎinai yǐjing jūshuāng sānshí duōnián le。
This old lady was a widow for more than 30 years.
爷爷奶奶退休以后，就在家里看养孙子了。
Yéye nǎinai tuìxiū yǐhòu，jiù zài jiā lǐ kānyǎng sūnzi le。
After retirement, grandpa and grandma stay at home and look after their grandson.
小明的病多亏奶奶精心看顾，很快就好了。
Xiǎo Míng de bìng duōkuī nǎinai jīngxīn kāngù，hěnkuài jiù hǎo le。
Thanks to the meticulous care from grandma, Xiaoming recovered from his illness quickly.
奶奶1937年毕业于延安抗大。
Nǎinai yījiǔsānqī nián bìyè yú Yán\'ān kàngdà。
Grandma graduated from the Chinese People\'s Anti-Japanese Military and Political College in Yanan in 1937.
在奶奶那个年代，单位的文秘都要求会刻写蜡版呢。
Zài nǎinai nàge niándài，dānwèi de wénmì dōu yāoqiú huì kèxiě làbǎn ne。
In my grandma\'s time, secretaries of work units would be able to cut mimeograph stencils.
奶奶说她小时村里遭过一次大灾，大家都不得不靠啃青度日。
Nǎinai shuō tā xiǎoshí cūn lǐ zāoguò yícì dàzāi，dàjiā dōu bùdébùkào kěnqīng dùrì。
Grandma said that when she was young, her village was once struck by calamity, and villagers had to eat unripe crops.
奶奶爱开玩笑，经常叫爷爷老不死的。
Nǎinai ài kāi wánxiào，jīngcháng jiào yéye lǎobùsǐ de。
Grandma enjoys jokes and always calls grandpa &quot;lobster&quot;.
由于奶奶是老花眼，所以时常认错人。
Yóuyú nǎinai shì lǎohuāyǎn,suǒyǐ shícháng rèncuò rén.
Grandma has presbyopia, so she often mistakes someone for another.
我们给去世的奶奶烧了些冥币，可她真的能够收到吗？
Wǒmen gěi qùshì de nǎinai shāo le xiē míngbì，kě tā zhēn de nénggòu shōudào ma？
We burned some mock coins for our dead grandma, but can she really get them?
你年纪轻轻的，怎么说话比老奶奶还磨叨？
Nǐ niánjì qīngqīng de，zěnme shuōhuà bǐ lǎonǎinai hái mòdāo？
Being so young, how can you be as nagging as an old woman?
奶奶会用木香花瓣做点心，那点心的味道都带着花香！
Nǎinai huì yòng mùxiānghuābàn zuò diǎnxīn，nà diǎnxīn de wèidào dōu dài zhe huāxiāng！
Grandma can make snacks with banksia rose petals, which smells and tastes as fragrant as the flower.
自从有了小囡囡，老刘两口子就成了爷爷和奶奶了。
Zìcóng yǒu le xiǎonānnān，lǎo Liú liǎng kǒuzi jiù chéng le yéye hé nǎinai le。
Since the baby was born, Laoliu and his wife have become grandparents.
每天天快黑时奶奶就要念道：小明该放学回来了。
Měitiān tiān kuàihēi shí nǎinai jiùyào niàndào：Xiǎo Míng gāi fàngxué huílái le。
When it\'s getting dark, grandmother always says that Xiao Ming should be back from school soon.
她从小就跟奶奶学会了女红刺绣。
Tā cóng xiǎo jiù gēn nǎinai xuéhuì le nǚhóng cìxiù。
She has learned needlework and embroidery from her grandmother since she was a child.
奶奶曾经是这所女校的第一届学员。
Nǎinai céngjīng shì zhè suǒ nǚxiào de dìyī jiè xuéyuán。
My grandmother was a student in the first year of this women\'s university.
小时候在奶奶家的暖炕上睡觉，那感觉就是暖和！
Xiǎoshíhou zài nǎinai jiā de nuǎnkàng shàng shuìjiào，nà gǎnjué jiùshì nuǎnhé！
When I slept on the heated kang in my grandmother\'s family in my childhood, I felt warm at heart.
奶奶出嫁时家里太穷，根本没什么陪奁。
Nǎinai chūjià shí jiā lǐ tài qióng，gēnběn méi shénme péilián。
My grandma\'s family was poor at the time she got married, so she had only a small dowry.
她身上的这块佩玉是奶奶送给她的。
Tā shēnshàng de zhèkuài pèiyù shì nǎinai sònggěi tā de。
The jade pendant she wears was given by her grandma.
奶奶怕宝贝孙子着凉，亲自给他缝了个厚实的屁帘儿。
Nǎinai pà bǎobèi sūnzi zháoliáng，qīnzì gěi tā féng le gè hòushí de pìliánr。
The grandmother feared that her grandson would catch a cold, so she made a piece of thick cloth to tie to his waist with slit pants to cover his bottom.
妈妈和奶奶都喜欢听评剧。
Māma hé nǎinai dōu xǐhuan tīng píngjù。
Both my grandma and mom like listening to pingju.
奶奶可喜欢听评戏的《秦香莲》了。
Nǎinai kě xǐhuan tīng píngxì de《Qín Xiānglián》 le。
My grandma likes to listen to the Pingju &quot;Qin Xianglian&quot;.
骑楼是老奶奶们乘凉的最佳场所。
Qílóu shì lǎonǎinaimen chéngliáng de zuì jiā chǎngsuǒ。
Terraces are the best place for old women to enjoy the cool.
我跟着奶奶学会了上鞋。
Wǒ gēn zhe nǎinai xuéhuì le shàngxié。
I have learned to sole shoes from Grandma.
这个石臼是我们家的老物件了，奶奶年轻时就常用它舂米。
Zhège shíjiùshì wǒmen jiā de lǎowùjiàn le，nǎinai niánqīng shí jiù cháng yòng tā chōngmǐ。
This stone mortar is an antique in my family. My grandma used to pounding rice in it in her youth.
爸爸出生时是我的姨奶奶帮助收生的。
Bàba chūshēng shí shì wǒ de yínǎinai bāngzhù shōushēng de。
My grandmother\'s sister helped to deliver my father when he was born.
老奶奶们到了夏天都爱坐在树阴凉儿里拉家常。
Lǎonǎinaimen dào le xiàtiān dōu ài zuòzài shùyīnliángr lǐ lājiācháng。
Old women all like sitting in the tree shadows and gossiping on summer days.
看到奶奶的死亡证，我的心里无比的悲伤。
Kàndào nǎinai de sǐwángzhèng，wǒ de xīnlǐ wúbǐ de bēishāng。
On seeing grandmother\'s death certificate, I felt extremely sad at heart.
奶奶的牙都掉光了，所以只能吃软软的糖饴了。
Nǎinai de yá dōu diàoguāng le，suǒyǐ zhǐnéng chī ruǎnruǎn de tángyí le。
Grandma has no teeth now, so she can only eat very soft maltose.
奶奶是个慈祥的人，跟人说话语气很婉和。
Nǎinai shì gè cíxiáng de rén，gēn rén shuōhuà yǔqì hěnwǎnhé。
Grandma is a kind person, very mild when talking to others.
今年又是五谷丰登，奶奶脸上笑开了花。
Jīnnián yòushì wǔgǔfēngdēng，nǎinai liǎnshàng xiào kāi le huā。
This year we had a bumper grain harvest, which made my grandmother very happy.
奶奶今年90遐龄了，依然精神矍铄。
Nǎinai jīnnián jiǔshí xiálíng le，yīrán jīngshén juéshuò。
My grandmother is in her 90s, but she is still energetic.
奶奶正在安享晚年闲静的生活。
Nǎinai zhèngzài ānxiǎng wǎnnián xiánjìng de shēnghuó。
My grandmother is enjoying the quiet life of old age.
李奶奶今天被骗子骗去了仅有的五个现洋。
Lǐ nǎinai jīntiān bèi piànzi piànqù le jǐnyǒu de wǔ gè xiànyáng。
Granny Li was cheated today out of five silver dollars, which was all she had.
奶奶按照住持的要求，把香火贡奉在殿外的香坛里。
Nǎinai ànzhào zhùchí de yāoqiú，bǎ xiānghuǒ gòngfèng zài diàn wài de xiāngtán lǐ。
My grandmother puts the incense coil in the burner outside the hall at the request of the abbot.
奶奶总是爱怜地称她为“小东西”。
Nǎinai zǒngshì àilián de chēng tā wéi xiǎodōngxi。
Her grandmother always calls her &quot;tiny thing&quot; affectionately.
奶奶是个心善的人，无论对谁都很和气。
Nǎinai shì gè xīnshàn de rén，wúlùn duì shuí dōu hěn héqi。
My grandmother is a kind-hearted person who treats everyone very well.
奶奶喜欢向人忆述年轻时的美好时光。
Nǎinai xǐhuan xiàng rén yìshù niánqīng shí de měihǎo shíguāng。
My grandma likes to recall and talk about her happy days when she was young.
奶奶到街上用三十块钱换几张油票儿。
Nǎinai dào jiēshàng yòng sānshí kuài qián huàn jǐzhāng yóupiàor。
Grandma went to the street and bought several cooking oil coupons with 30 yuan.
我昨天把手袋落在奶奶家了，我有空儿就去取。
Wǒ zuótiān bǎ shǒudài làzài nǎinai jiā le，wǒ yǒukòngr jiù qù qǔ。
I left my bag at grandma\'s house yesterday; I will go and get it when I am free.
奶奶每年都会去岳庙祭祀。
Nǎinai měinián dōuhuì qù yuèmiào jìsì。
Every year, Grandma would go to the temple of Yuefei to offer sacrifices to the gods.
奶奶常从照片上咂摸爷爷年轻时的样子。
Nǎinai cháng cóng zhàopiàn shàng zāmō yéye niánqīngshí de yàngzi。
Grandma always looked at the picture and thought about what Grandpa looked like when he was young.
我多么想抚平奶奶脸上的皱折。
Wǒ duōme xiǎng fǔpíng nǎinai liǎnshàng de zhòuzhé。
How I wish that I could smooth the wrinkles on grandma\'s face.
奶奶最爱看原滋原味的花鼓戏了。
Nǎinai zuì àikàn yuánzī yuánwèi de huāgǔxì le。
Grandma likes authentic Huaguxi Drama the most.
她是由奶奶带大的。
Tā shì yóu nǎinai dàidàde。
She was brought up by her grandmother.
我每天给奶奶读报。
Wǒ měitiān gěi nǎinai dúbào。
I read the newspaper to my grandmother every day.
他是由奶奶扶养大的。
Tā shì yóu nǎinai fúyǎngdàde。
He was brought up by his grandmother.
奶奶身体很健康。
Nǎinai shēntǐ hěn jiànkāng.
Granny is very healthy.
她常常陪伴在奶奶身边。
Tā chángcháng péibàn zài nǎinai shēnbiān.
She often keeps her grandma company.
奶奶的头发太稀了。
Nǎinai de tóufa tài xī le。
Granny\'s hair is very thin.
去年，他的爷爷、奶奶相继去世了。
Qùnián，tā de yéye 、 nǎinai xiāngjì qùshìle。
Last year his grandfather and grandmother died one after the other.
奶奶年纪大了，行动不便。
Nǎinai niánjì dà le，xíngdòng búbiàn。
Grandma\'s getting old and finding it harder to move about.
蒙古族的奶食种类很多，有奶豆腐、奶茶、奶酒等。
Ménggǔzú de nǎishí zhǒng lèi hěnduō，yǒu nǎidòufu、nǎichá、nǎijiǔ děng。
There are many kinds of milk food in Mongolian ethnic group, such as cheese-shaped milk products, milk tea, and fermented milk.
他是奶妈奶大的。
Tā shì nǎimā nǎidà de。
He was breast-fed by a wet nurse.
她很喜欢吃各类奶制品，尤其喜欢奶酪。
Tā hěnxǐhuan chī gè lèi nǎizhìpǐn，yóuqí xǐhuan nǎilào。
She is fond of different kinds of milk products, especially cheese.
她不喜欢那种奶腥味，所以她几乎从不喝牛奶。
Tā bùxǐhuan nàzhǒng nǎixīngwèi，suǒyǐ tā jīhū cóng bùhē niúnǎi。
She doesn’t like the fishy smell of milk, so she rarely ever drinks milk.
架着老奶奶上楼。
奶奶洗过衣服总爱浆一浆
老奶奶
他奶奶前几天老了。
明天插空去看看奶奶。
夏日的夜晚，奶奶常指着天上的星星讲古。
奶奶高兴得满脸笑纹。
奶奶也真絮聒，一件事儿说了一遍又一遍。
奶奶在吆呼我呢
二奶奶嘴刁，人们都惧她三分。
奶奶对小孙女儿非常爱惜。
奶奶操劳了一生
奶奶满脸充溢着喜悦
我们上班，奶奶看家。
老奶奶又唠叨开了。
一看时间不早了，奶奶连忙把他叫醒。
胡同里的孩子们都叫她陈奶奶。
奶奶特别溺爱小孙女儿。
奶奶时常念叨你。
奶奶没念过书。
孩子怕生，老躲在奶奶身后。
奶奶最疼惜小孙女。
奶奶最心疼我。
奶奶悠闲地摇着蒲扇。
给奶奶做寿。
奶声奶气。
孩子不到一周岁就断奶了◇给文艺演出单位断奶，逼着它们走向市场
My grandma is learning to use a computer.
我奶奶正在学习使用电脑。
My grandmother left me a will.
奶奶留给我一份遗嘱。
In my city there was a very old woman who lived beyond the age of hundred.
我所在的城市生活着一位年逾百岁的老奶奶。
She used to spend childhood summers with her grandparents.
小时候，她常常和爷爷奶奶一起度过夏天。
Grandma produced a letter from her pocket which she asked me to read.
奶奶从兜里掏出了一封信让我读。
The chair painted light rose is grandma\'s favorite.
那把浅玫瑰红的椅子是我奶奶的最爱。
It was a treat to be able to visit my grandparents last holiday.
去年假期时去看了爷爷奶奶，真是一次美好的经历。
I saw her last night wheeling her grandmother around the park.
我昨晚看见她正在推着她奶奶在公园散步。
My grandma refused to spend her early years in a home.
我奶奶不愿意在自己生活还能自理的时候，就搬去养老院度过余生。
My nanny is so lovely.
我奶奶十分和蔼可亲。
Say hello to your grandma.
叫奶奶好。
yesterday I broke one of my grandmother\'s glasses, she got so angry.
昨天我把奶奶眼镜的一块镜片打碎了，她很生气。
This gorgeous sturdy clear glass vase belongs to my grandmother.
这个外形华丽、质地坚硬的透明花瓶是我奶奶的。
I just want to use my grandmother\'s coffee pot again.
我只想再用一次奶奶的咖啡壶。
My grandmother is not computer-literate.
我奶奶不会使用电脑。
Grandma poured hot water from the thermos.
奶奶从热水瓶倒出热水。
He refused to accept the collect call from his grandmother.
Tā jùjué fùdān tā nǎinai suǒ dǎ de duìfāng fùfèi diànhuà de fèiyòng。
他拒绝负担他奶奶所打的对方付费电话的费用。
Granny was staring at me with her eyes wide open.
Nǎinai zhēngdàzhe yǎnjing zhùshìzhe wǒ。
奶奶睁大着眼睛注视着我。
Her grandmother became a substitute for her dead mother.
Tā de nǎinai dàitìle tā sǐqù de māma。
她的奶奶代替了她死去的妈妈。
Gran was like a cat on hot bricks when his kid was kidnapped.
Háizi bèi bǎngjià shí， nǎinai xiàng règuōshàngdemǎyǐ yíyàng jí de tuántuánzhuàn。
孩子被绑架时，奶奶像热锅上的蚂蚁一样急得团团转。
The grandmother asked me to look in on the boy.
Nǎinai ràng wǒ qù bàifǎng yíxià nàgè nánhái。
奶奶让我去拜访一下那个男孩。
He had to tend to his grandmother\'s house while she went on vacation.
Tā děi zài tā nǎinai qù dùjià qījiān，zhàokàn tā de fángzi。
他得在他奶奶去度假期间，照看她的房子。
Grandma didn\'t turn a hair as she heard the bad news.
Tīngdào zhège xiāoxi shí，nǎinai miànbùgǎisè。
听到这个消息时，奶奶面不改色。
It\'s a pity that we can\'t bring over the dog from grandma\'s house.
Zhēn yíhàn wǒmen bùnéng bǎ zhè tiáo gǒu cóng nǎinǎijiā dàilái。
真遗憾我们不能把这条狗从奶奶家带来。
My grandmother is hard of hearing--you\'ll have to shout.
Wǒ nǎinai tīnglì bùhǎo，nǐ děi dàshēng shuō。
我奶奶听力不好，你得大声说。
The grandparents want to bond with the child.
Yéye nǎinai xiǎng hé háizi dāi zài yìqǐ。
爷爷奶奶想和孩子呆在一起。
The children asked me about their dead grandmother.
Háizǐmen wèn qǐ le tāmen guòshì de nǎinai。
孩子们问起了他们过世的奶奶。
The farm was filled with dry cows.
Zhè zuò Nóngchǎng lǐ quánshì bù chǎnnǎi de nǎiniú。
这座农场里全是不产奶的奶牛。
Milk comes from cows.
牛奶来自奶牛。
John has to milk the cow early in the morning.
约翰一大早就要给奶牛挤奶。
Fresh sheep\'s milk is sieved through a handkerchief before being turned into cheese.
Xīnxiān de yángnǎi zuòchéng nǎilào qián xiān yào tōngguò shǒupà guòlǜ。
新鲜的羊奶做成奶酪前先要通过手帕过滤。
The skim milk substitutes for cream--we are on a strict diet.
Yòng tuōzhīnǎi dàitì nǎiyóu bā，wǒmen bìxū ànzhào yángé de guīdìng yǐnshí。
用脱脂奶代替奶油吧，我们必须按照严格的规定饮食。
The kitten was weaned and fed by its owner with a bottle.
Zhè zhī xiǎomāo bèi tā de zhǔrén duànnǎi bìng yòng nǎipíng wèiyǎng。
这只小猫被它的主人断奶并用奶瓶喂养。
We often substitute margarine for butter.
Wǒmen jīngcháng yòng rénzàonǎiyóu dàitì nǎiyóu。
我们经常用人造奶油代替奶油。
Skimmed milk is much thinner than whole milk.
Tuōzhī niúnǎi bǐ quánzhī nǎi yào xī de duō。
脱脂牛奶比全脂奶要稀的多。
After the melamine- contaminated milk incident the sales volume of milk headed into a steep dive.
毒牛奶事件后，牛奶销量大幅下降。
She weaned her baby when he was 3 months old and started him on powdered milk.
Zài háizi sān gè yuè dà shí，tā gěi háizi duànle nǎi，bìng kāishǐ wèi nǎifěn。
在孩子三个月大时，她给孩子断了奶，并开始喂奶粉。
Slowly add a basin of milk to the cream you have prepared.
慢慢将一盆牛奶倒在备好的奶油上面。
The recipe says that you can substitute regular milk with fat-free milk.
菜谱上说你可以用脱脂牛奶代替普通牛奶。
In England they call light cream &quot;single cream&quot;.
Zài yīnggélán，tāmen guǎn“light cream”（dàn nǎiyóu）jiào“single cream”（dān bèi nǎiyóu）。
在英格兰，他们管 “light cream”（淡奶油）叫 “single cream”（单倍奶油）。
The wetnurse suckled the infant.
Nǎimā gěi zhège yīnger wèinǎi。
奶妈给这个婴儿喂奶。
I prefer goat cheese to the cow variety.
比起牛奶类干酪，我更喜欢羊奶酪。
Do you take black or white coffee?
你是要加牛奶的咖啡还是不加牛奶的？
Cows need to be milked every morning.
Nǎiniú měi tiān zǎoshang xūyào jǐnǎi。
奶牛每天早上需要挤奶。

她向卖牛奶的人定购了一盒新鲜奶油。
The land is used  mainly for dairy cows to produce fresh milk .

The baby sucked on the mother\'s breast.

Her grandmother became a substitute for her dead mother.

我妈妈还在用传统方法做酸奶，我很喜欢。
The young mother was nursing her baby daughter.

那位年轻的妈妈正在给自己的宝贝女儿喂奶。
I always have coffee, milk, orange juice, freshly baked bread, and butter for breakfast.
我早餐通常喝咖啡、牛奶、桔子汁儿，吃新烤的面包和黄油。
宝宝奶声奶气地对奶奶说：“我想吃苹果！”
Bǎobao nǎishēng nǎiqì de duì nǎinai shuō：“wǒ xiǎng chī píngguǒ！”
The baby says childishly to the nan: “I wanna an apple.”
蒙古族的奶食种类很多，有奶豆腐、奶茶、奶酒等。
Ménggǔzú de nǎishí zhǒng lèi hěnduō，yǒu nǎidòufu、nǎichá、nǎijiǔ děng。
There are many kinds of milk food in Mongolian ethnic group, such as cheese-shaped milk products, milk tea, and fermented milk.
她尽心尽力陪侍生病的奶奶，奶奶夸她是个好孩子。
Tā jìnxīn jìnlì péishì shēngbìng de nǎinai，nǎinai kuā tā shì gè hǎoháizi。
She takes good care of her sick grandma, and was praised by her as a good child.
今天是奶奶的80寿诞，全家人聚在一起给奶奶祝寿。
Jīntiān shì nǎinai de bā0 shòudàn，quánjiā rén jùzài yìqǐ gěi nǎinai zhùshòu。
Today is grandma\'s 80th birthday, and all the family have got together to congratulate her.
奶奶特别宠爱小孙儿。
Nǎinǎi tèbié chǒng\'ài xiǎosūn\'ér。
Grandma dotes on her little grandson.
你不该跟你奶奶顶嘴。
Nǐ bù gāi gēn nǐ nǎinɑi dǐngzuǐ。
You shouldn\'t talk back to your grandmother.
他爷爷奶奶惯着他，他要什么就给什么。
Tā yéye nǎinai guàn zhe tā，tā yào shénme jiù gěi shénme。
His grandparents indulge him by giving him anything he asks for.
不许和奶奶还嘴，这不礼貌。
Bùxǔ hé nǎinai huánzuǐ，zhè bùlǐmào。
Don\'t answer back to your grandmother; it\'s not polite.
他是奶妈奶大的。
Tā shì nǎimā nǎidà de。
He was breast-fed by a wet nurse.
奶奶上了年纪，腿脚不那么灵便了。
Nǎinai shàng le niánjì，tuǐjiǎo bú nàme língbiàn le。
Granny is stricken in years and isn\'t so surefooted as before.
奶奶最疼小孙子。
Nǎinai zuì téngxiǎo sūnzi。
Granny dotes on her little grandson.
这位老奶奶的腿脚还很利落。
Zhèwèi lǎo nǎinai de tuǐjiǎo hái hěn lìluo。
This old lady still moves briskly.
快把这好消息告诉奶奶，让她老人家喜欢喜欢。
Kuài bǎ zhè hǎo xiāoxi gàosù nǎinai，ràng tā lǎorénjia xǐhuan xǐhuan。
Tell Grandma the good news quick. She\'ll be delighted to hear it.
他带了些南边的土产来孝敬他奶奶。
Tā dài le xiē nánbian de tǔchǎn lái xiàojìngtā nǎinai。
He brought his grandmother some local produce from the south as a gift.
过去奶奶常在暗弱的烛光下缝补全家的衣服。
Guòqù nǎinai cháng zài ànruò de zhúguāng xià féngbǔ quánjiā de yīfu。
Grandma used to mend clothes for the whole family under dim candle light.
奶奶觉得板床比“席梦思”睡着舒服。
Nǎinai juédé bǎnchuáng bǐ“xímèngsī”shuì zhe shūfu。
Grandmother feels sleeping on plank bed is more comfortable than on the spring mattress.
小明经常伴同奶奶散步。
Xiǎo Míng jīngcháng bàntóng nǎinai sànbù。
Xiaoming often accompanies his grandmother on walks.
奶奶告诉我们，过去一般是吃不到背令水果的。
Nǎinai gàosù wǒmen，guòqù yìbān shì chībúdào bèilìng shuǐguǒ de。
Grandma told us that in the past it was almost impossible to have out-of-season.
老奶奶正在向孩子们讲踆乌的传说。
Lǎonǎinai zhèngzài xiàng háizimen jiǎng cūnwū de chuánshuō。
The old grandma is telling the children a legend of an imaginary golden bird that has three feet and lives in the sun.
快给老奶奶打扇。
Kuài gěi lǎonǎinai dǎshàn。
Hurry up and fan your grandmother.
从奶奶这辈人起，女人就都是大脚了。
Cóng nǎinai zhè bèi rén qǐ，nǚrén jiù dōushì dàjiǎo le。
From my grandmothers generations forward women\'s feet have been unbound.
奶奶把这几张大票封好，准备当压岁钱给我们。
Nǎinai bǎ zhèjǐzhāng dàpiào fēnghǎo，zhǔnbèi dāng yāsuìqián gěi wǒmen。
Grandma sealed the 100 Yuan notes in envelopes to give to the children as New Year\'s gifts.
快睡觉的时候，他帮奶奶打开了电热毯。
Kuài shuìjiào de shíhou，tā bāng nǎinai dǎkāi le diànrètǎn。
He helped his grandmother turn on the electric blanket when they were about to sleep.
奶奶说佩带宝玉可以发祥避邪，可她不信。
Nǎinai shuō pèidài bǎoyù kěyǐ fāxiáng bìxié，kě tā bú xìn。
She doesn\'t believe grandma when she says that wearing jade helps one avoid evil.
小明坚信没有什么仙家法旨，并劝奶奶也不要相信。
Xiǎo Míng jiānxìn méiyǒu shénme xiānjiā fǎzhǐ，bìng quàn nǎinai yě búyào xiāngxìn。
Xiao Ming doesn’t believe in the power of Buddha and tries to dissuade his grandma from that belief.
奶奶年轻的时候，每天晚上都要纺线。
Nǎinai niánqīng de shíhou，měitiān wǎnshàng dōuyào fǎngxiàn。
My grandmother busied herself with spinning every night when she was young.
奶奶眼花了，认针的时候总要拿个放大镜。
Nǎinai yǎn huā le，rèn zhēn de shíhou zǒng yào ná gè fàngdàjìng。
My grandmother has poor eyesight and has to use a magnifying glass to thread her needles.
今晚的月亮有些模糊，奶奶说那是风晕。
Jīnwǎn de yuèliàng yǒuxiē móhu，nǎinai shuō nà shì fēngyùn。
The moon tonight is a little hazy, my grandmother calls it a sign of windy weather.
上个世纪20年代，奶奶以缝穷为“职业”。
Shàng gè shìjì èrshí niándài，nǎinai yǐ féngqióng wéi“zhíyè”。
My grandmother sewed and mended clothes for a pittance in order to make a living in the 1920s.
她隔三岔五的去照顾她的奶奶。
Tā gésān chàwǔ de qù zhàogù tā de nǎinai。
She goes to take care of her grandmother from time to time.
奶奶最爱听的是河北梆子。
Nǎinai zuì àitīng de shì Héběi bāngzi。
Hebei clapping opera is grandma\'s favorite.
奶奶最爱吃红果儿淹渍的咸菜。
Nǎinai zuì àichī hóngguǒr yānzì de xiáncài。
Grandma loved haw-pickled cabbage the most.
奶奶喜欢听徽剧，高兴时还会唱上两句。
Nǎinai xǐhuan tīng huījù，gāoxìng shí hái huì chàng shàng liǎng jù。
Grandma loved Hui Drama. She even sings one, or two sentences when she is happy.
奶奶在疗养院将息数日后，精神变得好多了。
Nǎinai zài liáoyǎngyuàn jiāngxī shùrì hòu，jīngshén biàn de hǎo duō le。
After several days\' recuperation in hospital, grandma feels much better now.
妈妈端出一碗新鲜的水果浆汁给奶奶喝。
Māma duānchū yìwǎn xīnxiān de shuǐguǒ jiāngzhī gěi nǎinai hē。
Mother serves grandma a bowel of fresh juice.
那个老奶奶做过接生婆。
Nàge lǎonǎinai zuòguò jiēshēngpó。
That old lady used to be a midwife.
每当妈妈要惩罚小明的时候，奶奶就成了小明的救命稻草。
Měi dāng māma yào chéngfá Xiǎo Míng de shíhou，nǎinai jiù chéng le Xiǎo Míng de jiùmìng dàocǎo。
Whenever Xiaoming\'s mother punishes him, he reaches for grandmother as a last straw.
这位老奶奶已经居孀三十多年了。
Zhèwèi lǎonǎinai yǐjing jūshuāng sānshí duōnián le。
This old lady was a widow for more than 30 years.
爷爷奶奶退休以后，就在家里看养孙子了。
Yéye nǎinai tuìxiū yǐhòu，jiù zài jiā lǐ kānyǎng sūnzi le。
After retirement, grandpa and grandma stay at home and look after their grandson.
小明的病多亏奶奶精心看顾，很快就好了。
Xiǎo Míng de bìng duōkuī nǎinai jīngxīn kāngù，hěnkuài jiù hǎo le。
Thanks to the meticulous care from grandma, Xiaoming recovered from his illness quickly.
奶奶1937年毕业于延安抗大。
Nǎinai yījiǔsānqī nián bìyè yú Yán\'ān kàngdà。
Grandma graduated from the Chinese People\'s Anti-Japanese Military and Political College in Yanan in 1937.
在奶奶那个年代，单位的文秘都要求会刻写蜡版呢。
Zài nǎinai nàge niándài，dānwèi de wénmì dōu yāoqiú huì kèxiě làbǎn ne。
In my grandma\'s time, secretaries of work units would be able to cut mimeograph stencils.
奶奶说她小时村里遭过一次大灾，大家都不得不靠啃青度日。
Nǎinai shuō tā xiǎoshí cūn lǐ zāoguò yícì dàzāi，dàjiā dōu bùdébùkào kěnqīng dùrì。
Grandma said that when she was young, her village was once struck by calamity, and villagers had to eat unripe crops.
奶奶爱开玩笑，经常叫爷爷老不死的。
Nǎinai ài kāi wánxiào，jīngcháng jiào yéye lǎobùsǐ de。
Grandma enjoys jokes and always calls grandpa &quot;lobster&quot;.
由于奶奶是老花眼，所以时常认错人。
Yóuyú nǎinai shì lǎohuāyǎn,suǒyǐ shícháng rèncuò rén.
Grandma has presbyopia, so she often mistakes someone for another.
我们给去世的奶奶烧了些冥币，可她真的能够收到吗？
Wǒmen gěi qùshì de nǎinai shāo le xiē míngbì，kě tā zhēn de nénggòu shōudào ma？
We burned some mock coins for our dead grandma, but can she really get them?
你年纪轻轻的，怎么说话比老奶奶还磨叨？
Nǐ niánjì qīngqīng de，zěnme shuōhuà bǐ lǎonǎinai hái mòdāo？
Being so young, how can you be as nagging as an old woman?
奶奶会用木香花瓣做点心，那点心的味道都带着花香！
Nǎinai huì yòng mùxiānghuābàn zuò diǎnxīn，nà diǎnxīn de wèidào dōu dài zhe huāxiāng！
Grandma can make snacks with banksia rose petals, which smells and tastes as fragrant as the flower.
她不喜欢那种奶腥味，所以她几乎从不喝牛奶。
Tā bùxǐhuan nàzhǒng nǎixīngwèi，suǒyǐ tā jīhū cóng bùhē niúnǎi。
She doesn’t like the fishy smell of milk, so she rarely ever drinks milk.
她很喜欢吃各类奶制品，尤其喜欢奶酪。
Tā hěnxǐhuan chī gè lèi nǎizhìpǐn，yóuqí xǐhuan nǎilào。
She is fond of different kinds of milk products, especially cheese.
自从有了小囡囡，老刘两口子就成了爷爷和奶奶了。
Zìcóng yǒu le xiǎonānnān，lǎo Liú liǎng kǒuzi jiù chéng le yéye hé nǎinai le。
Since the baby was born, Laoliu and his wife have become grandparents.
每天天快黑时奶奶就要念道：小明该放学回来了。
Měitiān tiān kuàihēi shí nǎinai jiùyào niàndào：Xiǎo Míng gāi fàngxué huílái le。
When it\'s getting dark, grandmother always says that Xiao Ming should be back from school soon.
她从小就跟奶奶学会了女红刺绣。
Tā cóng xiǎo jiù gēn nǎinai xuéhuì le nǚhóng cìxiù。
She has learned needlework and embroidery from her grandmother since she was a child.
奶奶曾经是这所女校的第一届学员。
Nǎinai céngjīng shì zhè suǒ nǚxiào de dìyī jiè xuéyuán。
My grandmother was a student in the first year of this women\'s university.
小时候在奶奶家的暖炕上睡觉，那感觉就是暖和！
Xiǎoshíhou zài nǎinai jiā de nuǎnkàng shàng shuìjiào，nà gǎnjué jiùshì nuǎnhé！
When I slept on the heated kang in my grandmother\'s family in my childhood, I felt warm at heart.
奶奶出嫁时家里太穷，根本没什么陪奁。
Nǎinai chūjià shí jiā lǐ tài qióng，gēnběn méi shénme péilián。
My grandma\'s family was poor at the time she got married, so she had only a small dowry.
她身上的这块佩玉是奶奶送给她的。
Tā shēnshàng de zhèkuài pèiyù shì nǎinai sònggěi tā de。
The jade pendant she wears was given by her grandma.
奶奶怕宝贝孙子着凉，亲自给他缝了个厚实的屁帘儿。
Nǎinai pà bǎobèi sūnzi zháoliáng，qīnzì gěi tā féng le gè hòushí de pìliánr。
The grandmother feared that her grandson would catch a cold, so she made a piece of thick cloth to tie to his waist with slit pants to cover his bottom.
妈妈和奶奶都喜欢听评剧。
Māma hé nǎinai dōu xǐhuan tīng píngjù。
Both my grandma and mom like listening to pingju.
奶奶可喜欢听评戏的《秦香莲》了。
Nǎinai kě xǐhuan tīng píngxì de《Qín Xiānglián》 le。
My grandma likes to listen to the Pingju &quot;Qin Xianglian&quot;.
骑楼是老奶奶们乘凉的最佳场所。
Qílóu shì lǎonǎinaimen chéngliáng de zuì jiā chǎngsuǒ。
Terraces are the best place for old women to enjoy the cool.
我跟着奶奶学会了上鞋。
Wǒ gēn zhe nǎinai xuéhuì le shàngxié。
I have learned to sole shoes from Grandma.
这个石臼是我们家的老物件了，奶奶年轻时就常用它舂米。
Zhège shíjiùshì wǒmen jiā de lǎowùjiàn le，nǎinai niánqīng shí jiù cháng yòng tā chōngmǐ。
This stone mortar is an antique in my family. My grandma used to pounding rice in it in her youth.
爸爸出生时是我的姨奶奶帮助收生的。
Bàba chūshēng shí shì wǒ de yínǎinai bāngzhù shōushēng de。
My grandmother\'s sister helped to deliver my father when he was born.
老奶奶们到了夏天都爱坐在树阴凉儿里拉家常。
Lǎonǎinaimen dào le xiàtiān dōu ài zuòzài shùyīnliángr lǐ lājiācháng。
Old women all like sitting in the tree shadows and gossiping on summer days.
看到奶奶的死亡证，我的心里无比的悲伤。
Kàndào nǎinai de sǐwángzhèng，wǒ de xīnlǐ wúbǐ de bēishāng。
On seeing grandmother\'s death certificate, I felt extremely sad at heart.
奶奶的牙都掉光了，所以只能吃软软的糖饴了。
Nǎinai de yá dōu diàoguāng le，suǒyǐ zhǐnéng chī ruǎnruǎn de tángyí le。
Grandma has no teeth now, so she can only eat very soft maltose.
奶奶是个慈祥的人，跟人说话语气很婉和。
Nǎinai shì gè cíxiáng de rén，gēn rén shuōhuà yǔqì hěnwǎnhé。
Grandma is a kind person, very mild when talking to others.
今年又是五谷丰登，奶奶脸上笑开了花。
Jīnnián yòushì wǔgǔfēngdēng，nǎinai liǎnshàng xiào kāi le huā。
This year we had a bumper grain harvest, which made my grandmother very happy.
奶奶今年90遐龄了，依然精神矍铄。
Nǎinai jīnnián jiǔshí xiálíng le，yīrán jīngshén juéshuò。
My grandmother is in her 90s, but she is still energetic.
奶奶正在安享晚年闲静的生活。
Nǎinai zhèngzài ānxiǎng wǎnnián xiánjìng de shēnghuó。
My grandmother is enjoying the quiet life of old age.
李奶奶今天被骗子骗去了仅有的五个现洋。
Lǐ nǎinai jīntiān bèi piànzi piànqù le jǐnyǒu de wǔ gè xiànyáng。
Granny Li was cheated today out of five silver dollars, which was all she had.
奶奶按照住持的要求，把香火贡奉在殿外的香坛里。
Nǎinai ànzhào zhùchí de yāoqiú，bǎ xiānghuǒ gòngfèng zài diàn wài de xiāngtán lǐ。
My grandmother puts the incense coil in the burner outside the hall at the request of the abbot.
奶奶总是爱怜地称她为“小东西”。
Nǎinai zǒngshì àilián de chēng tā wéi xiǎodōngxi。
Her grandmother always calls her &quot;tiny thing&quot; affectionately.
奶奶是个心善的人，无论对谁都很和气。
Nǎinai shì gè xīnshàn de rén，wúlùn duì shuí dōu hěn héqi。
My grandmother is a kind-hearted person who treats everyone very well.
奶奶喜欢向人忆述年轻时的美好时光。
Nǎinai xǐhuan xiàng rén yìshù niánqīng shí de měihǎo shíguāng。
My grandma likes to recall and talk about her happy days when she was young.
奶奶到街上用三十块钱换几张油票儿。
Nǎinai dào jiēshàng yòng sānshí kuài qián huàn jǐzhāng yóupiàor。
Grandma went to the street and bought several cooking oil coupons with 30 yuan.
我昨天把手袋落在奶奶家了，我有空儿就去取。
Wǒ zuótiān bǎ shǒudài làzài nǎinai jiā le，wǒ yǒukòngr jiù qù qǔ。
I left my bag at grandma\'s house yesterday; I will go and get it when I am free.
奶奶每年都会去岳庙祭祀。
Nǎinai měinián dōuhuì qù yuèmiào jìsì。
Every year, Grandma would go to the temple of Yuefei to offer sacrifices to the gods.
奶奶常从照片上咂摸爷爷年轻时的样子。
Nǎinai cháng cóng zhàopiàn shàng zāmō yéye niánqīngshí de yàngzi。
Grandma always looked at the picture and thought about what Grandpa looked like when he was young.
我多么想抚平奶奶脸上的皱折。
Wǒ duōme xiǎng fǔpíng nǎinai liǎnshàng de zhòuzhé。
How I wish that I could smooth the wrinkles on grandma\'s face.
奶奶最爱看原滋原味的花鼓戏了。
Nǎinai zuì àikàn yuánzī yuánwèi de huāgǔxì le。
Grandma likes authentic Huaguxi Drama the most.
她是由奶奶带大的。
Tā shì yóu nǎinai dàidàde。
She was brought up by her grandmother.
我每天给奶奶读报。
Wǒ měitiān gěi nǎinai dúbào。
I read the newspaper to my grandmother every day.
他是由奶奶扶养大的。
Tā shì yóu nǎinai fúyǎngdàde。
He was brought up by his grandmother.
奶奶身体很健康。
Nǎinai shēntǐ hěn jiànkāng.
Granny is very healthy.
她常常陪伴在奶奶身边。
Tā chángcháng péibàn zài nǎinai shēnbiān.
She often keeps her grandma company.
奶奶的头发太稀了。
Nǎinai de tóufa tài xī le。
Granny\'s hair is very thin.
去年，他的爷爷、奶奶相继去世了。
Qùnián，tā de yéye 、 nǎinai xiāngjì qùshìle。
Last year his grandfather and grandmother died one after the other.
奶奶年纪大了，行动不便。
Nǎinai niánjì dà le，xíngdòng búbiàn。
Grandma\'s getting old and finding it harder to move about.
挨家送牛奶
āijiā sòng niúnǎi 
go from house to house delivering milk
牛奶变酸了。
Niúnǎi biànsuān le。
The milk has gone sour.
吃奶的孩子
chīnǎi de háizi
a sucking child; suckling
使尽吃奶的力气
shǐjìn chīnǎi de lìqì 
strain every muscle
袋装奶粉
dàizhuāng nǎifěn 
milk powder in bags
牛奶发酸了。
Niúnǎi fāsuān le。
The milk has turned sour.
鲜牛奶不能放得太久。
Xiān niúnǎi bùnéng fàng de tài jiǔ。
Fresh milk won\'t keep long.
把剩下的牛奶灌到那个瓶里。
Bǎ shèngxià de niúnǎi guàndào nàgè pínglǐ。
Pour the rest of the milk into that bottle.
牛奶的乳糖含量
niúnǎi de rǔtánghánliàng
the lactose content of the milk
牛奶上面结了一层皮。
Niúnǎi shàngmiàn jié le yì céngpí。
A skin has formed on the milk.
奶孩子
nǎi háizi
suckle (or breast-feed) a baby
冲一杯奶粉
chōng yìbēi nǎifěn
make a cup of milk with milk powder
她奶水足不足？
Tā nǎishuǐ zú bu zú?
Has she got enough milk to nurse her baby?
两瓶牛奶
liǎnɡ pínɡ niúnǎi
two bottles of milk
瓶装奶粉
pínɡ zhuānɡ nǎifěn
bottled milk powder
牛奶一煮开就会潽出来。
Niúnǎi yì zhǔkāi jiùhuì pū chūlái。
Milk spills over as soon as it comes to boiling point.
我一时失慎，把一杯牛奶碰洒了。
Wǒ yìshí shīshèn，bǎ yì bēi niúnǎi pèng sǎ le。
I inadvertently upset a glass of milk.
什锦奶糖
shíjǐn nǎitáng
assorted toffees
吮奶
shǔn nǎi
suck milk
速溶奶粉
sùróng nǎifěn
instant milk powder
牛奶酸了。
Niúnǎi suān le。
The milk has turned sour.
这杯牛奶你喝了它。
Zhèbēi niúnǎi nǐ hē le tā。
Drink up this glass of milk.
牛奶里加点糖调一下。
Niúnǎi lǐ jiā diǎn tángtiáo yíxià。
Mix some sugar into the milk.
听装奶粉
tīnɡzhuānɡ nǎifěn 
tinned milk powder
一桶牛奶
yì tǒnɡ niúnǎi 
a pail of milk
吸奶
xīnǎi 
suck milk; nurse
婴儿在吸吮母亲的奶汁。
Yīng\'ér zài xīshǔn mǔqīn de nǎizhī。
The baby is nursing at its mother\'s breast.
鲜奶
xiānnǎi

xiāodú niúnǎi

一瓶牛奶
yì pínɡ niúnǎi

他把吃奶的劲儿都用出来了。
Tā bǎ chī nǎi de jìnr dōu yòngchūlái le。
He exerted his utmost strength.
奶制品
nǎizhìpǐn 
dairy products
鲜牛奶
xiānniúnǎi
fresh milk
为了按时完成这项工作，我连吃奶的劲都使出来了。
Wèile ànshí wánchéng zhè xiàng gōngzuò，wǒ lián chīnǎi de jìn dōu shǐ chūlái le。
I made every effort to complete the task on time.
咖啡和牛奶一起冲沏味道更好。
Kāfēi hé niúnǎi yìqǐ chōngqī wèidào gènghǎo。
Mix coffee and milk together, and it will taste better.
这些豆粉可以加工成豆奶进行出售。
Zhèxiē dòufěn kěyǐ jiāgōng chéng dòunǎi jìnxíng chūshòu。
The bean powder can be processed into soy-bean milk and then sold.
豆奶拥有很高的营养价值，我们天天喝。
Dòunǎi yōngyǒu hěn gāo de yíngyǎng jiàzhí，wǒmen tiāntiān hē。
Soya-bean milk is very nutritious, which is why we drink it every day.

The reports on the contaminated milk powder and meat are really appalling.
这个蛋糕店还兼营奶茶，冰淇淋，生意很好。

This kind of facial foam can clean and protect your skin.

对岸
duì\'àn
the opposite bank; the other side of the river

He swam across at one go.

héduì\'àn
the opposite side of the river

When high tide came in, he ran away quickly.

A tug boat can pull much larger ships.

The ship turtled over in the big storm.

The boats paraded endlessly, sounding their horns.

He saw another large steamer flying the Swedish flag further up the dock.

The ship went hard astern.
Lúnchuán měngliè xiànghòu tuì。
轮船猛烈向后退。

A tire on his car is flat, so he must find a place to pump it up.
我在五金店里买了几个轮箍。
Wǒ zài wǔjīndiàn lǐ mǎi le jǐgè lúngū。
I bought several tires in a hardware store.
他的汽车轮毂部位经过特别设计，显得很好看。
Tā de qìchē lúngǔ bùwèi jīngguò tèbié shèjì，xiǎnde hěnhǎokàn。
The hubs of his car is very good looking after being specially designed.
最近生病不能出海了，我只好向轮机长请了三天假。
Zuìjìn shēngbìng bùnéng chūhǎi le，wǒ zhǐhǎo xiàng lúnjīzhǎng qǐng le sāntiān jià。
I am ill and can not go out to sea, so I have to ask for three days off from the chief engineer.
这台机器的轮盘由于长时间的使用已经磨损得差不多了。
Zhètái jīqì de lúnpán yóuyú cháng shíjiān de shǐyòng yǐjing mósǔn de chàbuduō le。
After been used for a long time, the disk of the equipment is worn.
试验室里有一套轮系模型，是从国外高价买来的。
Shìyànshì lǐ yǒu yítào lúnxì móxíng，shì cóng guówài gāojià mǎilái de。
There is a set of gear train models in the laboratory, which was bought from abroad at a high price.
我打算明年开始在渔场换成轮养的方式养鱼。
Wǒ dǎsuàn míngnián kāishǐ zài yúchǎng huànchéng lúnyǎng de fāngshì yǎngyú。
I am going to start keeping various species of fish in rotation in the fishing ground.
农村都实行了轮栽，粮食产量有了显著提高。
Nóngcūn dōu shíxíng le lúnzāi，liángshí chǎnliàng yǒu le xiǎnzhù tígāo。
Crop rotations are exercised in the country, which increases the output of crops remarkably.
今天是我轮值，所以下班要晚点。
Jīntiān shì wǒ lúnzhí，suǒyǐ xiàbān yào wǎndiǎn。
I am on duty in shifts, so I will get off work late.

Vegetable rotation can prevent the loss of nutrients in the earth.
已经有几艘货轮锚泊在这个港湾里了。
Yǐjīng yǒu jǐ sōu huòlún máobó zài zhège gǎngwān lǐ le。
There are already several cargo vessels anchored in the harbour.
我们公司的货轮在这个港口有固定的锚位。

Our company\'s cargo vessels have fixed anchorages in the harbour.

According to city traffic regulations, farm tricycles are forbidden to drive on the main roads of urban districts.
我们的轮船将于后天11：00启碇。
Wǒmen de lúnchuán jiāng yú hòutiān shíyīdiǎn qǐdìng。
Our steamship will set sail on 11:00, the day after tomorrow.
这个车轮子的气门芯坏了，根本就打不进气去。

The valve tube of the tire has broken, I can\'t pump any gas into it at all.

这位歌唱家突然大声叫喊起来。

我叫她离开，结果她冲我大喊大叫。

Tā zài gōngzuò shí dàshēng hǎn chū tā de xìngmíng。
他在工作时大声喊出他的姓名。
I have to shout to make myself understood.
Wǒ bìxū dàshēng hǎn，bǎ wǒ de yìsi biǎodá qīngchu。
我必须大声喊，把我的意思表达清楚。
All the time the guards shouted at them to work faster.
Jiāngōngmen yìzhí duì tāmen dàshēng hǎn kuàidiǎn gōngzuò。
监工们一直对他们大声喊快点工作。
She shouted out loudly and broke the silence of the park.
她大声叫喊，打破了公园里的宁静。
They are chasing about after each other, shouting loudly.
Tāmen hùxiāng cháozhe duìfāng jíbēn ér qù，dàshēng jiàohǎnzhe。
他们互相朝着对方疾奔而去，大声叫喊着。
The singer was howling out her lines.
Zhè wèi gēchàngjiā tūrán dàshēng jiàohǎn qǐlái。
这位歌唱家突然大声叫喊起来。
The host was told to shout down on unruly guests in the audience.
Zhǔbànfāng bèi gàozhī yào dàshēng hūhǎn，shǐ guānzhòngxí zhōng bù shǒu guījǔ de kèrén jiǎng bú xiàqù。
主办方被告知要大声呼喊，使观众席中不守规矩的客人讲不下去。
There was a sharp crack behind her, then a shout.
Tā bèihòu tūrán chuánlái yì shēng jiānjiào，ránhòu shì dàshēng de hūhǎn。
她背后突然传来一声尖叫，然后是大声的呼喊。
It\'s rare to hear an audience screaming with laughter.
Hěnshǎo tīngdào guānzhòng dàshēng huānxiào hǎnjiào。
很少听到观众大声欢笑喊叫。
With a shout and a song they marched up to the gates.
Tāmen hǎnchàngzhe xíngjìn dào dàménkǒu。
他们喊唱着行进到大门口。
He gulped for help after choking on a big piece of meat.
Zài bèi yí dàkuài ròu yēzhù zhīhòu，tā chuǎnzheqì hǎn jiùmìng。
在被一大块肉噎住之后，他喘着气喊救命。
Charlotte is given a piggy bank by her aunt, who also puts in a coin to start her savings.
Xiàluòtè de yímā sòng gěi tā yí gè zhū xíng chǔxùguàn，bìng hái zài chǔxùguàn zhōng fàngrù yì méi yìngbì yǐ zuòwéi Xiàluòtè chǔ fàng qián de kāishǐ。
夏洛特的姨妈送给她一个猪形储蓄罐，并还在储蓄罐中放入一枚硬币以作为夏洛特储放钱的开始。
The barn spider was made famous in E. B. White\'s book\'Charlotte\'s Web\'.
E·B·Huáitè zài qí zuòpǐn《xià luò tè de wǎng》zhōng bǎ gǔcāng zhīzhū xiě de fēicháng chūmíng。
E·B·怀特在其作品《夏洛特的网》中把谷仓蜘蛛写得非常出名。
They shall all at last be gathered to Shiloh，their glorious Redeemer.
Tāmen zuìhòu dōu xiàng Xiàtèluò jùlǒng，xiàng tāmen róngyào de jiùshìzhǔ jùlǒng。
他们最后都向夏特洛聚拢，向他们荣耀的救世主聚拢。
one of Sherlock Holmes\'s most famous cases
夏洛克·福尔摩斯最出名的案件之一
Sherlock Holmes derived his theories from logic.
夏洛克·福尔摩斯是根据逻辑进行推论的。
The Shakespearean shylock is of dubious value in the modern world.

今年冬天，我妻子莉萨说她有个机会和一些同事到洛杉矶进行一周商务旅行。

他们本来是想在洛杉矶港登陆的，因为那里是美国国际贸易及商务的主要门户。

Tā shìtú bǎ zìjǐ zài Méngtèkǎluò de dǔběn dōu shūdiào。

Palomar\'s fans are legion.
Pàluòmǎ de àihàozhě fēicháng duō。
帕洛马的爱好者非常多。
This software is supposed to be a defense against Trojan horses, worms, and other types of viruses.
Zhège ruǎnjiàn shì yònglái duìkàng tèluòyī mùmǎ，rúchóng bìngdú hé qítā zhǒnglèi de bìngdú de。
这个软件是用来对抗特洛伊木马，蠕虫病毒和其他种类的病毒的。
When he downloaded the free game it turned out to be a trojan horse.

Běn tiáoyuē zài qiānzì hòu lìjí shēngxiào。
This treaty shall come into force upon signature.
中美两国就双方贸易问题签订了协约。
Zhōngměi liǎngguó jiù shuāngfāng màoyì wèntí qiāndìng le xiéyuē。
China and the U.S. government signed an agreement concerning bilateral trade.
两国在对等的基础上签定了条约。
Liǎngguó zài duìděngde jīchǔshàng qiāndìngle tiáoyuē。
The two countries signed the agreement on an equal basis.
政府将与各酋长国签订贸易合约，并增加进出口份额。
Zhèngfǔ jiāng yǔ gè qiúzhǎngguó qiāndìng màoyì héyuē，bìng zēngjiā jìnchūkǒu fèné。
The government will sign trading contracts with every emirate, and increase its imports and exports quotas too.
我又续签了三年合约，觉得很幸运。
Wǒ yòu xùqiān le sān nián héyuē，juédé hěn xìngyùn。
I feel lucky to renew the contract for three more years.
中国签署了《禁止核实验条约》。
Zhōngguó qiānshǔ le《Jìnzhǐhéshíyàntiáoyuē》。
China signed the Nuclear Test Ban Treaty.
慑于他的势力，我最终签署了这个不平等合约。
Shè yú tā de shìlì，wǒ zuì zhōng qiānshǔ le zhège bùpíngděng héyuē。
I finally signed this unequal contract due to fear of his power.
我下半年准备去纽约，现在正在办理签证。
Wǒ xiàbànnián zhǔnbèi qù Niǔyuē，xiànzài zhèngzài bànlǐ qiānzhèng。
I plan to go to New York next year, and I am now trying to get my visa.
历史上我国曾被迫签订了太多屈节辱国的条约。
Lìshǐshàng wǒguó céng bèipò qiāndìng le tài duō qūjié rǔguó de tiáoyuē。
In  history, China has been forced to sign too many humiliating treaties.
他被迫在红契上签了字，接受了所有的不公平条约。
Tā bèipò zài hóngqì shàng qiān le zì，jiēshòu le suǒyǒu de bùgōngpíng tiáoyuē。
He was forced to sign on the title deed, and accepted all the unjust treaties.
签约双方一定要各负其责。
力促早日签约。
买卖双方正在签约

她请这个电影明星在本子上签了个名。

大家越是求他帮忙，他就越是拿乔，太不厚道了。
Dàjiā yuè shì qiú tā bāngmáng，tā jiù yuè shì náqiáo，tài bú hòudào le。
