他一向厚道，根本不是会惹是非的人。
Tā yí xiàng hòudào，gēnběn búshì huì rě shìfēi de rén。
He is always honest and kind, he will not stir up trouble.
这杯酒味道纯厚，肯定是家藏的陈酿。

He is an honest person who speaks nice words about his friends.

他的嗓音特别洪厚，非常适合唱黑头。

他是这家公司的大恩人，所以受到厚遇。

He is a great benefactor to this company, thus receives favourable treatment.
他一到公司就被给予厚遇。

这人做了错事还理直气壮地说昏话，脸皮也太厚了！

这件机织的毛衣摸起来就很厚实，一定很暖和。

Zhège jíjiāng dǎobì de qǐyè hé jīngjì xiónghòu de dà gōngsī jiāohuān，chénggōng de wǎnjiù le zìjǐ。
The company on the verge of bankruptcy saved itself by building a good relationship with a large prosperous company.
他在巴结皇帝的近侍，真是厚颜无耻。
Tā zài bājie huángdì de jìnshì，zhēnshì hòuyán wúchǐ。
That creature butters up the emperor\'s close servant-of all the nerve!
这本书真是句句都是警世言，哲学意味浓厚。

This book is full of epigrams and is very philosophical.
他不知天高地厚口出狂言，一定会吃亏的。
Tā bùzhī tiāngāo dìhòu kǒuchū kuángyán，yídìng huì chīkuī de。
He will suffer from boasting and having no idea of his limitations.
这次降温来得突然，厚衣服都还没有准备呢！
Zhècì jiàngwēn lái de tūrán，hòu yīfu dōu hái méiyǒu zhǔnbèi ne！
The temperature dropped suddenly, and we hadn\'t prepared warm clothes.
这碗面的汤汁是用老汤调制的，味道鲜美醇厚。
Zhè wǎn miàn de tāngzhī shì yòng lǎotāng tiáozhì de，wèidào xiānměi chúnhòu。
The soup in this bowl of noodles is made of bree. It tastes thick and delicious.
他脸厚不害臊，你随便骂。
Tā liǎnhòu bú hàisào，nǐ suíbiàn mà。
He is thick-skinned, and unabashed to whatever you may say.
大家越是求他帮忙，他就越是拿乔，太不厚道了。
Dàjiā yuè shì qiú tā bāngmáng，tā jiù yuè shì náqiáo，tài bú hòudào le。
The more we ask him for favors, the more pretentious he becomes. He is not honest and generous.
奶奶怕宝贝孙子着凉，亲自给他缝了个厚实的屁帘儿。
Nǎinai pà bǎobèi sūnzi zháoliáng，qīnzì gěi tā féng le gè hòushí de pìliánr。
The grandmother feared that her grandson would catch a cold, so she made a piece of thick cloth to tie to his waist with slit pants to cover his bottom.
他一向厚道，根本不是会惹是非的人。
Tā yí xiàng hòudào，gēnběn búshì huì rě shìfēi de rén。
He is always honest and kind, he will not stir up trouble.
床上的褥垫很厚，躺上去很舒服。
Chuángshàng de rùdiàn hěnhòu，tǎng shàngqù hěn shūfu。
The bed has a thick mattress, so it is comfortable to sleep on.
他们兄弟之间有着浓厚的手足之情。
Tāmen xiōngdì zhījiān yǒu zhe nónghòu de shǒuzú zhī qíng。
There is deep fraternity between the brothers.
有雄厚的经济实力托底，我就可以放手一搏了。
Yǒu xiónghòu de jīngjì shílì tuōdǐ，wǒ jiù kěyǐ fàngshǒu yìbó le。
With such a strong economic foundation, I can do whatever I want without further consideration.
外方的条件很优厚，但是我们也需要协商后再决定。
Wàifāng de tiáojiàn hěnyōuhòu，dànshì wǒmen yě xūyào xiéshāng hòu zài juédìng。
The foreign party offered very munificent terms, but we still have to negotiate before making our decision.

jiànkāng

Pornography has a bad influence on young people, and we have to ban it completely.

Júluò duì réntǐ jiànkāng fēicháng yǒuyì。
Tangerine pith is good for one\'s health.
看书的时候，为了眼睛健康，请保持正确的明视距离！

Environmental pollution is eroding people\'s health.
要想身体健康，就要多注意饮食营养配比。

菜里只能放些小味精，多了不利于身体健康。

not yet recovered (from illness); not yet restored to health
受健康状况的限制
shòu jiànkāngzhuàngkuàng de xiànzhì
be handicapped by one\'s poor health
吸烟影响健康。
Xīyān yǐngxiǎngjiànkāng。
Smoking affects health.
由于健康关系
yóuyú jiànkāngguānxì 
on health grounds
对健康有害
duì jiànkāngyǒuhài 
harmful (or detrimental) to one\'s health
祝你早日恢复健康。
Zhù nǐ zǎorì huīfù jiànkānɡ。
I hope you\'ll get well soon. or I wish you a speedy recovery.
增进健康
zēnɡjìn jiànkānɡ
improve one\'s health
祝你健康。
Zhù nǐ jiànkānɡ。 
I wish you the best of health.
健康
jiànkāng
health; physique
孩子们在父母和老师的培育下健康成长。
Háizimen zài fùmǔ hé lǎoshī de péiyù xià jiànkāng chéngzhǎng。
Nurtured and educated by their parents and teachers, the children are growing up healthy and strong.
那旱烟有什么好吧唧的，有害健康！
Nà hànyān yǒu shénme hǎo bājī de，yǒuhài jiànkāng！
Put that pipe down, it\'s bad for your health!
每天饮用适量的白水有益健康。
Měitiān yǐnyòng shìliàng de báishuǐ yǒuyì jiànkāng。
Drinking an appropriate amount of water every day is good for one\'s health.
给父母拜节，祝二老健康吉祥！
Gěi fùmǔ bàijié，zhù èrlǎo jiànkāng jíxiáng！
Happy New Year to you, mom and dad! I wish you a long and healthy life!
暴饮暴食对健康不利，也容易发胖啊。
Bàoyǐn bàoshí duì jiànkāng búlì，yě róngyì fāpàng a。
Binge-eating is bad for one\'s health. Besides, it will make you fat.
为了您的健康，还请少贪杯盏。
Wèile nín de jiànkāng，hái qǐng shǎotān bēizhǎn。
For the sake of your health, please don\'t drink too much wine.
祝您身体健康，长命百岁。
Zhù nín shēntǐjiànkāng，chángmìng bǎisuì。
May you have a long and healthy life.
营养持衡有利于身体健康。
Yíngyǎng chíhéng yǒulìyú shēntǐjiànkāng。
Balanced nutrition is good for our health.
张教授写了一本书《亚健康初探》，还很畅销。
Zhāng jiàoshòu xiě le yìběn shū《Yàjiànkāngchūtàn》，hái hěnchàngxiāo。
Professor Zhang wrote a book titled &quot;Pilot Study on Sub-health&quot;, which sold well.
妈妈经常给水壶除垢，说那样有利于身体健康。
Māma jīngcháng gěi shuǐhú chúgòu，shuō nàyàng yǒulìyú shēntǐjiànkāng。
Mother often removes bilge from our canteens, saying that it is good for our health.
储贷两旺是经济健康发展的重要表现。
Chǔdàiliǎngwàng shì jīngjì jiànkāng fāzhǎn de zhòngyào biǎoxiàn。
Increases in both the rate of savings, and bank loans is healthy for economic growth.
地方保护主义严重地阻碍了经济的健康发展。
Dìfāng bǎohùzhǔyì yánzhòng de zǔài le jīngjì de jiànkāng fāzhǎn。
Local protectionism is severely blocking healthy development of the economy
在此辞旧迎新的时候，我们恭祝新老顾客身体健康，财源广进。
Zài cǐ cíjiù yíngxīn de shíhou，wǒmen gōngzhù xīnlǎo gùkè shēntǐjiànkāng，cáiyuán guǎngjìn。
During this time of ringing out the old year and ringing in the new, we wish both our new customers and old customers good health and abundant wealth.
我们祝贺老师龟鹤延年，健康幸福！
Wǒmen zhùhè lǎoshī guīhè yánnián，jiànkāng xìngfú！
May our teacher have a long, healthy and happy life!
多吃海白菜对人的健康非常有益。
Duōchī hǎibáicài duì rén de jiànkāng fēicháng yǒuyì。
Eating sea lettuce frequently is very good for one\'s health.
医生建议她经常去泡海水浴，这对她的健康有益。
Yīshēng jiànyìtā jīngcháng qù pào hǎishuǐyù，zhè duì tā de jiànkāng yǒuyì。
The Doctor always suggests that she go sea-bathing, which is good for her health.
这个食品是用红曲着的色，既安全又健康。
Zhège shípǐn shì yòng hóngqǔ zháo de sè，jì ānquán yòu jiànkāng。
The food is dyed by Hongqu, it is both safe as well as healthy.
空腹不宜吃红薯，否则不利于肠胃健康。
Kōngfù bùyí chī hóngshǔ，fǒuzé búlìyú chángwèi jiànkāng。
It is not good to eat sweet potato in limosis, or it will be bad for the intestines and stomach.
花生酱是一种很健康的食物。
Huāshēngjiàng shì yìzhǒng hěnjiànkāng de shíwù。
Peanut butter is a very healthy food.
黄曲霉菌可能产生有毒的代谢物，从而危害人类身体健康。
Huángqǔméijūn kěnéng chǎnshēng yǒu dú de dàixièwù，cóngér wēihài rénlèi shēntǐjiànkāng。
Aflatoxin may produce poisonous metabolizing substances, and do harm to human\'s health.
荤食太多不利于身体健康。
Hūnshí tài duō búlìyú shēntǐjiànkāng。
Too much meat is not good for one\'s health.
多年的积郁，严重影响了她的健康。
Duōnián de jīyù，yánzhòng yǐngxiǎng le tā de jiànkāng。
Many years\' accumulated grief has seriously affected her health.
随着计算机及因特网的普及，一种被称作“计算机综合征”的现代新生病越来越危及人们的健康。
Suí zhe jìsuànjī jí yīntèwǎng de pǔjí，yìzhǒng bèi chēngzuò“jìsuànjī zōnghézhēng”de xiàndài xīnshēngbìng yuèláiyuè wēijí rénmen de jiànkāng。
With the popularization of computers and the internet, a modern illness called &quot;computer syndrome&quot; is more and more of a threat to people\'s health.
这些淫秽读物危害青少年身心健康，必须禁绝！
Zhèxiē yínhuì dúwù wēihài qīngshàonián shēnxīn jiànkāng，bìxū jìnjué！
Pornography has a bad influence on young people, and we have to ban it completely.
橘络对人体健康非常有益。
Júluò duì réntǐ jiànkāng fēicháng yǒuyì。
Tangerine pith is good for one\'s health.
看书的时候，为了眼睛健康，请保持正确的明视距离！
Kànshū de shíhou，wèi le yǎnjīng jiànkāng，qǐng bǎochí zhèngquè de míngshì jùlí！
When reading the book, we should keep at least a 25cm distance from the book in order to protect our eyes.
环境污染正在啮噬人类的健康。
Huánjìng wūrǎn zhèngzài nièshì rénlèi de jiànkāng。
Environmental pollution is eroding people\'s health.
要想身体健康，就要多注意饮食营养配比。
Yào xiǎng shēntǐjiànkāng，jiùyào duō zhùyì yǐnshí yíngyǎng pèibǐ。
Pay attention to the amount of nutrition in your food if you want to be healthy.
要想饮食健康，就要多注意合理配膳。
Yào xiǎng yǐnshí jiànkāng，jiùyào duō zhùyì hélǐ pèishàn。
You\'d better arrange different foods appropriately, if you want a healthy diet.
出于健康的考虑，他采用了环保的墙面漆。
Chūyú jiànkāng de kǎolǜ，tā cǎiyòng le huánbǎo de qiángmiànqī。
In view of health, he adopted the environmentally friendly wall lacquer.
渠水的污染给当地居民带来了健康危机。
Qúshuǐ de wūrǎn gěi dāngdì jūmín dàilái le jiànkāng wēijī。
The health of local people is in crisis because of canal pollution.
微循环系统对人体健康会产生重要的影响。
Wēixúnhuán xìtǒng duì réntǐ jiànkāng huì chǎnshēng zhòngyào de yǐngxiǎng。
The microcirculatory system has an important influence on our health.
做菜不要放太多味素，那东西对健康没有益处！
Zuò cài búyào fàng tài duō wèisù，nà dōngxi duì jiànkāng méiyǒu yìchù！
Do not add MSG when cooking the dishes, it is bad for your health.
人不能总吃细粮，吃点五谷杂粮也是有益健康的。
Rén bùnéng zǒng chī xìliáng，chī diǎn wǔgǔ záliáng yěshì yǒuyì jiànkāng de。
Men can not always eat flour and rice, it is good for health to eat some cereals.
空闲的时候到氧吧吸氧有利于身体健康。
Kòngxián de shíhou dào yǎngbā xīyǎng yǒulìyú shēntǐjiànkāng。
线麻是一种毒品，对人体健康极为有害。
Xiànmá shì yìzhǒng dúpǐn，duì réntǐ jiànkāng jíwéi yǒuhài。
Marijuana is a kind of drug which does great damage to the human body.
枵腹从公不仅有害健康，还会打消工作积极性。
Xiāofù cónggōng bùjǐn yǒuhài jiànkāng，hái huì dǎxiāo gōngzuò jījíxìng。
Handling official business on an empty stomach is bad for health and bad for work.
听说小胡桃有益身体健康，所以我们要经常吃。
Tīngshuō xiǎohútáo yǒuyì shēntǐjiànkāng，suǒyǐ wǒmen yào jīngcháng chī。
Walnuts are good for health, so we must eat them more often.
菜里只能放些小味精，多了不利于身体健康。
Cài lǐ zhǐnéng fàng xiē xiǎowèijīng，duō le búlìyú shēntǐjiànkāng。
Don\'t put too much monosodium glutamate in the dishes, as it is bad for your health.
新生儿健康检查十分重要。
Xīnshēngér jiànkāng jiǎnchá shífēn zhòngyào。
It is very important to carry out physical check-ups on new born babies.
常喝杏仁茶有益身体健康。
Cháng hē xìngrénchá yǒuyì shēntǐjiànkāng。
It is good for health to drink almond tea often.
具有性虐待嗜好的人心理肯定不健康。
Jùyǒu xìng nüèdài shìhào de rén xīnlǐ kěndìng bú jiànkāng。
People who indulge in sadism must be sick.
玄武神保佑你，出入平安，健康长寿。
Xuánwǔshén bǎoyòu nǐ，chūrù píngān，jiànkāng chángshòu。
You will be blessed with safety, good health and longevity by the god Xuanwu.
血细胞低是亚健康状态，你要注意点。
Xuèxìbāo dī shì yàjiànkāng zhuàngtài，nǐ yào zhùyì diǎn。
You\'d better take care because your level of blood cells is at an unhealthy level.
俗话说吃水果有益健康，因之，我们要多吃水果。
Súhuà shuō chī shuǐguǒ yǒuyì jiànkāng，yīnzhī，wǒmen yào duō chī shuǐguǒ。
As the saying goes, eating fruit is good for your health, so we need to eat more fruit.
老教授正在引例说明健康教育的重要性。
Lǎojiàoshòu zhèngzài yǐnlì shuōmíng jiànkāng jiàoyù de zhòngyàoxìng。
The old professor is illustrating the importance of health education.
长期营养过剩已成为影响现代人健康的隐性杀手。
Chángqī yíngyǎng guòshèng yǐ chéngwéi yǐngxiǎng xiàndàirén jiànkāng de yǐnxìng shāshǒu。
Long-term excessive nutrition has become an invisible killer for modern society.
吃点藏青果对你恢复健康有好处。
Chī diǎn zàngqīngguǒ duì nǐ huīfù jiànkāng yǒu hǎochu。
Eating myrobalans is better for your recovery.
别看他现在这么健康，他是个早产儿。
Biékàn tā xiànzài zhème jiànkāng，tā shì gè zǎochǎn\'ér。
Though he is very healthy now, he was delivered before his due date.
噪声污染严重影响人的身体健康。
Zàoshēng wūrǎn yánzhòng yǐngxiǎng rén de shēntǐjiànkāng。
Noise pollution has gravely affected people\'s health.
为了树木的健康成长，治虫是最主要的预防措施。
Wèile shùmù de jiànkāng chéngcháng，zhìchóng shì zuì zhǔyào de yùfáng cuòshī。
Wiping out insects is the main precautionary measure to keep trees growing healthily.
大气污染将直接威胁人类的健康。
Dàqì wūrǎn jiāng zhíjiē wēixié rénlèi de jiànkāng。
Air pollution will directly threaten people\'s health.
西洋参非常贵重，有益身体健康。
Xīyángsēn fēicháng guìzhòng，yǒuyì shēntǐjiànkāng。
American ginseng is very precious, and is good for one\'s health.
现在社会上都在提倡健康的生活方式。
Xiànzài shèhuì shàng dōu zài tíchàng jiànkāng de shēnghuófāngshì。
Nowadays, healthy life styles are being advocated in society.
食用当地时蔬对人体健康最有利。
Shíyòng dāngdì shíshū duì réntǐjiànkāng zuì yǒulì。
It is best for people\'s health to eat local vegetables.
吃了这药，保你很快恢复健康。
Chīle zhè yào，bǎo nǐ hěnkuài huīfùjiànkāng。
This medicine will ensure you a quick recovery.
我们不可忽视年轻人的心理健康。
Wǒmen bùkěhūshì niánqīngrénde xīnlǐjiànkāng。
We shouldn\'t overlook the mental health of young people.
早操有益于学生的身体健康。
Zǎocāo yǒuyìyú xuéshengde shēntǐjiànkāng。
Morning exercises are beneficial to students\' health.
吸烟对健康有害。
Xīyān duì jiànkāng yǒuhài。
Smoking is harmful to your health.
由于健康关系，他提前退休了。
Yóuyú jiànkāng guānxì，tā tíqiántuìxiū le。
He retired early for reasons of ill health.
为了健康，你需要忌烟。
Wèile jiànkāng，nǐ xūyào jìyān.
You should give up smoking for the sake of your health.
奶奶身体很健康。
Nǎinai shēntǐ hěn jiànkāng.
Granny is very healthy.
他已经恢复了健康。
Tā yǐjīng huīfùle jiànkāng.
He\'s already recovered his health.
她为母亲的健康而感到焦急。
Tā wèi mǔqīn de jiànkāng ér gǎndào jiāojí.
She\'s anxious about her mother\'s health.
身心健康
shēnxīnjiànkāng
physical and mental health

Zhìliáo hé duànliàn shuāngguǎnqíxià，tā hěnkuài jiù huì huīfù jiànkāng。
With medical treatment and exercise working in parallel, he will quickly recover.

Chōuyān wēihài jiànkāng。
Smoking damages your health.
为健康着想，他每天去跑步。
Wèi jiànkāng zhuóxiǎng，tā měitiān qù pǎobù。
He went jogging every day for the sake of his health.
药补和食补相结合对她恢复健康有好处。
Yàobǔ hé shíbǔ xiāng jiéhé duì tā huīfù jiànkāng yǒu hǎochù。
A combination of drug therapy and diet will help her recovery.
他以往身体不好，现在非常健康。

Health promotion is the process of enabling people to exert control over the determinants of health and thereby improve their health.
提高健康水平是一个使人们能够控制影响健康的决定因素，从而改善他们健康状况的过程。
She maintained wellness by proper diet, adequate exercise, and healthy habits.
通过合理的饮食， 充足的运动，以及健康的生活习惯，她的健康状况维持的很好。
Wellness for men sometimes may be different than wellness for women.
男人的健康有时候和女人的健康是不一样的。
Our job is to keep every part of us as healthy as possible, for the good of the whole person.
Wǒmen de gōngzuò shì bǎochí wǒmen měi bùfen dōu jìnkěnéng jiànkāng，yǐ yǒuyìyú zhěnggè rén de jiànkāng。
我们的工作是保持我们每部分都尽可能健康，以有益于整个人的健康。
The health of the person is directly tied in with the health of the planet.

个人健康直接和地球健康相联系。
I hope the people in control are of sound mind and body.

我希望压迫下的人们仍有健康的头脑和强健的身体。

她每天慢跑以保持健康的身体。
Mark cycled to school every morning to keep fit and to save money.
Mǎkè měi tiān zǎochén qíchē shàngxué，yǐ bǎochí jiànkāng hé shěngqián。
马克每天早晨骑车上学，以保持健康和省钱。
His daily run keeps him fit.
Měi tiān jiānchí pǎobù shǐ tā bǎochízhe jiànkāng de shēntǐ。
每天坚持跑步使他保持着健康的身体。
Regular exercise is recommended to keep good health.
建议有规律的进行锻炼，这样就可以保持身体健康。
to keep in (good) trim
保持身体健康
Veterinary vaccines are being used with increasing frequency in the United States to protect the health of animals.
在美国为了保护动物健康，兽医疫苗日益频繁地被广泛应用。
She enjoys working out at the gym to keep her trim figure.
Tā xǐhuan zài jiànshēnfáng duànliàn lái bǎochí miáotiao de shēncái。
她喜欢在健身房锻炼来保持苗条的身材。
Good health is everyone\'s business.
Bǎochí shēntǐ jiànkāng shì měi gè rén de shìyè。
保持身体健康是每个人的事业。
Exercising is an ideal way to keep your body in shape.
Yùndòng shì bǎochí shēntǐ jiànkāng de yì zhǒng lǐxiǎng fāngshì。
运动是保持身体健康的一种理想方式。
The physical exertion required by his work kept him fit.
Tā de gōngzuò suǒ yāoqiú de shēntǐ duànliàn shǐ tā bǎochízhe qiángjiàn de tǐgé。
他的工作所要求的身体锻炼使他保持着强健的体格。
Children have small appetites and need small, frequent meals to ensure they get all the nutrients needed for healthy growth and development.
孩子们的胃口很小，需要少吃多餐，这样才能保证他们吸收健康成长所需的所有营养。
I undertook to take you back to your father and mother some day，sound in wind and limb.
Wǒ bǎozhèng yǒuyìtiān huì ràng nǐ jiànzhuàng de huídào nǐ fùmǔ shēnbiān。
我保证有一天会让你健壮地回到你父母身边。
Our job is to keep every part of us as healthy as possible, for the good of the whole person.
Wǒmen de gōngzuò shì bǎochí wǒmen měi bùfen dōu jìnkěnéng jiànkāng，yǐ yǒuyìyú zhěnggè rén de jiànkāng。
我们的工作是保持我们每部分都尽可能健康，以有益于整个人的健康。
健康的人不要滥用保健品。
Jiànkāng de rén búyào lànyòng bǎojiànpǐn。
Healthy people shouldn\'t use health products too much.
健身俱乐部里有教练教会员科学使用健身器。
Jiànshēn jùlèbùlǐ yǒu jiàoliàn jiāo huìyuán kēxué shǐyòng jiànshēnqì。
There are coaches in sports clubs who teach others how to use body-building equipment.
健身球是多数老人首选的健身方式。
Jiànshēnqiú shì duōshù lǎorén shǒuxuǎn de jiànshēn fāngshì。
Playing with balls in their palms for health is the first choice for keeping fit of many aged people.
妇幼保健
fùyòu bǎojiàn 
maternal and child hygiene; mother and child care
笔力雄健
bǐlì xióngjiàn 
powerful strokes
这个舞蹈刚健清新，别具一格。
Zhège wǔdǎo gāngjiàn qīngxīn，biéjùyìgé。
There is something unique about the liveliness and vigour of the dance.
祝您健康长寿。
Zhù nín jiànkāng chángshòu。
I wish you good health and a long life.
关心年轻一代的健康成长
guānxīn niánqīng yí dài de jiànkāng chéngzhǎng 
take an active interest in the healthy growth of the younger generation
我真担心她的健康。
Wǒ zhēn dānxīn tā de jiànkāng。
I do worry about her health.
发育健全
fāyù jiànquán
physically well developed
吃得不好会妨害健康。
Chī de bùhǎo huì fánghài jiànkāng。
A poor diet is harmful to one\'s health.
妇幼保健站
fùyòu bǎojiànzhàn
health centre for women and children; maternity and child-care centre
刚健的舞姿
gāngjiàn de wǔzī
vigorous movements of a dancer

jiàn wèi

jiàn pí

jiànbùdēngshàngzhǔxítái

pīnɡtán jiànr

运动健将
yùndòngjiànjiàng
master of sports; master sportsman
足球健将
zúqiú jiànjiàng

健康状况
jiànkānɡ zhuànɡkuànɡ 
state of health; physical condition
人民的健康水平有了很大提高。
Rénmín de jiànkāngshuǐpíngyǒu le hěndà tígāo。
The general level of the people\'s health has markedly improved.
运动正在健康地发展。
Yùndòng zhèngzài jiànkāng de fāzhǎn。
The movement is developing healthily.
情况基本上是健康的。
Qíngkuàngjīběn shàngshì jiànkāng de。
The situation is basically sound.
健美的体操表演
jiànměi de tǐcāo biǎoyǎn
a vigorous and graceful performance of callisthenics
越来越多的人喜欢上了健美运动。
Yuè lái yuè duō de rén xǐhuan shàng le jiànměi yùndòng。
More and more people go in for body-building.
身心健全
shēnxīn jiànquán 
sound in mind and body
头脑健全的人
tóunǎo jiànquán de rén 
a person in his or her right mind
健全合理的规章制度
jiànquán hélǐ de guīzhāngzhìdù 
amplify necessary rules and regulations
她本人已年过七十，而她的父母还健在。
Tā běnrén yǐ nián guò qīshí，ér tā de fùmǔ hái jiànzài。
She is over seventy and her parents are still alive.
健壮的小伙子
jiànzhuàng de xiǎohuǒzi 
a robust young man
像马一样健壮
xiànɡ mǎ yíyànɡ jiànzhuànɡ 
as strong as a horse
我为她的健康感到焦虑。
Wǒ wèi tā de jiànkānggǎndào jiāolǜ。
I am anxious about her health.
矫健的步伐
jiǎojiàn de bùfá

敬祝身体健康。
Jìngzhù shēntǐjiànkāng。

她的健身操动作准确而灵巧。
Tā de jiànshēncāo dòngzuò zhǔnquè ér língqiǎo。
Her movements in callisthenics were precise and nimble.
迈着矫健的步伐
mài zhe jiǎojiàn de bùfá
walk with vigorous strides
改革还处在探索阶段，要摸着石头过河，使其健康发展。
Gǎigé hái chǔzài tànsuǒ jiēduàn，yào mō zhe shítou guò hé，shǐ qí jiànkāngfāzhǎn。
To ensure a healthy development of the reforms, we should be very cautious, for they are still at the exploratory stage.
起居有恒有助于身体健康。
Qǐjū yǒu héngyǒuzhùyú shēntǐjiànkāng。
To lead a regular life is conducive to good health.
这笔钱是专为保健事业用的。
Zhèbǐ qián shì zhuān wèi bǎojiàn shìyè yòng de。
This fund is earmarked for public health services.

tǐpò qiángjiàn

shēnxīn jiànkāng

Excessive drinking will undoubtedly affect one\'s health.
适度的体育活动有利于病人恢复健康。

sǔnhài jiànkāng

táifēng wěnjiàn

wèi le jiànkāngjièyān

mài zhe wěnjiàn de bùzi

Tā zhège rén hěn wěnjiàn。

shòu jiànkāngzhuàngkuàng de xiànzhì

duì jiànkāngyǒuhài

jiàn\'ér

健康
jiànkāng
health; physique
孩子们在父母和老师的培育下健康成长。
Háizimen zài fùmǔ hé lǎoshī de péiyù xià jiànkāng chéngzhǎng。
Nurtured and educated by their parents and teachers, the children are growing up healthy and strong.
那旱烟有什么好吧唧的，有害健康！
Nà hànyān yǒu shénme hǎo bājī de，yǒuhài jiànkāng！
Put that pipe down, it\'s bad for your health!
每天饮用适量的白水有益健康。
Měitiān yǐnyòng shìliàng de báishuǐ yǒuyì jiànkāng。
Drinking an appropriate amount of water every day is good for one\'s health.
给父母拜节，祝二老健康吉祥！
Gěi fùmǔ bàijié，zhù èrlǎo jiànkāng jíxiáng！
Happy New Year to you, mom and dad! I wish you a long and healthy life!
我爷爷每天都拿着保健球锻炼。
Wǒ yéye měitiān dōu ná zhe bǎojiànqiú duànliàn。
My grandfather exercises with his healthcare balls every day.
他是老病号了，家里备有保健箱。
Tā shì lǎobìnghào le，jiā lǐ bèiyǒu bǎojiànxiāng。
He is always suffering from one ailment or another, so he has a medicine box at home.
社区的保健站给社区居民看病带来了很大的方便。
Shèqū de bǎojiànzhàn gěi shèqū jūmín kànbìng dàilái le hěndà de fāngbiàn。
The health care stations in local communities make it convenient for the residents to go to see a doctor.
暴饮暴食对健康不利，也容易发胖啊。
Bàoyǐn bàoshí duì jiànkāng búlì，yě róngyì fāpàng a。
Binge-eating is bad for one\'s health. Besides, it will make you fat.
为了您的健康，还请少贪杯盏。
Wèile nín de jiànkāng，hái qǐng shǎotān bēizhǎn。
For the sake of your health, please don\'t drink too much wine.
茶籽油也可以制成保健品。
Cházǐyóu yě kěyǐ zhìchéng bǎojiànpǐn。
Tea-seed oil can also be made into health care products.
祝您身体健康，长命百岁。
Zhù nín shēntǐjiànkāng，chángmìng bǎisuì。
May you have a long and healthy life.
营养持衡有利于身体健康。
Yíngyǎng chíhéng yǒulìyú shēntǐjiànkāng。
Balanced nutrition is good for our health.
张教授写了一本书《亚健康初探》，还很畅销。
Zhāng jiàoshòu xiě le yìběn shū《Yàjiànkāngchūtàn》，hái hěnchàngxiāo。
Professor Zhang wrote a book titled &quot;Pilot Study on Sub-health&quot;, which sold well.
妈妈经常给水壶除垢，说那样有利于身体健康。
Māma jīngcháng gěi shuǐhú chúgòu，shuō nàyàng yǒulìyú shēntǐjiànkāng。
Mother often removes bilge from our canteens, saying that it is good for our health.
储贷两旺是经济健康发展的重要表现。
Chǔdàiliǎngwàng shì jīngjì jiànkāng fāzhǎn de zhòngyào biǎoxiàn。
Increases in both the rate of savings, and bank loans is healthy for economic growth.
这幅画中的人物粗朴健壮。
Zhèfúhuà zhōng de rénwù cūpǔ jiànzhuàng。
The figure in this painting is simple and sturdy.
打太极拳是很好的健身运动。
Dǎ tàijíquán shì hěnhǎo de jiànshēn yùndòng。
Shadow box is a good way to keep fit.
我们必须健全大病保险制度。
Wǒmen bìxū jiànquán dàbìng bǎoxiǎn zhìdù。
We must perfect the insurance system for serious illnesses.
做导引运动具有健身功效。
Zuò dǎoyǐn yùndòng jùyǒu jiànshēn gōngxiào。
Guide exercises can build our body.
地方保护主义严重地阻碍了经济的健康发展。
Dìfāng bǎohùzhǔyì yánzhòng de zǔài le jīngjì de jiànkāng fāzhǎn。
Local protectionism is severely blocking healthy development of the economy
据中医科学研究，经常按摩耳穴可以健身。
Jù zhōng yī kēxué yánjiū，jīngcháng ànmó ěrxué kěyǐ jiànshēn。
According to Chinese medicine, massaging ear acupuncture points is good for one\'s health.
经常慢跑，可以防病健身。
Jīngcháng mànpǎo，kěyǐ fángbìng jiànshēn。
Jogging regularly helps to fortify the body against disease.
刘翔飞身跨栏的动作利落矫健。
Liú Xiáng fēishēn kuàlán de dòngzuò lìluo jiǎojiàn。
Liu Xiang leaps swiftly over the hurdles.
他的腓肠肌结实而又健美。
Tā de féichángjī jiēshi ér yòu jiànměi。
He has got strong and healthy gastrocnemius muscles.
我常利用工余时间游泳和健身。
Wǒ cháng lìyòng gōngyú shíjiān yóuyǒng hé jiànshēn。
I always spend my time on swimming and keeping fit.
在此辞旧迎新的时候，我们恭祝新老顾客身体健康，财源广进。
Zài cǐ cíjiù yíngxīn de shíhou，wǒmen gōngzhù xīnlǎo gùkè shēntǐjiànkāng，cáiyuán guǎngjìn。
During this time of ringing out the old year and ringing in the new, we wish both our new customers and old customers good health and abundant wealth.
姑姥姥已经85岁了，但身体依然健朗。
Gūlǎolao yǐjing bāshíwǔsuì le，dàn shēntǐ yīrán jiànlǎng。
Although my great aunt is 85 years old, she is still in good health.
姑太太已经90多岁了，看起来还是那样健朗。
Gūtàitai yǐjing jiǔshíduōsuì le，kànqǐlái háishì nàyàng jiànlǎng。
My father\'s great aunt is already more than 90 years old, but still looks pretty healthy.
我们祝贺老师龟鹤延年，健康幸福！
Wǒmen zhùhè lǎoshī guīhè yánnián，jiànkāng xìngfú！
May our teacher have a long, healthy and happy life!
多吃海白菜对人的健康非常有益。
Duōchī hǎibáicài duì rén de jiànkāng fēicháng yǒuyì。
Eating sea lettuce frequently is very good for one\'s health.
医生建议她经常去泡海水浴，这对她的健康有益。
Yīshēng jiànyìtā jīngcháng qù pào hǎishuǐyù，zhè duì tā de jiànkāng yǒuyì。
The Doctor always suggests that she go sea-bathing, which is good for her health.
这个食品是用红曲着的色，既安全又健康。
Zhège shípǐn shì yòng hóngqǔ zháo de sè，jì ānquán yòu jiànkāng。
The food is dyed by Hongqu, it is both safe as well as healthy.
空腹不宜吃红薯，否则不利于肠胃健康。
Kōngfù bùyí chī hóngshǔ，fǒuzé búlìyú chángwèi jiànkāng。
It is not good to eat sweet potato in limosis, or it will be bad for the intestines and stomach.
他走起路来虎步临风，矫健稳重。
Tā zǒuqǐlùlái hǔbùlínfēng，jiǎojiàn wěnzhòng。
He walked in powerful and vigorous steps, looking brisk and sober.
他因身体高大健壮，被学校选入了护校队。
Tā yīn shēntǐ gāodà jiànzhuàng，bèi xuéxiào xuǎnrù le hùxiàoduì。
Because he was tall and hale, he was chosen to join the School Guard Team.
花生酱是一种很健康的食物。
Huāshēngjiàng shì yìzhǒng hěnjiànkāng de shíwù。
Peanut butter is a very healthy food.
这个农庄中养了许多步伐矫健的黄骠马。
Zhège nóngzhuāng zhōng yǎng le xǔduō bùfá jiǎojiàn de huángbiāomǎ。
The farm has raised a number of strong, and vigorous white-spotted- yellow horses.
黄曲霉菌可能产生有毒的代谢物，从而危害人类身体健康。
Huángqǔméijūn kěnéng chǎnshēng yǒu dú de dàixièwù，cóngér wēihài rénlèi shēntǐjiànkāng。
Aflatoxin may produce poisonous metabolizing substances, and do harm to human\'s health.
他认为喝黄汤有一定的保健作用。
Tā rènwéi hē huángtāng yǒu yídìng de bǎojiàn zuòyòng。
He thought that drinking yellow wine was good for his health.
此物质的主要成分是挥发油，具有很强的保健功效。
Cǐ wùzhì de zhǔyào chéngfèn shì huīfāyóu，jùyǒu hěnqiáng de bǎojiàn gōngxiào。
This is made from naphtha which is very good for health.
他生性会水，长大后一定是个游泳健将。
Tā shēngxìng huìshuǐ，zhǎngdà hòu yídìng shì gè yóuyǒng jiànjiàng。
He could swim ever since he was born, and will definitely become a good swimmer in the future.
荤食太多不利于身体健康。
Hūnshí tài duō búlìyú shēntǐjiànkāng。
Too much meat is not good for one\'s health.
多年的积郁，严重影响了她的健康。
Duōnián de jīyù，yánzhòng yǐngxiǎng le tā de jiànkāng。
Many years\' accumulated grief has seriously affected her health.
随着计算机及因特网的普及，一种被称作“计算机综合征”的现代新生病越来越危及人们的健康。
Suí zhe jìsuànjī jí yīntèwǎng de pǔjí，yìzhǒng bèi chēngzuò“jìsuànjī zōnghézhēng”de xiàndài xīnshēngbìng yuèláiyuè wēijí rénmen de jiànkāng。
With the popularization of computers and the internet, a modern illness called &quot;computer syndrome&quot; is more and more of a threat to people\'s health.
社区的健身房建置相当完备。
Shèqū de jiànshēnfáng jiànzhì xiāngdāng wánbèi。
This community gym is well-equipped.
身体一向健朗的爷爷突然生病了，让家人很担心。
Shēntǐ yí xiàng jiànlǎng de yéye tūrán shēngbìng le，ràng jiārén hěndānxīn。
Grandpa, who has always been in good condition, was suddenly taken ill, worrying the whole family.
商店里出售着各式各样的健美裤。
Shāngdiàn lǐ chūshòu zhe gè shì gè yàng de jiànměikù。
The shop sells all kinds of form-fitting pants.
为了保持体形优美，她多年来一直坚持做健身操。
Wèile bǎochí tǐxíng yōuměi，tā duōniánlái yìzhí jiānchí zuò jiànshēncāo。
In order to keep an elegant figure, she has been doing body-shaping exercises for many years.
这些淫秽读物危害青少年身心健康，必须禁绝！
Zhèxiē yínhuì dúwù wēihài qīngshàonián shēnxīn jiànkāng，bìxū jìnjué！
Pornography has a bad influence on young people, and we have to ban it completely.
橘络对人体健康非常有益。
Júluò duì réntǐ jiànkāng fēicháng yǒuyì。
Tangerine pith is good for one\'s health.
这种保健品是以麦饭石为原料制成的。
Zhèzhǒng bǎojiànpǐn shì yǐ màifànshí wéi yuánliào zhìchéng de。
The health products are made from medicinal stones.
看书的时候，为了眼睛健康，请保持正确的明视距离！
Kànshū de shíhou，wèi le yǎnjīng jiànkāng，qǐng bǎochí zhèngquè de míngshì jùlí！
When reading the book, we should keep at least a 25cm distance from the book in order to protect our eyes.
环境污染正在啮噬人类的健康。
Huánjìng wūrǎn zhèngzài nièshì rénlèi de jiànkāng。
Environmental pollution is eroding people\'s health.
要想身体健康，就要多注意饮食营养配比。
Yào xiǎng shēntǐjiànkāng，jiùyào duō zhùyì yǐnshí yíngyǎng pèibǐ。
Pay attention to the amount of nutrition in your food if you want to be healthy.
要想饮食健康，就要多注意合理配膳。
Yào xiǎng yǐnshí jiànkāng，jiùyào duō zhùyì hélǐ pèishàn。
You\'d better arrange different foods appropriately, if you want a healthy diet.
出于健康的考虑，他采用了环保的墙面漆。
Chūyú jiànkāng de kǎolǜ，tā cǎiyòng le huánbǎo de qiángmiànqī。
In view of health, he adopted the environmentally friendly wall lacquer.
渠水的污染给当地居民带来了健康危机。
Qúshuǐ de wūrǎn gěi dāngdì jūmín dàilái le jiànkāng wēijī。
The health of local people is in crisis because of canal pollution.

As a sport that helps strengthen the body, taekwando has become very popular with students.
健身教练请大家保持这个体位两分钟。
Jiànshēn jiàoliàn qǐng dàjiā bǎochí zhège tǐwèi liǎng fēn zhōng。
The coach asked all of us to maintain the body position for two minutes.
微循环系统对人体健康会产生重要的影响。
Wēixúnhuán xìtǒng duì réntǐ jiànkāng huì chǎnshēng zhòngyào de yǐngxiǎng。
The microcirculatory system has an important influence on our health.
做菜不要放太多味素，那东西对健康没有益处！
Zuò cài búyào fàng tài duō wèisù，nà dōngxi duì jiànkāng méiyǒu yìchù！
Do not add MSG when cooking the dishes, it is bad for your health.
人不能总吃细粮，吃点五谷杂粮也是有益健康的。
Rén bùnéng zǒng chī xìliáng，chī diǎn wǔgǔ záliáng yěshì yǒuyì jiànkāng de。
Men can not always eat flour and rice, it is good for health to eat some cereals.
空闲的时候到氧吧吸氧有利于身体健康。
Kòngxián de shíhou dào yǎngbā xīyǎng yǒulìyú shēntǐjiànkāng。
小刚的弟弟从小习武，所以体格强健。
Xiǎo Gāng de dìdi cóng xiǎo xíwǔ，suǒyǐ tǐgé qiángjiàn。
Xiao Gang\'s brother starts physical training when he was little, that\'s why he is so strong.
线麻是一种毒品，对人体健康极为有害。
Xiànmá shì yìzhǒng dúpǐn，duì réntǐ jiànkāng jíwéi yǒuhài。
Marijuana is a kind of drug which does great damage to the human body.
枵腹从公不仅有害健康，还会打消工作积极性。
Xiāofù cónggōng bùjǐn yǒuhài jiànkāng，hái huì dǎxiāo gōngzuò jījíxìng。
Handling official business on an empty stomach is bad for health and bad for work.
这位穿便服的警察身手骁健。
Zhèwèi chuān biànfú de jǐngchá shēnshǒu xiāojiàn。
The police officer in his casual clothes is very brave.
听说小胡桃有益身体健康，所以我们要经常吃。
Tīngshuō xiǎohútáo yǒuyì shēntǐjiànkāng，suǒyǐ wǒmen yào jīngcháng chī。
Walnuts are good for health, so we must eat them more often.
菜里只能放些小味精，多了不利于身体健康。

It is very important to carry out physical check-ups on new born babies.

具有性虐待嗜好的人心理肯定不健康。

People who indulge in sadism must be sick.

Xuánwǔshén bǎoyòu nǐ，chūrù píngān，jiànkāng chángshòu。

血细胞低是亚健康状态，你要注意点。

俗话说吃水果有益健康，因之，我们要多吃水果。

As the saying goes, eating fruit is good for your health, so we need to eat more fruit.
老教授正在引例说明健康教育的重要性。

The old professor is illustrating the importance of health education.
长期营养过剩已成为影响现代人健康的隐性杀手。

Eating myrobalans is better for your recovery.

Zàngxiāng jùyǒu bǎojiàn zuòyòng。

别看他现在这么健康，他是个早产儿。

Health promotion is the process of enabling people to exert control over the determinants of health and thereby improve their health.
提高健康水平是一个使人们能够控制影响健康的决定因素，从而改善他们健康状况的过程。
She maintained wellness by proper diet, adequate exercise, and healthy habits.
通过合理的饮食， 充足的运动，以及健康的生活习惯，她的健康状况维持的很好。

我们的工作是保持我们每部分都尽可能健康，以有益于整个人的健康。

Tā yì jiǎngwán，dàjiā bùyuē\'értóngdōu gǔqi zhǎnglái。
Spontaneous applause broke out as soon as she finished speaking.
孩子们劈劈啪啪地鼓起掌来。
Háizimen pīpipāpā de gǔqǐ zhǎnglái。
The children began to clap their hands.
抃舞(鼓掌跳舞)。
鼓掌
鼓掌。
热烈鼓掌
鼓掌欢迎
他一上台，老观众就呱唧呱唧地直鼓掌
heavy applause
热烈的鼓掌
a speech punctuated with applause
不时被鼓掌声打断的讲话
to receive a big hand for one\'s performance
演出受到热烈鼓掌
When the band arrived on the scene everybody started screaming and clapping the hands.
乐队一出现在舞台上，大家就开始尖叫鼓掌了。
He was on for hours, segueing from one song to the next without so much as a pause for applause.
他已经唱了几个小时了，一首接一首，甚至连给人鼓掌的间歇都没有。
She was on, and all the audience was clapping.
她一上场，所有的观众都热烈鼓掌。
After her great performance, the entire audience clapped enthusiastically for ten minutes.
她的精彩表演结束后，全体观众热烈鼓掌长达十分钟之久。
The spectators will clap if he makes this birdie putt.
如果他能击球入洞，观众会鼓掌致意的。
a standing ovation
起立长时间鼓掌
When the seventy-year-old famous director walked onto the Oscar stage, everybody arose and applauded.
当这个七十岁的著名导演走上奥斯卡颁奖台时，所有人都起立鼓掌。
Jim gave the vote of thanks on behalf of the fellowship.
Zài tuántǐ de lìyì fāngmiàn，jí mǔ gǔzhǎng biǎoshì gǎnxiè。
在团体的利益方面，吉姆鼓掌表示感谢。
The crowd applauded their approval after the show had ended.
Yǎnchū jiéshù hòu rénqún gǔzhǎng chēngzàn。
演出结束后人群鼓掌称赞。
The crowd applauded to the echo.
Rénmen rèliè gǔzhǎng，zhǎngshēng jīngjiǔbùshuāi。
人们热烈鼓掌，掌声经久不衰。
The audience gave Mr. Lee a vote of thanks.
Guānzhòng xiàng lǐxiānshēng gǔzhǎng yǐ biǎoshì gǎnxiè。
观众向李先生鼓掌以表示感谢。
The crowd applauded when she skated out onto the ice.

当她在滑出冰面时人群齐声鼓掌。
Menuhin\'s playing was attended by a 15-minute standing ovation.
Méiniǔyīn de yǎnzòu jiéshù zhīhòu，tīngzhòng qǐlì gǔzhǎng shíwǔ fēnzhōng。
梅纽因的演奏结束之后，听众起立鼓掌15分钟。
The audience applauded.
Guānzhòngmen gǔzhǎng。
观众们鼓掌。
The spectators applauded the performance.
Guānzhòng wèi biǎoyǎn gǔzhǎng hècǎi。
观众为表演鼓掌喝采。
He pretended to be pleased and applauded decorously.
Tā jiǎzhuāng hěn gāoxìng，bìngqiě hái hěn yǒu lǐmào de gǔzhǎng hècǎi。
他假装很高兴，并且还很有礼貌地鼓掌喝彩。
An amazed audience gave the magician a standing ovation.

一位观众对魔术师的表演感到惊讶不已，禁不住长时间起立鼓掌。
The whole effect was surprising, and the audience broke into spontaneous applause.

gǔwǔ rénxīn de xiāoxi
most heartening news

gǔwǔ rénxīn de jiǎnghuà 
an inspiring speech
令人鼓舞
lìngrén gǔwǔ 
encouraging; heartening; inspiring
经济迅猛发展的派势令人倍受鼓舞。
Jīngjì xùnměngfāzhǎn de pàishì lìngrén bèishòu gǔwǔ。
Everyone is encouraged by the rapid momentum of economic growth.
初战的成功对我们后面的比赛鼓舞很大。
Chūzhàn de chénggōng duì wǒmen hòumiàn de bǐsài gǔwǔ hěndà。

鼓起勇气
ɡǔqǐ yǒnɡqì

There was a neat solid bulge where her flat belly had been.

她的肚子已经十分明显地鼓起来了，而过去她的肚子一直是扁平的。
The whole effect was surprising, and the audience broke into spontaneous applause.
Zhěngtǐ xiàoguǒ chūhūyìliào，guānzhòng qíngbúzìjīn de gǔqǐlezhǎng。
整体效果出乎意料，观众情不自禁的鼓起了掌。
I finally summoned the courage to talk to her.
Wǒ zhōngyú gǔ qǐ le hé tā tántán de yǒngqì。
我终于鼓起了和她谈谈的勇气。
I wish I had summoned up the nerve to smile back.
Wǒ zhēn xīwàng wǒ gǔqǐ yǒngqì，huíbào yǐ wēixiào。
我真希望我鼓起勇气，回报以微笑。
She took a deep breath, nerved herself, dived in.
Tā shēnshēn xīle yì kǒu qì，gǔqǐ yǒngqì，tiàorù shuǐzhōng。

干涸的池塘里，鱼儿能够濡沫生存，困境中的我们一样可以相互鼓励！
Gànhé de chítáng lǐ，yúér nénggòu rúmò shēngcún，kùnjìng zhōng de wǒmen yíyàng kěyǐ xiānghù gǔlì！

He likes to read while lying in bed.
我们要横向联合起来，发展旅游事业。

shāngpǐn bàiwùjiào 
commodity fetishism

拜望。
拜望老师。
拜托您捎个信给他。
Bàituō nín shāo gè xìn gěi tā。
Would you be kind enough to take a message to him?
拜托您给看会儿我女儿。
Bàituō nín gěi kānhuìr wǒnǚ\'ér。
Would you be kind enough to look after my daughter for a while.
这件事请您给打听一下，拜托，拜托！
拜托
孩子学习的事就拜托您了
I\'ll thank you to mind your own business!
拜托你少管闲事！
How to solve this situation is only my affair, please don\'t advise me anymore.
如何应对这种情况是我自己的事情，拜托你不用再给我任何建议。
Could you please belt up! I\'m trying to study for the exam.
拜托你闭嘴吧！我正复习准备考试呢。
Please could you stop talking among you?
拜托你们别说了行吗？
If you really want to investigate that noise please arm yourself with at least a stick.
如果你真想去调查那嘈杂音，拜托至少也带上根棍子。
I\'m so angry. I\'m beside myself right now so please don\'t talk to me.
我很生气，都快气疯了，所以拜托别跟我说话。
Would you please come out of the sun?
拜托你能站到太阳晒不到的地方去吗？
If you cook, please just don\'t make a mess.
你要是做饭的话，拜托别弄得一团糟。
Please stop bossing me around! I\'m neither your employee nor your slave.
拜托不要对我呼来喝去的！我不是你的员工也不是你的奴隶。
Do shut up, Sharon, and get on with your work.
莎伦，拜托你别说了，继续工作吧。
Could you please come down to earth and concentrate?
拜托你别胡思乱想，注意力集中点儿吗？
please don\'t cry!
拜托，别哭了！
I asked Susan to sew up the rip in my sleeve.
我拜托苏珊把我袖子上的裂口缝好了。
他俩明天就要拜天地了，家里人忙得不可开交。

拜年
bàinián
pay a New Year call; wish sb. a Happy New Year
晚辈给长辈拜年是常礼。
Wǎnbèi gěi zhǎngbèi bàinián shì chánglǐ。
It\'s a common practice for young people to pay a New Year\'s visit to their elders.
每到春节，我的那位旧知总要来给我拜年。
Měidào chūnjié，wǒ de nà wèi jiùzhī zǒng yào lái gěi wǒ bàinián。
My old friend always pays me a visit during Spring Festival.
过年的第一天，他起得绝早，去爷爷家拜年。
Guònián de dìyī tiān，tā qǐ de juézǎo，qù yéye jiā bàinián。
On the first day after the Spring Festival, he got up very early and paid his grandpa a New Year call.
每到春节期间，光是拜年就忙得不可开交。
Měi dào chūnjié qījiān，guāng shì bàinián jiù máng de bùkě kāijiāo。
Each year during Spring Festival just making New Year\'s calls keeps people busier than bees.
给您拜个早(晚)年。
Gěi nín bài gè zǎo（wǎn）nián。
Let me wish you an early (a belated, late) Happy New Year.
每年过年的时候，我们都会一起去拜望我们的中学老师。
Měinián guònián de shíhou，wǒmen dōuhuì yìqǐ qù bàiwàng wǒmen de zhōng xué lǎoshī。
Every New Year holiday, we go to visit our middle school teachers.
每年都有不少善男信女，前往五台山福地拜佛许愿。
Měinián dōu yǒu bùshǎo shànnán xìnnǚ，qiánwǎng Wǔtáishān fúdì bàifó xǔyuàn。
Many religious believers come to Wutai mountain, a place where immortals live, to worship Buddha and make vows.

Relatives and neighbours are coming to congratulate the elderly man on his 108th birthday today.
他家每天门庭若市，挤满了登门拜访的人。
Tā jiā měitiān méntíng ruòshì，jǐmǎn le dēngmén bàifǎng de rén。
His house is crowed with people who come to visit him every day.
尊号位于解放四路142号，我改日一定登门拜访。
Zūnhào wèiyú jiěfàng sìlù yìbǎisìshí\'èr hào，wǒ gǎirì yídìng dēngmén bàifǎng。
The address is No.142 on the 4th Liberation Road. I will definitely pay you a visit someday.
明天我登门拜访你。
Míngtiān wǒ dēngmén bàifǎng nǐ。
I\'ll call by to see you tomorrow.
登坛拜将。
登门拜访。
专程登门回拜。

bàidǎo zài mǒurén jiǎoxià 
grovel (or lie prostrate) at the feet of sb.
拜倒在名人脚下
拜倒在石榴裙下。

gàobié bàihuì 
farewell call
拜别双亲
拜别恩师。
I\'m so angry. I\'m beside myself right now so please don\'t talk to me.
我很生气，都快气疯了，所以拜托别跟我说话。

你要是做饭的话，拜托别弄得一团糟。
please don\'t cry!
拜托，别哭了！
Do shut up, Sharon, and get on with your work.
莎伦，拜托你别说了，继续工作吧。
Could you please come down to earth and concentrate?
拜托你别胡思乱想，注意力集中点儿吗？

拜托你们别说了行吗？

She has been saddened by the break-up with her boyfriend who ended their relationship not long after he went abroad.
我们要和悲伤说拜拜。
Wǒmen yào hé bēishāng shuō bàibài。
We must say goodbye to all our sorrows.
他俩感情不和，去年拜拜了
我早就和烟卷儿拜拜了。
这件事请您给打听一下，拜托，拜托！
今天是礼拜三，明天是礼拜四。
I see you tomorrow, bye!
明天见，拜拜！
Byron lives on not only in his poetry，but also in his creation of the &quot;Byronic hero&quot; - the persona of a brooding melancholy young man.
Bàilún bùjǐn shēnghuó zài tā de shīgē zhīzhōng，érqiě hái shēnghuó zài tā de“bàilúnshì yīngxióng”de chuàngzuò zhīzhōng；“bàilúnshì yīngxióng”shì zhǐ nà zhǒng chénsī yōuyù de niánqīngrén。
拜伦不仅生活在他的诗歌之中，而且还生活在他的“拜伦式英雄”的创作之中；“拜伦式英雄”是指那种沉思忧郁的年轻人。
the Lutheran use
路德会(一译“信义会”)的礼拜仪式；路德宗的礼拜仪式
Byron\'s consumed memoirs possessed the merit of being well and entertainingly written.
Bàilún de huǐdiào de wénjí jízhōng le Bàilún kuàilè shí suǒ xiě de wénzhāng de jīnghuá。

I asked Susan to sew up the rip in my sleeve.
我拜托苏珊把我袖子上的裂口缝好了。

bàixiàng

chónɡbài ǒuxiànɡ

《Zhàonán·gāntáng》yuē：“bìfèi gāntáng,wùjiǎn wùfá,zhàobó suǒbá.bìfèi gāntáng,wùjiǎn wùbài,zhàobó suǒqì.bìfèi gāntáng,wùjiǎn wùbài,zhàobó suǒshuō.”

Each year during Spring Festival just making New Year\'s calls keeps people busier than bees.

Tā hĕn xiǎng bàishī xuéxí Shāndōng qínshū.

It’s better to read more books than pray to Buddha for help just before an exam.

Shéndiàn lǐ jǐmǎn le cānbài shénlíng de rénmen。

能够进天阙朝拜天子，真是三生有幸呀！

村子后面的山上有个土地庙，我时常去拜祭。

There is a temple housing the god of earth on the hill at the back of the village, I often go there to worship.
这些奇异的景观都是拜大自然的伟力所赐。
Zhèxiē qíyì de jǐngguān dōushì bài dàzìrán de wěilì suǒcì。
This marvelous scenery has been bestowed by nature\'s great power.

Wǒ duì nǐ de chóngbài zhī qíng yóurú tāotāo jiāngshuǐ yánmián bùjué。

bīngzhèn qìshuǐ 
iced soda water
水蒸汽、水和冰是同一物质的气体、液体、固体三个相态。
Shuǐzhēngqì、shuǐ hé bīng shì tóngyí wùzhì de qìtǐ、yètǐ、gùtǐ sāngè xiàng tài。
Steam, water and ice constitute the three phases of one substance.
按照测量方法和实际应用不同，通常采用多个湿度参量表示水汽含量。
Ànzhào cèliángfāngfǎ hé shíjìyìngyòng bùtóng，tōngcháng cǎiyòng duōgè shīdùcānliàng biǎoshì shuǐqìhánliàng。
According to different measure methods and actual applications, multiple humidity parameters are used to indicate moisture content.

现在是汽车开灯的时间了。

我需要为我的汽车的雾灯更换电路。
The car moved slowly and its headlights dimmed.
Qìchē mànmàn qǐdòng，qiándēng ànle xiàlái。
汽车慢慢启动，前灯暗了下来。
He stopped the car and turned off the lights.
Tā tíngxià qìchē bìng guāndiàole chēdēng。
他停下汽车并关掉了车灯。
They turned their flashlights on the car.
Tāmen bǎshǒu diàndēng duìzhe nà liàng qìchē。
他们把手电灯对着那辆汽车。
Deer are notorious for freezing in the headlights of oncoming vehicles.
鹿在面对着迎面驶来的汽车时，会不知所措地僵立在车灯前，这是出了名的。
把汽船开到对岸去。
Bǎ qìchuán kāidào duì\'àn qù。

Lúnchuán shàng de qìdí wuwu jiào。

A gasoline engine drives the motorboat.
汽油引擎推动汽船。
The steamer supplies a stronger draft than the sailing boat.
蒸汽船比帆船的托力更大。
The propeller of the steamboat is a turboelectric propeller.
这艘汽船的推进器是一台涡轮发电机。
The steamboat ascended the river.
Nà sōu qìchuán sù hé ér shàng。
那艘汽船溯河而上。
He swung the steamer hard by the barge.
Tā diàozhuǎn jǐn\'āizhe bóchuán de nà tiáo qìchuán。
他调转紧挨着驳船的那条汽船。
The motorboat\'s wake capsized the canoe.
Dúmùzhōu bèi qìchuán wěi liú dǎ fān le。

The steamer went astern at half speed.
Qìchuán bàn sù hòutuì。
汽船半速后退。

The ship steamed slowly out of the harbor.
Zhè sōu chuán yǐ zhēngqì wéi dònglì，huǎnhuǎn shǐlíle gǎngwān。
这艘船以蒸汽为动力，缓缓驶离了港湾。
Steam propels this ship.
Zhēngqìtuīdòng zhè sōu chuán qiánjìn。

船只经过时鸣汽笛。

Zhèliàng qìchē zuìduō néng róngnà sìshí míng chéngyuán。
This car can hold forty passengers at most.
出租汽车很方便就是价格太贵。
Chūzū qìchē hěnfāngbiàn jiùshì jiàgé tài guì。
Taxi\'s are convenient, but too expensive.
我们去出租汽车总公司联系了一辆大客车。
Wǒmen qù chūzū qìchē zǒnggōngsī liánxì le yí liàng dàkèchē。
We have come to the taxi company to rent a car.
触目皆是的汽车几乎占满了整条马路，交通问题真是令人挠头。
Chùmù jiēshì de qìchē jīhū zhànmǎn le zhěngtiáo mǎlù，jiāotōng wèntí zhēnshì lìngrén náotóu。
Traffic is really heavy, all you can see are cars.
这种汽车的等速油耗较低。
Zhèzhǒng qìchē de děngsù yóuhào jiàodī。
This kind of car consumes less fuel than others at the same speed.
这幅画的价钱抵得上那辆汽车。
Zhèfúhuà de jiàqián dǐdéshàng nà liàng qìchē。
The price of this painting is almost the same as that of the car.
他把汽车卖了，抵缴了全部贷款。
Tā bǎ qìchē mài le，dǐjiǎo le quánbùdàikuǎn。
He sold his car and paid off all the loan.
随着汽车的颠簸，那些金属器皿在玎珰作响。
Suí zhe qìchē de diānbǒ，nàxiē jīnshǔ qìmǐn zài dīngdāng zuòxiǎng。
Those metal utensils are jingling as the car bumps along.
眼瞅上班要迟到，偏又赶上汽车抛锚，真叫人犯急！
Yǎn chǒu shàngbān yào chídào，piān yòu gǎnshàng qìchē pāomáo，zhēn jiào rén fànjí！
It was so annoying that the bus broke down when you were already late for work.
有了小汽车，他再也不用赶车进城了。
Yǒu le xiǎoqìchē，tā zài yě búyòng gǎnchē jìnchéng le。
He doesn\'t need to drive a cart to the city after he bought the car.
劳各位高参帮我选款汽车。
Láo gèwèi gāocān bāng wǒ xuǎn kuǎn qìchē。
Please select a car for me.
这辆汽车的构型独特，很引人注目。
Zhèliàng qìchē de gòuxíng dútè，hěnyǐnrén zhùmù。
The unique structural design of the car is very eye-catching.
前方施工，许多汽车不得不回车走别的路。
Qiánfāng shīgōng，xǔduō qìchē bùdébùhuíchē zǒu bié de lù。
In front the road is under construction. Many cars have to turn back, and change to another route.
当两辆汽车会车时，司机要互相礼让通行。
Dāng liǎng liàng qìchē huìchē shí，sījī yào hùxiāng lǐ ràng tōngxíng。
When two cars pass each other, both drivers should politely give way.
有了汽车，你出门就活便多了。
Yǒu le qìchē，nǐ chūmén jiù huóbiàn duō le。
It is more convenient for you to go outside with a car.
这收音机的抗干扰能力太差了，在汽车上都无法收听节目。
Zhè shōuyīnjī de kàng gānrǎo nénglì tài chà le，zài qìchē shàng dōu wúfǎ shōutīng jiémù。
The anti-interference function of this radio is too bad, no program can be received in the car.
制造汽车发动机的材料必须得是抗热的。
Zhìzào qìchē fādòngjī de cáiliào bìxū děi shì kàngrè de。
Material for making motor engines must be heat- resistant.
在快行线里，汽车的车速都很快，你要小心。
Zài kuàixíngxiàn lǐ，qìchē de chēsù dōu hěnkuài，nǐ yào xiǎoxīn。
Cars drive extremely quickly in the fast lane, so you should be careful.
他汽车的轮带没气了，必须找个地方打气。
Tā qìchē de lúndài méiqì le，bìxū zhǎo gè dìfāng dǎqì。
A tire on his car is flat, so he must find a place to pump it up.
他的汽车轮毂部位经过特别设计，显得很好看。
Tā de qìchē lúngǔ bùwèi jīngguò tèbié shèjì，xiǎnde hěnhǎokàn。
The hubs of his car is very good looking after being specially designed.
你还没有驾照，即使有了汽车也没用呀！
Nǐ hái méiyǒu jiàzhào，jíshǐ yǒu le qìchē yě méiyòng ya！
You don\'t have a driver\'s license. A car is no use to you.
被汽车撞倒后，我一直处于瞢眩状态。
Bèi qìchē zhuàngdǎo hòu，wǒ yìzhí chǔyú měngxuàn zhuàngtài。
After being hit by the car, I have been dizzy.
汽车排出的尾气含有很多有害物质。
Qìchē páichū de wěiqì hányǒu hěnduō yǒuhài wùzhì。
Vehicle exhaust contains a lot of damaging materials.
小排量的汽车更节能环保，应该鼓励和提倡大家使用！
Xiǎo páiliàng de qìchē gèng jiénéng huánbǎo，yīnggāi gǔlì hé tíchàng dàjiā shǐyòng！
Low displacement automobiles save more energy and protect the environment, so we should encourage people to use them.
汽车走在盘陀路上，转弯处需要格外小心。
Qìchē zǒuzài pántuó lùshàng，zhuǎnwānchù xūyào géwài xiǎoxīn。
You are driving on a winding path, take care when you are passing through the turns.
汽车在平直的公路上疾驰。
Qìchē zài píngzhí de gōnglù shàng jíchí。
Cars are running at high speeds on the straight highway.
在坡道停车时一定要注意拉手刹，以免汽车下滑。
Zài pōdào tíngchē shí yídìng yào zhùyì lā shǒushā，yǐmiǎn qìchē xiàhuá。
You must put on the hand brake on the slope in case the car slides downwards.
22路汽车站前总是有很多等车的人。
Èrshí\'èrlù qìchēzhànqián zǒngshì yǒu hěnduō děngchē de rén。
There are always many people waiting for the bus in the front of the number 22 bus station.
我们绝对不能让这批走私汽车入关。
Wǒmen juéduì bùnéng ràng zhè pī zǒusī qìchē rùguān。
We definitely can\'t let these smuggled cars go through customs.
拍唐代的故事怎么能有汽车入镜呢？

不知从哪里闪出了一辆汽车，把我撞倒了。
Bùzhī cóng nǎlǐ shǎnchū le yíliàng qìchē，bǎ wǒ zhuàngdǎo le。
A car suddenly appeared and knocked me down.
作为一个上班族，买一辆汽车是非常必要的。
Zuòwéi yígè shàngbānzú，mǎi yí liàng qìchē shì fēicháng bìyào de。
As a wage earner, it is very necessary that I buy a car.
汽车差一点就翻入了深涧，太危险了！
Qìchē chàyìdiǎn jiù fānrù le shēnjiàn，tài wēixiǎn le ！
It was so dangerous, the car nearly turned over in the gully!
失业后我一直以修理汽车为主要生业。

Bēi zhōng de shuǐ suízhe qìchē de diānbǒ ér tiàodàng。

In front the road is under construction. Many cars have to turn back, and change to another route.
当两辆汽车会车时，司机要互相礼让通行。
Dāng liǎng liàng qìchē huìchē shí，sījī yào hùxiāng lǐ ràng tōngxíng。
When two cars pass each other, both drivers should politely give way.

Yǒu le qìchē，nǐ chūmén jiù huóbiàn duō le。
It is more convenient for you to go outside with a car.
这收音机的抗干扰能力太差了，在汽车上都无法收听节目。

The anti-interference function of this radio is too bad, no program can be received in the car.
制造汽车发动机的材料必须得是抗热的。
Zhìzào qìchē fādòngjī de cáiliào bìxū děi shì kàngrè de。
Material for making motor engines must be heat- resistant.
在快行线里，汽车的车速都很快，你要小心。
Zài kuàixíngxiàn lǐ，qìchē de chēsù dōu hěnkuài，nǐ yào xiǎoxīn。
Cars drive extremely quickly in the fast lane, so you should be careful.
他汽车的轮带没气了，必须找个地方打气。
Tā qìchē de lúndài méiqì le，bìxū zhǎo gè dìfāng dǎqì。
A tire on his car is flat, so he must find a place to pump it up.
他的汽车轮毂部位经过特别设计，显得很好看。
Tā de qìchē lúngǔ bùwèi jīngguò tèbié shèjì，xiǎnde hěnhǎokàn。
The hubs of his car is very good looking after being specially designed.
你还没有驾照，即使有了汽车也没用呀！
Nǐ hái méiyǒu jiàzhào，jíshǐ yǒu le qìchē yě méiyòng ya！
You don\'t have a driver\'s license. A car is no use to you.
被汽车撞倒后，我一直处于瞢眩状态。
Bèi qìchē zhuàngdǎo hòu，wǒ yìzhí chǔyú měngxuàn zhuàngtài。
After being hit by the car, I have been dizzy.
汽车排出的尾气含有很多有害物质。
Qìchē páichū de wěiqì hányǒu hěnduō yǒuhài wùzhì。
Vehicle exhaust contains a lot of damaging materials.
小排量的汽车更节能环保，应该鼓励和提倡大家使用！
Xiǎo páiliàng de qìchē gèng jiénéng huánbǎo，yīnggāi gǔlì hé tíchàng dàjiā shǐyòng！
Low displacement automobiles save more energy and protect the environment, so we should encourage people to use them.
汽车走在盘陀路上，转弯处需要格外小心。
Qìchē zǒuzài pántuó lùshàng，zhuǎnwānchù xūyào géwài xiǎoxīn。
You are driving on a winding path, take care when you are passing through the turns.
汽车在平直的公路上疾驰。
Qìchē zài píngzhí de gōnglù shàng jíchí。
Cars are running at high speeds on the straight highway.
在坡道停车时一定要注意拉手刹，以免汽车下滑。
Zài pōdào tíngchē shí yídìng yào zhùyì lā shǒushā，yǐmiǎn qìchē xiàhuá。
You must put on the hand brake on the slope in case the car slides downwards.
22路汽车站前总是有很多等车的人。
Èrshí\'èrlù qìchēzhànqián zǒngshì yǒu hěnduō děngchē de rén。
There are always many people waiting for the bus in the front of the number 22 bus station.
我们看到河面上有一艘汽轮正在向这边驶来。
Wǒmen kàndào hémiàn shàng yǒu yì sōu qìlún zhèngzài xiàng zhèbiān shǐlái。
We saw that there was an oncoming steamship on the river.
这个小区的供暖采用的是汽暖方式。
Zhège xiǎoqū de gòngnuǎn cǎiyòng de shì qìnuǎn fāngshì。
The housing estate uses steam heating.
这条街上光专营汽配的商店就不下10家。
Zhè tiáo jiē shàng guāng zhuānyíng qìpèi de shāngdiàn jiù búxià shíjiā。
There are no less than 10 automotive parts shops in the street.
他跟师傅学会了汽配维修技术。
Tā gēn shīfu xuéhuì le qìpèi wéixiū jìshù。
He learned to repair motor vehicles from his teacher.
汽油弹是一种杀伤力很大的武器。
Qìyóudàn shì yìzhǒng shāshānglì hěndà de wǔqì。
Gasoline bombs are a weapon high killing power.
这家公司生产的汽油机质量可靠。
Zhèjiā gōngsī shēngchǎn de qìyóujī zhìliàng kěkào。
The company manufactures petrol engines of reliable quality.
我们绝对不能让这批走私汽车入关。
Wǒmen juéduì bùnéng ràng zhè pī zǒusī qìchē rùguān。
We definitely can\'t let these smuggled cars go through customs.
拍唐代的故事怎么能有汽车入镜呢？
Pāi Tángdài de gùshì zěnme néng yǒu qìchē rùjìng ne？
The film is about a story that happened in the Tang Dynasty. How can you have cars in this scene?
不知从哪里闪出了一辆汽车，把我撞倒了。
Bùzhī cóng nǎlǐ shǎnchū le yíliàng qìchē，bǎ wǒ zhuàngdǎo le。
A car suddenly appeared and knocked me down.
作为一个上班族，买一辆汽车是非常必要的。
Zuòwéi yígè shàngbānzú，mǎi yí liàng qìchē shì fēicháng bìyào de。
As a wage earner, it is very necessary that I buy a car.
汽车差一点就翻入了深涧，太危险了！
Qìchē chàyìdiǎn jiù fānrù le shēnjiàn，tài wēixiǎn le ！
It was so dangerous, the car nearly turned over in the gully!
失业后我一直以修理汽车为主要生业。
Shīyè hòu wǒ yìzhí yǐ xiūlǐ qìchē wéi zhǔyào shēngyè。
I have earned my living by fixing cars since I lost my job.

yīntiān

before it rains

盛夏里谁不喜欢躲在浓阴下乘凉呢？

Liánmián yīnyǔ hòu，zhōng yú yòu jiàndào le qíngkōng！
It is finally sunny after the continuous rain.
江南地区已经入梅，整日阴雨不断。

Wǒmen juédìng cóng shānyīn kāishǐ pāndēng。

天阴得这么厉害，说不准是要下雨了。

It\'s so cloudy, there might be rain.
他的旧伤还没好，一到阴天就会有酸胀的感觉。

His old wound hasn\'t recovered completely, it aches and swells on rainy days.
中国的传统节日都是按照太阴历计算的。
Zhōngguó de chuántǒng jiérì dōushì ànzhào tàiyīnlì jìsuàn de。
All traditional Chinese festivals are lunar calendar festivals.
这场车祸伤了他的尾椎，每逢阴天下雨尾椎都会酸疼。
Zhèchǎng chēhuò shāng le tā de wěizhuī，měiféng yīntiān xiàyǔ wěizhuī dōuhuì suānténg。
This car accident hurt his coccygeal vertebra, so it aches every rainy day.
多年惜阴苦读，他终于考取了功名。
Duōnián xīyīn kǔdú，tā zhōng yú kǎoqǔ le gōngmíng。
After many years of hard work, he finally succeeded in the imperial exam and won fame and honor.
这次你能逃出大劫全靠先世积下的阴德。
Zhècì nǐ néng táochū dàjié quánkào xiānshì jīxià de yīndé。
You are able to avert danger because of the virtues of your ancestors.
她刚刚新寡，还没从失去丈夫的阴影中走出来。
Tā gānggāng xīnguǎ，hái méi cóng shīqù zhàngfū de yīnyǐng zhōng zǒu chūlái。

他整天无所事事，简直是在虚耗光阴。

江阴
Jiānɡyīn 
Jiangyin (a county situated on the south side of the Changjiang River)
江南地区已经入梅，整日阴雨不断。
Jiāngnán dìqū yǐjing rùméi，zhěngrì yīnyǔ búduàn。
Since the beginning of the rainy season, the areas south of the lower reaches of the Yangtze River have had rain all day long every day.
江阴(在长江的南面)。
天气一会儿晴一会儿阴。
Tiānqì yíhuìr qíngyíhuìr yīn。
The weather is now clear, now cloudy.
家里建房前会找阴阳生看看地形。

这次暗访一定要把社会的阴暗面全部暴光。

他的旧伤还没好，一到阴天就会有酸胀的感觉。

His old wound hasn\'t recovered completely, it aches and swells on rainy days.
这场车祸伤了他的尾椎，每逢阴天下雨尾椎都会酸疼。

This car accident hurt his coccygeal vertebra, so it aches every rainy day.
阴阳先生说他印堂发黑会有大灾，可他一点不信。

一切企图孤立中国的阴谋都不会得逞
他的阴谋绝不会得逞。

我希望海边的天气不会太阴郁。
There is a cloud on the horizon that may overshadow the talks.

Guānɡyīn hěn bǎoɡuì。

光阴荏苒，不觉又过了两年。

Little by little time slipped away, and two more years passed by unnoticed.
光阴似箭，不觉残年将尽。

Time went by like an arrow, and before I knew it the year was drawing to a close.

社区电子眼，令小偷小摸无处遁形。

这些小偷专门偷小区里没人看管的自行车。

xiǎotōuxiǎomō
petty theft

During day time, the thief disguised himself as a peddler who collects garbage, and cased the site.
显然小偷是从这里大摇大摆出去的。

Obviously the thief had simply walked out this way as bold as brass.
小偷往街上跑，警察在后面紧追。

那小偷早跑得无影无踪了。

The thief should be easy to identify. He has a scar across one eye.

这个搭钩是从那个小偷身上搜出来的。

How could the thieves have stolen things in broad daylight?
便衣跟梢那个小偷很久了。

The thief has been shadowed by the plain-clothed policeman for a long time.
小偷故技重施，被守候在一旁的便衣警察抓了个正着。

When trying the same old trick, the thief was caught by the plainclothes policeman waiting at the side.
这几名小偷互相鸠合，协同作案。

The thieves worked together to commit crimes.
那个狡猾的小偷当场就擒，真是大快人心。

The sly thief was caught on the spot, to everyone\'s satisfaction.
大家抓小偷时，她只是空喊抓贼，不敢上前。

When people were catching the thief, she clamoured but did not take action.
这个小偷已经是第5次被警察抓住了，真是累教不改。

This thief has been caught by the police five times. What a person who refuses to mend his ways, despite  repeated punishment.
小偷被当场抓住后，便企图谋陷他身边的人。

After being caught in red, the thief attempted to plot a frame-up against people around.
大家齐心合力，几下子就把小偷拿下了。

据说小偷已经被抓住了，是一个未成年的少男。

It is said that the thief, a juvenile, has been arrested.
小偷每次偷盗前都会先去踏点，观察一下四周的情况再行动。

Each time, before stealing, the thieves go about making observations.
小偷刚刚把钱包偷到手就被警察逮住了，真是螳螂捕蝉，黄雀在后呀！

The thief follows the rich man closely and gets ready to do his business at anytime.

The thief activated the silent alarm as he climbed though the window.

小偷在爬过窗户时触动了警报器。
The thieves were banded together with rope.

小偷们被用绳子绑在一起。
Thieves stole cash and jewellery from the store before escaping.

小偷们在逃跑前从商店里偷走了现金和珠宝。
Police caught two thieves as they broke into a car.

在两个小偷闯入车内时，警察将他们抓获。
Police chased the thief and eventually recovered the money.

The thief hooked her purse.
Xiǎotōu tōuzǒule tā de qiánbāo。
小偷偷走了她的钱包。
The thieves stole the valuable watch and replaced it with a fake one.
Xiǎotōu yòng jiǎ biǎo huànle zhēn biǎo，jiāng qí tōuzǒu。

The thief posed as a chimney sweep to enter the house.

All of the stolen money was repaid after the thief was caught.

在小偷被抓到之后，所有被偷的钱都被归还了。
The thief belt out of the bank in a hurry.
Xiǎotōu cōngmáng pǎochū Yínháng。
小偷匆忙跑出银行。
The dogs in the neighborhood are chasing the thief.

附近的那些狗正在追逐那个小偷。
The thief took the wallet on the table and quickly cleaned out.
Nà xiǎotōu nále zhuōshàng de qiánbāo hòu xùnsù líkāi。
那小偷拿了桌上的钱包后迅速离开。
All of the valuables were cleared out by the thieves.

The crowd dashed towards the thief.
Rénqún cháo xiǎotōu chōngqù。
人群朝小偷冲去。
They delivered the thief over to the police.
Tāmen bǎ zhège xiǎotōu yíjiāo gěi jǐngjú。
他们把这个小偷移交给警局。
Sabine Jourdain fell among thieves while she was walking through the harbour.

He flung up his hands and looked away from the thief.

The thief flew from the crime scene.
Xiǎotōu cóng fànzuì xiànchǎng táozǒu le。
小偷从犯罪现场逃走了。
The police gathered the thief up in time.
Jǐngchá jíshí jūbǔle zhège xiǎotōu。
警察及时拘捕了这个小偷。
The police officers had eggs on their faces after the thieves got away.
Xiǎotōumen dōu pǎole,zhè ràng jǐngguānmen hěn diūliǎn。
小偷们都跑了，这让警官们很丢脸。
After they got caught，the thieves founds themselves in a bad wag.

在他们被抓住以后，小偷们发现情况不好。

He used his legs to kick back at the thief.
Tā yòng tuǐ tī nàgè xiǎotōu。
他用腿踢那个小偷。

只需一时疏忽，就会把你的贵重物品送给小偷。

The thieves decided to ride on to the next town.

小偷们决定继续向下一个城镇前进。
She struck the thief with a golf club.
Tā yòng yí gè gāo\'ěrfūqiúbàng dǎ nàge xiǎotōu。

He was made out to be the thief.
Tā jiǎzhuāng shì nàgè xiǎotōu。
他假装是那个小偷。

Did you catch the thief?
Nǐ zhuāzhù xiǎotōu le ma？
你抓住小偷了吗？
He dealt with the thief mercifully.
Tā duìdài nàgè xiǎotōu hěn kuānróng。
他对待那个小偷很宽容。
The thieves made a clean getaway.
Xiǎotōumen shénbùzhī-guǐbùjué de táozǒu le。
小偷们神不知鬼不觉地逃走了。
She caught her dog stealing food from the table.
Tā zhuādào tā de xiǎogǒu zhèngzài cóng zhuōzi shàng tōu shíwù。
她抓到她的小狗正在从桌子上偷食物。

勇气，是看侦探小说时，不先翻到后面几页，偷看一下凶手是谁。
To get into their cabins, he has to steal the keys from under their noses.

偷运违禁物品的行为，要受到法律的制裁。

People who smuggle contraband goods will be punished by the law.

这批黑货是从海上偷运过来的。
他偷眼看了一下母亲的神色。
Tā tōuyǎn kàn le yíxià mǔqīn de shénsè。
He stole a glance at his mother\'s face.
他用手指捅了个窗眼，偷看屋里人的情况。
Tā yòng shǒuzhǐ tǒng le gè chuāngyǎn，tōukàn wūlǐ rén de qíngkuàng。
He poked a hole in the window with his finger and peeped at the people inside.
捂上眼睛，别偷看。
Wǔ shàngyǎnjing，bié tōu kàn。

偷偷地瞧了一眼
tōutōu de qiáo le yì yǎn 
steal a glance at
社区电子眼，令小偷小摸无处遁形。

The community\'s electronic eye has left the thieves nowhere to hide.
你居然在警察眼皮底下偷东西，好大的胆子。
Nǐ jūrán zài jǐngchá yǎnpí dǐxià tōu dōngxi，hǎo dà de dǎnzi。
You\'re so audacious, you steal in front of the eyes of the police.
那个小偷有特征，是个疤瘌眼儿。

偷眼一看。

偷偷地用眼睛瞟着他

偷偷地溜走
tōutōu de liūzǒu 
sneak away
偷偷地瞧了一眼
tōutōu de qiáo le yì yǎn 
steal a glance at
偷偷告诉他
tōutōu ɡàosù tā 
tell him on the quiet

Zhèxiē háizi tōutōu de chōuyān。
The boys smoked on the sly.

During the Warring States Period, in order to defend  the Qin state, deputies from the states of Qi and Lu met surreptitiously with each other.
丈夫走了以后，她每天晚上都用鲛绡偷偷的拭泪。

他将密诏藏在箱子里面，偷偷带出了皇宫。
Tā jiāng mìzhào cángzài xiāngzi lǐmian，tōutōu dàichū le huánggōng。
He hid the secret imperial edicts in the box, and took them out of the palace.
他偷偷地拿掉了粘在我衣摆上的口香糖。
Tā tōutōu de nádiào le zhānzài wǒ yībǎi shàng de kǒuxiāngtáng。
He covertly removed the chewing gum from my hem.
他新买的折叠伞被小偷偷走了，
Tā xīnmǎi de zhédiésǎn bèi xiǎotōu tōuzǒu le。
The folding umbrella he just bought was stolen.
道士坐功的时候，他偷偷地跑了出来。

He sneaked out while the Taoist priest was sitting in meditation.

How could the thieves have stolen things in broad daylight?
小偷每次偷盗前都会先去踏点，观察一下四周的情况再行动。

Each time, before stealing, the thieves go about making observations.
小偷正为偷到手机而得意，却没想到斜刺里杀出两个警察。
Xiǎotōu zhèng wèi tōudào shǒujī ér déyì，què méi xiǎngdào xiécì lǐ shāchū liǎnggè jǐngchá。
The thief was feeling glad about stealing a mobile phone when he was caught by two policemen.

Xiao Li caught the thief to bring him to justice, but was accused by the thief himself.

Xiǎotōu gānggāng bǎ qiánbāo tōu dàoshǒu jiù bèi jǐngchá dǎizhù le，zhēnshì tángláng bǔchán，huángquè zàihòu ya！
No sooner had the thief stolen the wallet, than he was caught by the police. As the saying goes: coveting the gains ahead, unaware of danger behind.
幸喜你有事回家，要不然小偷要把你家东西偷光了。
Xìngxǐ nǐ yǒu shì huíjiā，yàobùrán xiǎotōu yào bǎ nǐ jiā dōngxi tōuguāng le。
Luckily, you returned home on some matter, otherwise the thief would have stolen all your belongings.
我今天抓小偷时竟被人当成了小偷，真是窝心！

偷偷地用眼睛瞟着他

小偷们通常不急于将刚偷来的货物销赃，以防被警察抓到。
All of the stolen money was repaid after the thief was caught.
Zài xiǎotōu bèi zhuādào zhīhòu，suǒyǒu bèi tōu de qián dōu bèi guīhuán le。
在小偷被抓到之后，所有被偷的钱都被归还了。
Who steals my purse steals trash.
谁偷我钱包，就什么也没有偷到。
Thieves stole cash and jewellery from the store before escaping.
Xiǎotōumen zài táopǎo qián cóng shāngdiàn lǐ tōuzǒule xiànjīn hé zhūbǎo。
小偷们在逃跑前从商店里偷走了现金和珠宝。
The thieves stole the valuable watch and replaced it with a fake one.
Xiǎotōu yòng jiǎ biǎo huànle zhēn biǎo，jiāng qí tōuzǒu。
小偷用假表换了真表，将其偷走。
We will make after the thieves who stole the precious gems.

我们会追踪那些偷了这些珍贵宝物的小偷们。
The thief restored stolen property when he turned himself into the police.
小偷向警察自首时归还了他偷的东西。
他悄声地告诉我窗外有人在偷听。

tōutīngbiéren tánhuà

I caught them listening outside the door.

The jealous man was eavesdropping on his wife\'s conversations.

这名嫉妒的男人偷听他妻子的谈话。
蝼蚁尚且偷生，何况人乎？
Lóuyǐ shàngqiě tōu shēng，hékuàngrén hū?
Even the lowly cricket and ant cling to life, let alone a human being.
为了向杀父仇人进行报复，他一直忍辱偷生。
Wèile xiàng shāfù chóurén jìnxíng bàofù，tā yìzhí rěnrǔ tōushēng。
In order to take revenge on the enemy who killed his father, he has been enduring humiliation in order to survive.
他偷了生产队的铁镐，遭到了队长的批评。
Tā tōu le shēngchǎnduì de tiěgǎo，zāodào le duìzhǎng de pīpíng。
He stole the pickaxe from the production team and was therefore criticized by the team leader.
我睡觉时把钱放在枕头下，生怕贼偷了去。

The homeless girl begs and thieves for a living.
这个无家可归的女孩靠乞讨和偷窃为生。

很多学生偷偷离开了这个无聊的演讲。

一些学生偷到了期末考试的答案。
John was taking a break from the hard grind of political life.

I slept with all my money under my pillow for fear of thieves.
你去押当干什么，是不是偷了东西去典当。

这么大年纪还去偷东西，你那老脸往哪放？！

I could not persuade him out of a suspicion that it had been stolen.

他用手指捅了个窗眼，偷看屋里人的情况。

I was pictured at this club twice.

他用手指捅了个窗眼，偷看屋里人的情况。

偷工夫干点私活儿
tōu gōngfū gàndiǎn sī huór

他工作从不偷懒。

gǒuqiě tōu\'ān 
seek only temporary ease and comfort
偷安
tōuān
seek temporary ease

Recently, the community has tightened up security, and as a result, thieves have nowhere to hide.

偷安一时。
A collecting box has been stolen from Anna.

Xiao Li caught the thief to bring him to justice, but was accused by the thief himself.
战国时期，为了对付秦国，齐国与鲁国偷偷会盟。

During the Warring States Period, in order to defend  the Qin state, deputies from the states of Qi and Lu met surreptitiously with each other.
丈夫走了以后，她每天晚上都用鲛绡偷偷的拭泪。
Zhàngfū zǒu le yǐhòu，tā měitiān wǎnshàng dōu yòng jiāoxiāo tōutōu de shìlèi。
After her husband died young, she secretly wiped away tears with a handkerchief every day.
他将密诏藏在箱子里面，偷偷带出了皇宫。
Tā jiāng mìzhào cángzài xiāngzi lǐmian，tōutōu dàichū le huánggōng。
He hid the secret imperial edicts in the box, and took them out of the palace.

Each time, before stealing, the thieves go about making observations.
小偷刚刚把钱包偷到手就被警察逮住了，真是螳螂捕蝉，黄雀在后呀！
Xiǎotōu gānggāng bǎ qiánbāo tōu dàoshǒu jiù bèi jǐngchá dǎizhù le，zhēnshì tángláng bǔchán，huángquè zàihòu ya！
No sooner had the thief stolen the wallet, than he was caught by the police. As the saying goes: coveting the gains ahead, unaware of danger behind.
我今天抓小偷时竟被人当成了小偷，真是窝心！
Wǒ jīntiān zhuā xiǎotōu shí jìng bèi rén dàngchéng le xiǎotōu，zhēnshì wōxīn！
I was caught by the police, when I was trying to catch the real thief!
小偷正为偷到手机而得意，却没想到斜刺里杀出两个警察。
Xiǎotōu zhèng wèi tōudào shǒujī ér déyì，què méi xiǎngdào xiécì lǐ shāchū liǎnggè jǐngchá。
The thief was feeling glad about stealing a mobile phone when he was caught by two policemen.
幸喜你有事回家，要不然小偷要把你家东西偷光了。
Xìngxǐ nǐ yǒu shì huíjiā，yàobùrán xiǎotōu yào bǎ nǐ jiā dōngxi tōuguāng le。
Luckily, you returned home on some matter, otherwise the thief would have stolen all your belongings.
他偷偷地拿掉了粘在我衣摆上的口香糖。
Tā tōutōu de nádiào le zhānzài wǒ yībǎi shàng de kǒuxiāngtáng。
He covertly removed the chewing gum from my hem.
他新买的折叠伞被小偷偷走了，

These thieves specialize in stealing unguarded bikes.
道士坐功的时候，他偷偷地跑了出来。
Dàoshì zuògōng de shíhou，tā tōutōu de pǎo le chūlái。
He sneaked out while the Taoist priest was sitting in meditation.
显然小偷是从这里大摇大摆出去的。
Xiǎnrán xiǎotōu shì cóng zhèlǐ dàyáodàbǎi chūqù de。
Obviously the thief had simply walked out this way as bold as brass.
偷越国境
tōu yuè ɡuójìnɡ
cross the border illegally
小偷往街上跑，警察在后面紧追。
Xiǎotōu wǎngjiē shàngpǎo，jǐngchá zài hòumiàn jǐn zhuī。
The thief ran down the street with a policeman in hot pursuit.
他发过誓不再偷了，可不久又旧病复发，走上了犯罪道路。
Tā fāguo shì bú zài tōu le，kě bùjiǔ yòu jiùbìngfùfā，zǒushàng le fànzuì dàolù。
He swore that he would never steal again, but soon relapsed into a life of crime.
蝼蚁尚且偷生，何况人乎？
Lóuyǐ shàngqiě tōu shēng，hékuàngrén hū?
Even the lowly cricket and ant cling to life, let alone a human being.
他悄声地告诉我窗外有人在偷听。
Tā qiǎoshēng de gàosù wǒ chuāngwài yǒurén zài tōutīng。
He whispered to me that there was an eavesdropper outside the window.
有人把我的雨衣偷走了。
Yǒu rén bǎ wǒ de yǔyī tōuzǒu le。
Someone has made off with my raincoat.
他没跟人说就偷着跑了。
Tā méi gēn rén shuō jiù tōu zhe pǎo le。
He sneaked off without telling anyone.
苟且偷安
gǒuqiě tōu\'ān 
seek only temporary ease and comfort
偷换概念
tōuhuàn ɡàiniàn 
play tricks with concepts
捂上眼睛，别偷看。
Wǔ shàngyǎnjing，bié tōu kàn。
Cover your eyes and don\'t peek.
偷漏农业税
tōulòu nónɡyèshuì 
evade agricultural taxes
偷听别人谈话
tōutīngbiéren tánhuà 
eavesdrop on a conversation
他偷眼看了一下母亲的神色。
Tā tōuyǎn kàn le yíxià mǔqīn de shénsè。
He stole a glance at his mother\'s face.
偷越封锁线
tōuyuè fēnɡsuǒxiàn 
run a blockade; slip through a cordon
那小偷早跑得无影无踪了。
Nà xiǎotōu zǎo pǎo de wúyǐngwúzōng le。
The thief had disappeared without a trace.
把小偷押到派出所去
bǎ xiǎotōu yādào pàichūsuǒ qù
escort the thief to the police station
抓小偷
zhuā xiǎotōu 
catch a thief
抓住个小偷
zhuāzhù gè xiǎotōu 
catch a thief
偷窃的罪名
tōuqiè de zuìmíng
a charge of theft
偷窃
tōuqiè
steal; pilfer
偷安
tōuān
seek temporary ease
偷空
tōukòng
take time off (from work to do sth. else); snatch a moment
忙里偷闲
mánglitōuxián
snatch a little leisure from a busy life
这可恶的小偷真该挨揍！
Zhè kěwù de xiǎotōu zhēn gāi áizòu！
That damn thief deserves a real kick in the ass.
这些人暗偷明抢，活该被抓！
Zhèxiē rén àntōu míngqiǎng，huógāi bèi zhuā！
They deserved to get arrested, considering the crimes they committed.
那个小偷有特征，是个疤瘌眼儿。
Nàge xiǎotōu yǒu tèzhēng，shì gè bālayǎnr。
The thief should be easy to identify. He has a scar across one eye.
这个把风的小偷见到警察来了撒腿就跑，扔下同伙不管了。
Zhège bǎfēng de xiǎotōu jiàndào jǐngchá lái le sātuǐ jiù pǎo，rēngxià tónghuǒ bùguǎn le。
The thief\'s accomplise ran away at the sight of the police, abandoning his watch and his friend.
白天的时候，小偷装扮成收废品的小贩潜入小区踩道。
Báitiān de shíhou，xiǎotōu zhuāngbàn chéng shōufèipǐn de xiǎofàn qiánrù xiǎoqū cǎidào。
During day time, the thief disguised himself as a peddler who collects garbage, and cased the site.
那个长方脸的男人刚刚偷走了你的钱包。
Nàge chángfāngliǎn de nánrén gānggāng tōuzǒu le nǐ de qiánbāo。
That man with the long-square face has just stolen your wallet.
他用手指捅了个窗眼，偷看屋里人的情况。
Tā yòng shǒuzhǐ tǒng le gè chuāngyǎn，tōukàn wūlǐ rén de qíngkuàng。
He poked a hole in the window with his finger and peeped at the people inside.
这个搭钩是从那个小偷身上搜出来的。
Zhège dāgōu shì cóng nàge xiǎotōu shēnshàng sōu chūlái de。
When searching the thief they found this hook.
这次偷袭非常成功，活捉了敌酋。
Zhècì tōuxí fēicháng chénggōng，huózhuō le díqiú。
This sneak raid was very successful. We took the enemy leader captive.
我的钱包被偷了，真让人堵心。
Wǒ de qiánbāo bèi tōu le，zhēn ràng rén dǔxīn。
My purse has been stolen, I feel really bad.
这些天社区加强了治安管理，小偷小摸无处遁藏。
Zhèxiētiān shèqū jiāqiáng le zhì\'ān guǎnlǐ，xiǎotōu xiǎomō wúchù dùncáng。
Recently, the community has tightened up security, and as a result, thieves have nowhere to hide.
社区电子眼，令小偷小摸无处遁形。
Shèqū diànzǐyǎn，lìng xiǎotōu xiǎomō wúchù dùnxíng。
The community\'s electronic eye has left the thieves nowhere to hide.
我们是按劳分利的，谁也别想偷懒钻空子。
Wǒmen shì ànláo fēnlì de，shéi yě bié xiǎng tōulǎn zuànkōngzi。
We have adopted a payment system which is based on one\'s contributions, therefore no one can take benefit without working for it.
为了坚决打击偷渡犯罪，警方建立了严密的海上封锁线。
Wèile jiānjué dǎjī tōudù fànzuì，jǐngfāng jiànlì le yánmì de hǎishàng fēngsuǒ xiàn。
In order to strike a blow at the smugglers, the police established a naval blockade.
便衣跟梢那个小偷很久了。
Biànyī gēnshāo nàge xiǎotōu hěnjiǔ le。
The thief has been shadowed by the plain-clothed policeman for a long time.
《西游记》中，猪八戒总是爱偷吃供果。
《Xīyóujì》zhōng，zhūbājiè zǒngshì ài tōuchī gòngguǒ。
In Journey to the west, Zhubajie always eats the fruit that he steals from offerings.
小偷故技重施，被守候在一旁的便衣警察抓了个正着。
Xiǎotōu gùjì chóngshī，bèi shǒuhòu zài yìpáng de biànyī jǐngchá zhuā le gè zhèngzháo。
When trying the same old trick, the thief was caught by the plainclothes policeman waiting at the side.
他偷了家里的钱，被父亲狠狠的教训了一顿。
Tā tōu le jiā lǐ de qián，bèi fùqīn hěnhěn de jiàoxùn le yídùn。
He stole money from home, and was chided seriously by his father.
真没想到，东西竟然是他偷走的。
Zhēn méi xiǎngdào，dōngxi jìngrán shì tā tōuzǒu de。
It surprised everyone that he was the thief.
这几名小偷互相鸠合，协同作案。
Zhè jǐ míng xiǎotōu hùxiāng jiūhé，xiétóng zuòàn。
The thieves worked together to commit crimes.
他刚从看守所出来就旧病复发，又开始偷东西了。
Tā gāng cóng kànshǒusuǒ chūlái jiù jiùbìng fùfā，yòu kāishǐ tōu dōngxi le。
He went back to his old trade of stealing after getting out of jail.
那个狡猾的小偷当场就擒，真是大快人心。
Nàge jiǎohuá de xiǎotōu dāngchǎng jiùqín，zhēnshì dàkuài rénxīn。
The sly thief was caught on the spot, to everyone\'s satisfaction.
大家抓小偷时，她只是空喊抓贼，不敢上前。
Dàjiā zhuā xiǎotōu shí，tā zhǐshì kōnghǎn zhuāzéi，bùgǎn shàngqián。
When people were catching the thief, she clamoured but did not take action.
根据他以往的表现，我揆度偷东西的一定不是他！
Gēnjù tā yǐwǎng de biǎoxiàn，wǒ kuídù tōu dōngxi de yídìng búshì tā！
According to his former conduct, I’m sure he isn’t the thief.
这么大年纪还去偷东西，你那老脸往哪放？！
Zhème dà niánjì hái qù tōudōngxi，nǐ nà lǎoliǎn wǎng nǎ fàng？！
You stole things at such an old age. How can you ever face people again?
这个小偷已经是第5次被警察抓住了，真是累教不改。
Zhège xiǎotōu yǐjing shì dìwǔcì bèi jǐngchá zhuāzhù le，zhēnshì lěijiào bùgǎi。
This thief has been caught by the police five times. What a person who refuses to mend his ways, despite  repeated punishment.
小偷被当场抓住后，便企图谋陷他身边的人。
Xiǎotōu bèi dāngchǎng zhuāzhù hòu，biàn qǐtú móuxiàn tā shēnbiān de rén。
After being caught in red, the thief attempted to plot a frame-up against people around.
大家齐心合力，几下子就把小偷拿下了。
Dàjiā qíxīn hélì，jǐ xiàzi jiù bǎ xiǎotōu náxià le。
They coordinated their efforts, and caught the thief for a while.
希望大家做事要勤谨，不要马虎偷懒。
Xīwàng dàjiā zuòshì yào qínjǐn，búyào mǎhu tōulǎn。
It is hoped that everybody should be diligent and not be lazy.
他的自行车挂了2条圈儿锁，可还是被偷了。
Tā de zìxíngchē guà le liǎngtiáo quānrsuǒ，kě háishi bèi tōu le。
He locked his bike with two chain locks, but it was still stolen.
为了向杀父仇人进行报复，他一直忍辱偷生。
Wèile xiàng shāfù chóurén jìnxíng bàofù，tā yìzhí rěnrǔ tōushēng。
In order to take revenge on the enemy who killed his father, he has been enduring humiliation in order to survive.
据说小偷已经被抓住了，是一个未成年的少男。
Jùshuō xiǎotōu yǐjing bèi zhuāzhù le，shì yígè wèichéngnián de shàonán。
It is said that the thief, a juvenile, has been arrested.
经少年法庭判定，这个孩子犯了偷窃罪。
Jīng shàonián fǎtíng pàndìng，zhège háizi fàn le tōuqièzuì。
According to the juvenile court\'s judgment, this child has committed theft.
昨天夜里巡逻队又截获了一艘企图偷渡的蛇船。
Zuótiān yèlǐ xúnluóduì yòu jiéhuò le yí sōu qǐtú tōudù de shéchuán。
Last night, the patrol team captured another boat that intended to ferry across the border secretly.
他现在急需钱用，甚至于想到了偷窃。
Tā xiànzài jíxū qián yòng，shènzhìyú xiǎngdào le tōuqiè。
He needs money so eagerly that he has even thought of stealing.
我们两口子说私房话，你偷听什么？
Wǒmen liǎngkǒuzi shuō sīfánghuà，nǐ tōu tīng shénme？
I am exchanging confidential information with my husband. Why are you overhearing us?
他偷了生产队的铁镐，遭到了队长的批评。
Tā tōu le shēngchǎnduì de tiěgǎo，zāodào le duìzhǎng de pīpíng。
He stole the pickaxe from the production team and was therefore criticized by the team leader.
这个犯罪团伙经常偷盗变压器的铁芯。
Zhège fànzuì tuánhuǒ jīngcháng tōudào biànyāqì de tiěxīn。
The criminal gang always steals the iron cores of transformers.
受恶劣的天气的影响，我军痛失了偷袭敌人的最佳战机。
Shòu èliè de tiānqì de yǐngxiǎng，wǒ jūn tòngshī le tōuxí dírén de zuìjiā zhànjī。
Affected by the bad weather, our army has lost the best chance to have a sneak attack on the enemy.
犯罪分子靠偷猎藏羚羊来牟取暴利。
Fànzuì fènzǐ kào tōuliè zànglíngyáng lái móuqǔ bàolì。
Criminals earn colossal profits by stealthily poaching antelope.
你一定要改掉偷摸的恶习。
Nǐ yídìng yào gǎidiào tōumō de èxí。
You must get rid of the bad habit of petty theft.
我们偷拍到了这次非法交易的全过程。
Wǒmen tōupāi dào le zhècì fēifǎ jiāoyì de quán guòchéng。
We have secretly videotaped the whole process of this illegal transaction.
用这个方法进行计算可以偷巧。
Yòng zhège fāngfǎ jìnxíng jìsuàn kěyǐ tōuqiǎo。
This method can save a lot of effort.
他总是喜欢偷巧完成自己的工作。
Tā zǒngshì xǐhuan tōuqiǎo wánchéng zìjǐ de gōngzuò。
He often finishes his task using cunning tricks to avoid hard work.
他俩早就偷香窃玉，暗自私通了。
Tā liǎ zǎo jiù tōuxiāng qièyù，ànzì sītōng le。
They have long indulged in illicit sexual relations.
偷运违禁物品的行为，要受到法律的制裁。
Tōuyùn wéijìn wùpǐn de xíngwéi，yào shòudào fǎlǜ de zhìcái。
People who smuggle contraband goods will be punished by the law.
为了防止偷花贼进入，他在花园四周打上围栏。
Wèile fángzhǐ tōuhuāzéi jìnrù，tā zài huāyuán sìzhōu dǎshàng wéilán。
He built a fence around the garden to prevent the flower thieves from entering.
将军要求士兵衔枚夜行，偷袭敌人。
Jiāngjūn yāoqiú shìbīng xiánméi yèxíng，tōuxí dírén。
The general orders the soldiers to have a wooden gag in their mouth, and attack the enemy secretly.
小偷跟在一个大款的后面，紧紧相随，时刻准备动手。
Xiǎotōu gēnzài yígè dàkuǎn de hòumiàn，jǐnjǐn xiāngsuí，shíkè zhǔnbèi dòngshǒu。
The thief follows the rich man closely and gets ready to do his business at anytime.
你去押当干什么，是不是偷了东西去典当。
Nǐ qù yādàng gàn shénme，shìbushì tōu le dōngxi qù diǎndàng。
Why did you go to the pawnshop? Did you steal something and go there to pawn it?
你居然在警察眼皮底下偷东西，好大的胆子。
Nǐ jūrán zài jǐngchá yǎnpí dǐxià tōu dōngxi，hǎo dà de dǎnzi。
You\'re so audacious, you steal in front of the eyes of the police.
这些野猴常常进寺庙里偷吃斋果。
Zhèxiē yěhóu chángcháng jìn sìmiào lǐ tōuchī zhāiguǒ。
These wild monkeys usually sneak into the temple, and eat the offerings.
面对公交车上的偷盗行为，大家都坐视不理。
Miànduì gōngjiāochē shàng de tōudào xíngwéi，dàjiā dōu zuòshì bùlǐ。
People sat by idly and remained indifferent to the theft on the bus.
他偷了钱，这是个不争的事实。
Tā tōule qián，zhè shì gè bùzhēng de shìshí。
He stole the money, which is something he could not deny.
这间公司终于补交了他们偷漏的流转税。
Zhè jiān gōngsī zhōngyú bǔjiāole tāmen tōulòu de Liúzhuǎnshuì。
The company finally paid the turnover tax in arrears.
他把小偷按倒在地。
Tā bǎ xiǎotōu àndǎozàidì。
He pushed the thief to the ground.
接到居民报案后，警察以偷窃嫌疑将他逮捕。
Jiēdào jūmín bào\'àn hòu，jǐngchá yǐ tōuqièxiányí jiāng tā dàibǔ。
After a report from a local resident, the police arrested him on suspicion of theft.
偷东西真不道德。
Tōudōngxī zhēn búdàodé。
Stealing is so immoral.
防备敌人偷袭
fángbèi dírén tōuxí
guard against surprise attacks by the enemy
小偷小摸
xiǎotōuxiǎomō
petty theft
小偷被打得连喊饶命。
Xiǎotōu bèi dǎ de lián hǎn ráomìng.
They beat the thief until he begged for mercy.
我睡觉时把钱放在枕头下，生怕贼偷了去。
Wǒ shuìjiào shí bǎ qián fàngzài zhěntou xià，shēngpà zéi tōuleqù。
I slept with all my money under my pillow for fear of thieves.
我们绝对不能让偷渡活动抬头。
Wǒmen juéduì bùnéng ràng tōudùhuódòng táitóu。
We must not let the people-smugglers get a foothold.
偷工夫干点私活儿
tōu gōngfū gàndiǎn sī huór
take time off to do private work
偷渡客
tōudùkè
illegal immigrant
无独有偶，他丢了钥匙，钱包被偷了。
Wúdúyǒu\'ǒu，tā diūle yàoshi，qiánbāo bèi tōule。
These things come in pairs – just as he lost his keys, his wallet was stolen too.
小偷无孔不入，大家要提高警惕。
Xiǎotōu wúkǒngbúrù，dàjiā yào tígāo jǐngtì。
Thieves are everywhere and everybody should be on the lookout.
她疑心邻居偷了她的手表。
Tā yíxīn línjū tōule tā de shǒubiǎo。
She suspected that her neighbour (英) {或} neighbor (美) stole her watch.
他经常诱使那几个少年去偷盗。
Tā jīngcháng yòushǐ nà jǐgè shàonián qù tōudào。
He often lures those kids into stealing things.
小偷被抓时人赃并获。
xiǎo tōu bèi zhuā shí rén zāng bìng huò。
The thief was taken with mainour.
我的自行车被偷了。
Wǒde zìxíngchē bèi tōu le 。
My bike was stolen.

小偷就在他眼底下作案，他居然没发现。
高声吆喝着偷懒的人。
We snuck out to her car to listen their conversation.
Wǒmen tōutōu liūdào tā chē nàr，qù tōutīng tāmen de tánhuà。
我们偷偷溜到她车那儿，去偷听他们的谈话。
to sneak up on someone unawares
偷偷地突然走近某人
Who steals my purse steals trash.
谁偷我钱包，就什么也没有偷到。
Thieves most of the time have to wait to sell their hot merchandise so they are not discovered.
小偷们通常不急于将刚偷来的货物销赃，以防被警察抓到。
The thief took my wallet from my bag.
小偷从我包里偷走了钱包。
A programmer had been hacking into some banking private data.
有个程序员一直都在偷偷侵入银行的专用数据库。
to slip sth to sb, slip sb sth
tōu tōu jiāng mǒu wù sāigěi mǒu rén
偷偷将某物塞给某人
This thief was beaten for trying to steal from the church collection box.
小偷因为想偷教堂募捐箱里的钱，被打了一顿。
The thief restored stolen property when he turned himself into the police.
小偷向警察自首时归还了他偷的东西。
They secretly extended the wine by adding more grape juice.
Tā tōngguò tiānjiā gèng duō de pútáozhī tōutōu bǎ jiǔ chōngdàn le。
他通过添加更多的葡萄汁偷偷把酒冲淡了。
An experienced thief can easily steal the contents of an open handbag.
Yí gè jīngyàn fēngfù de xiǎotōu kěyǐ qīng\'éryìjǔ de tōuzǒu kāizhe de shǒutíbāo lǐ de dōngxi。
一个经验丰富的小偷可以轻而易举地偷走开着的手提包里的东西。
Thieves stole cash and jewellery from the store before escaping.
Xiǎotōumen zài táopǎo qián cóng shāngdiàn lǐ tōuzǒule xiànjīn hé zhūbǎo。
小偷们在逃跑前从商店里偷走了现金和珠宝。
The thief hooked her purse.
Xiǎotōu tōuzǒule tā de qiánbāo。
小偷偷走了她的钱包。
The thieves stole the valuable watch and replaced it with a fake one.
Xiǎotōu yòng jiǎ biǎo huànle zhēn biǎo，jiāng qí tōuzǒu。
小偷用假表换了真表，将其偷走。
All of the stolen money was repaid after the thief was caught.
Zài xiǎotōu bèi zhuādào zhīhòu，suǒyǒu bèi tōu de qián dōu bèi guīhuán le。
在小偷被抓到之后，所有被偷的钱都被归还了。
She threw a sly glance at her husband.
Tā tōutōu de piēle tā de zhàngfu yìyǎn。
她偷偷的瞥了她的丈夫一眼。
The criminal tried to edge away without being noticed.
Zuìfàn shìtú zài bù yǐnqǐ zhùyì de qíngkuàng xià tōutōu liūzǒu。
罪犯试图在不引起注意的情况下偷偷溜走。
We will make after the thieves who stole the precious gems.
Wǒmen huì zhuīzōng nàxiē tōule zhèxiē zhēnguì bǎowù de xiǎotōumen。
我们会追踪那些偷了这些珍贵宝物的小偷们。
He had been renting the house on the quiet.
Tā tōutōu de zūxià zhè jiān fángzi。
他偷偷地租下这间房子。
She peeped at him through her fingers.
Tā cóng zhǐfèng zhōng tōutōu kàn tā。
她从指缝中偷偷看他。
I sceretly read up on my sister\'s diary.
Wǒ tōutōu de dúle wǒ jiějie de rìjì。
我偷偷地读了我姐姐的日记。
She skipped off the scene without anyone noticing.
Tā tōutōu líkāile xiànchǎng，méiyǒu rén zhùyì dào tā。
她偷偷离开了现场，没有人注意到她。
Nobody noticed the cat slipping out of a window.
Méiyǒu rén zhùyì dào nà zhī māo cóng yí shàn chuānghù lǐ tōutōu liūle chūqù。
没有人注意到那只猫从一扇窗户里偷偷溜了出去。
I can sneak away when everyone has fallen asleep.
Wǒ kěyǐ zài dàjiā shuìzháo zhī hòu tōutōu liūzǒu。
我可以在大家睡着之后偷偷溜走。
He opened the door and told me to sneak in.
Tā dǎkāi mén，ràng wǒ tōutōu liū jìnqù。
他打开门，让我偷偷溜进去。
He will try to sneak his name in the guest list.
Tā yào shìzhe bǎ tā de míngzi tōutōu jiājìn bīnkè míngdān dāngzhōng。
他要试着把他的名字偷偷加进宾客名单当中。
Jeff was trying to sneak up on me.
Jiéfū zhèngzài tōutōu kàojìn wǒ。
杰夫正在偷偷靠近我。
Why don\'t we steal away into the night?
Wèishénme wǒmen bú zài wǎnshang tōutōu jìnrù ne ？
为什么我们不在晚上偷偷进入呢？
Children may steal out of a fear of dependency.
Háizǐmen kěnéng chūyú duì quēfá dúlì de kǒngjù ér tōutōu liūzǒu。
孩子们可能出于对缺乏独立的恐惧而偷偷溜走。
Many of the students were stealing away from the boring lecture.
Hěnduō xuésheng tōutōu líkāile zhège wúliáo de yǎnjiǎng。
很多学生偷偷离开了这个无聊的演讲。
The pickpocket dodged through the crowd.
Páshǒu tōutōu-mōmō de jǐ guò rénqún。
扒手偷偷摸摸地挤过人群。
He slipped me the key when nobody was looking.
Méi rén kànjiàn de shíhou，tā bǎ yàoshi tōutōu sāi gěi wǒ。
没人看见的时候，他把钥匙偷偷塞给我。
Her ex-boyfriend stalked her.
Tā de qián nányǒu tōutōu gēnzhe tā。
她的前男友偷偷跟着她。
He had entered the room inconspicuously.
Tā tōutōu de jìnle fángjiān，méiyǒu yǐnqǐ rén de zhùyì。
他偷偷地进了房间，没有引起人的注意。
The soldiers were furtively crawling through the night.
Shìbīngmen zhěngyè dōu zài tōutōude púfúqiánjìn。
士兵们整夜都在偷偷地匍匐前进。
I always felt sneakingly that I wanted to be a concert pianist.
Wǒ zǒngshì tōutōu de xiǎng chéngwéi yí gè yīnyuèhuì de gāngqínshī。
我总是偷偷地想成为一个音乐会的钢琴师。
He sneaks voyeuristically around the swimming pool.
Tā tōutōumōmō de zài Yóuyǒngchí biān kuīshì。
他偷偷摸摸地在游泳池边窥视。
He did it covertly.
Tā tōutōu de zuòle zhè jiàn shì。
他偷偷地做了这件事。
The children secretly went to the movies when they were supposed to be at the library.
Háizǐmen běn yīnggāi qù tú shù guǎn，dàn tāmen què tōutōu qù kàn diànyǐng le。
孩子们本应该去图书馆，但他们却偷偷去看电影了。
They charged him with theft.
他们指控他偷窃。
The jury convicted him of theft.
陪审团宣判他犯有偷窃罪。

低声点儿说，别让人偷听去
to steal a look
偷看
to steal a kiss
偷吻

我的房子保了火险，偷盗险和其他险种。
She is lazy when it comes to schoolwork.
她一做作业就偷懒。

小偷知道警察盯上他了。

有人偷了桌子里的钱。

小偷看见了警察后拔腿就跑。
He studies as little as possible at school.
他在学校总是爱偷懒，能少学就少学。
I was pictured at this club twice.
我在这个俱乐部被偷拍了两次。

去市场时，一定要把眼睛睁大点儿，因为最近小偷很多。
I fell into conversation with my work colleagues and got lazy with my work.
我开始和同事聊天，在工作上偷懒了。
The police got the thief after two days.
警察两天后抓住了小偷。
While traveling through Asia, I saw many poachers cage tigers.
在亚洲旅行过程中，我看到许多偷猎者将老虎装进了笼子。
He described the thief accurately.
他准确地描述了小偷的特征。
The thief has escaped.
小偷已经逃跑了。
The police finally caught the thief yesterday.
警察昨天终于抓住了小偷。
I got a new bike yesterday, somebody stole the old one.
有人把我的自行车偷走了，所以我昨天又买了个新的。
Debit card thieves get around PIN obstacle.
盗窃借记卡的小偷很难得获得用户的个人识别密码。
I caught them listening outside the door.
他们在门外偷听被我撞见了。
He was caught stealing.
他偷东西，被抓个正着。
In a few minutes, thieves cleaned out over $10000 of equipment.
短短几分钟，价值一万美元的设备就被小偷洗劫一空。

那个坏蛋，他想偷我的钱。

将某人/某物偷带进一个地方
he stole it from me
他从我这里把它偷走了
Someone\'s taken my pen.
有人偷走了我的钢笔。

汽车给偷走的那个女的

偷窃是不道德的

这个研究表明，男性和女性在发现小偷后的反应是相同的。

用录像带和这人对质后，他只好承认偷了糖。

警察警告小偷不要耍什么花招。

他偷了老板的手表，结果警察找上门了。

他试图为他的偷窃行为狡辩。

小偷闯进商店，但只在钱箱里发现几便士。

两天前，小偷们中了警察的埋伏，被抓住了。

那个小偷看到警车撒腿就跑。

抓捕小偷是警察的职责。

我怀疑他从这个商店偷了珠宝。
Courage is not peeking at the last pages of your whodunit book to find out who did it.
勇气，是看侦探小说时，不先翻到后面几页，偷看一下凶手是谁。

我看书太投入了，都没有注意到钱包被偷了。

A prowler couldn\'t be seen hiding in the dark.

A sneaky thief can easily dip into an open handbag!

小偷在爬过窗户时触动了警报器。
John said he acted alone when he stole the car.

Spencer would never steal he is an angel.

Chèn diànyuán bú zhùyì shí，tā tōule jǐ zhī yān。
趁店员不注意时，他偷了几支烟。

小偷们被用绳子绑在一起。

她抓到她的小狗正在从桌子上偷食物。
Police caught two thieves as they broke into a car.

在两个小偷闯入车内时，警察将他们抓获。
Police chased the thief and eventually recovered the money.

I stole one of her lobster claws after I\'d eaten my own.

在我吃完自己那份以后，我还偷拿了她的一只龙虾钳子。

To steal something of sentimental value shows a total lack of common decency.

有人偷了我的表。

Be careful there always people trying to palm things from your store.

Rénqún cháo xiǎotōu chōngqù。

小狗
xiǎoɡǒu
pup; puppy

这只小狗的背部长了几根刚毛。

那只小狗紧随着主人在草地上散步。

The puppy closely follows its owner walking on the lawn.
小狗总想把一个滚落在沙发底下的肉骨头抠搜出来。
