Měinián，Měiguó yǒu dàyuē yìqiān wǔbǎi wàn zhī māo hé gǒu bèi shāhài。
每年，美国有大约1500万只猫和狗被杀害。
An elderly person may be better suited with a smaller dog.
Yí wèi lǎoniánrén kěnéng gèng shìhé yǎng xiǎo diǎner de gǒu。
一位老年人可能更适合养小点儿的狗。
This dog had never let him down ，he had trained it for many years.
Zhè zhī gǒu cónglái méiyǒu lìng tā shīwàng guò，tā yǐjīng xùnliàn tā hěn duō nián le。
这只狗从来没有令他失望过，他已经训练它很多年了。
她喜爱她的小狗，那小狗也诚然可爱。
Tā xǐ\'ài tā de xiǎogǒu，nà xiǎogǒu yě chéngrán kě\'ài。
She loves her puppy, and the puppy is really lovable.
傀儡集团内部狗咬狗的斗争
kuǐlěi jítuán nèibùgǒu yǎo gǒu de dòuzhēng
a dog-eat-dog struggle within a puppet clique
由于养狗人的疏于防范，致使多人被狗咬伤。
Yóuyú yǎnggǒu rén de shūyú fángfàn，zhìshǐ duōrén bèi gǒu yǎoshāng。
我从小就怕狗，不远处的狗叫声令我心惊胆颤。
Wǒ cóngxiǎo jiù pàgǒu，bùyuǎnchù de gǒujiàoshēng lìng wǒ xīnjīng dǎnchàn。
I have always been afraid of dogs, barking nearby can scare me to death.
成群的狼(猎狗)
chéngqún de láng（liègǒu）
packs of wolves (hounds)
恶狗
ègǒu
a ferocious (or vicious) dog; cur
这条狗紧紧跟随在主人身后。
Zhè tiáo gǒu jǐnjǐn gēnsuí zài zhǔrén shēnhòu。
The dog followed closely behind his master.
你的狗是公的还是母的？
Nǐ de gǒu shì gōng de háishì mǔ de?
Is your dog a he or a she?
狗东西
gǒudōngxi
that son of a bitch
跌了个狗吃屎
diē le gè gǒu chī shǐ
stumble and fall flat on one\'s face
这篇文章写得狗屁不通。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng xiě de gǒupìbùtōng。
This article is mere trash.
狗屎不如
gǒushǐ bùrú
utterly worthless
房间里乱得像狗窝。
Fángjiān lǐ luàn de xiàng gǒuwō。
The room is such a mess that it resembles a doghouse.
这条小狗长得怪模怪样的。
Zhè tiáo xiǎo gǒu zhǎng de guàimúguàiyàng de。
The little dog is queer-looking.
小花狗
xiǎo huāɡǒu
spotted puppy
鸡鸣狗盗之徒
jīmínɡɡǒudào zhī tú 
mean people who resort to petty tricks
拿砖头砍狗
ná zhuāntou kǎn ɡǒu
throw a brick at a dog
累累若丧家之狗
léiléi ruò sàngjiāzhīgǒu 
wretched as a stray cur
别理那条狗。
Bié lǐ nàtiáogǒu。

遛狗
liù gǒu
walk a dog
他们家那狗欺生，我一进院子它就叫。
Tāmen jiā nà gǒu qīshēng，wǒ yí jìn yuànzi tā jiù jiào。
Their dog is fierce towards strangers; he barks at me whenever I enter the courtyard.
有个东西在黑影里蹲着，我也看不清它到底是猫还是狗。
Yǒu gè dōngxi zài hēiyǐng lǐ dūn zhe，wǒ yě kàn bu qīng tā dàodǐ shì māo háishi gǒu。
Some animal was crouching in the shadow. I couldn\'t make out whether it was a cat or a dog.
狗褪了套儿跑了。
Gǒu tuì le tàor pǎo le。
The dog broke loose and ran away.
狗汪汪地叫。
Gǒu wangwang de jiào。
A dog is barking.
小狗
xiǎoɡǒu
pup; puppy
小狗摇着尾巴跑了。
Xiǎogǒu yáo zhe wěiba pǎo le。
The little dog ran off wagging its tail.
鸡叫狗咬
jījiào ɡǒuyǎo

yěɡǒu

Gǒuzàidìshàngdǎgǔnr。
The dog rolled on the ground.
狗崽子
gǒuzǎizi
son of a bitch
空谈很容易，是阿猫阿狗都能做的事情。
Kōngtán hěnróngyì，shì āmāo āgǒu dōu néng zuò de shìqing。
It\'s easy to talk. Everyone does it.
西西是条可爱的白色叭儿狗。
Xīxī shì tiáo kě\'ài de báisè bārgǒu。
Xi Xi is a cute, white Pekinese.
小狗喝水时，嘴里吧唧吧呶的。
Xiǎogǒu hēshuǐ shí，zuǐ lǐ bājī bānáo de。
The puppy makes a lot of noise when it drinks.
这可怜的流浪狗，是个疤瘌眼儿。
Zhè kělián de liúlànggǒu，shì gè bālayǎnr。
What a poor stray dog! It has a scar across one eye.
枕头被小狗撕破了，白花花的羽绒散了一地。
Zhěntou bèi xiǎogǒu sīpò le，báihuāhuā de yǔróng sǎn le yí dì。
The pillow was torn up by the dog, causing white soft feathers to come out of the pillow and spread around the floor.
真是白衣苍狗，一转眼多少年过去了。
Zhēn shì báiyī cānggǒu，yìzhuǎnyǎn duōshǎo nián guòqù le。
How time flies! Years have passed and things have changed so much.
岁月漫长，世事如白云苍狗。
Suìyuè mànzhǎng，shìshì rú báiyún cānggǒu。
How things change in this world!
在金庸的小说里，丐帮帮主善使打狗棒。
Zài Jīn Yōng de xiǎoshuō lǐ，gàibāng bāngzhǔ shànshǐ dǎgǒubàng。
In Jin Yong\'s novels, the master of a gang named Gai is very good at using a special kind of stick.
你听说过狗熊掰苞米的故事吧？
Nǐ tīngshuōguò gǒuxióng bāi bāomǐ de gùshì ba？
Have you heard of the story in which a bear breaks off corncobs?
小狗突然暴死，我们都很心疼。
Xiǎogǒu tūrán bàosǐ，wǒmen dōu hěnxīnténg。
The little dog died without any warning, breaking our hearts.
小狗发出了悲怆的“呜呜”声。
Xiǎogǒu fāchū le bēichàng de“wūwū”shēng。
The dog whimpered dejectedly.
她神情悲戚，因为她的小狗死了。
Tā shénqíng bēiqi，yīnwèi tā de xiǎogǒu sǐ le。
She is saddened by the death of her little dog.
人们都骂他臭狗屎，他也不去争辩。
Rénmen dōu mà tā chòugǒushǐ，tā yě bùqù zhēngbiàn。
People speak very low of him, but he never challenges them.
小狗在草坪里蹿奔玩耍。
Xiǎogǒu zài cǎopíng lǐ cuānbēn wánshuǎ。
The little dog is leaping and running in the grass.
他整天斗鸡走狗，不务正业。
Tā zhěngtiān dòujī zǒugǒu，bùwù zhèngyè。
He idles away one day after another, without attending to his duties.
那些地霸恶狗经常危害当地人民。
Nàxiē dìbà ègǒu jīngcháng wēihài dāngdì rénmín。
Those extremely vicious gangsters pose a great threat to the locals.
小狗豆豆耳尖，老远就听见了主人的脚步声。
Xiǎogǒu dòudòu ěrjiān，lǎoyuǎn jiù tīngjiàn le zhǔrén de jiǎobùshēng。
The dog Doudou is sharp of hearing; it is able to hear the footsteps of its master from far away.
小刘下班回家时，她家的狗飞奔过来迎接。
Xiǎo Liú xiàbān huíjiā shí，tā jiā de gǒu fēibēn guòlái yíngjiē。
Xiao Liu\'s dog runs to greet her the moment she gets home.
车祸中，这只可怜的小狗死于非命。
Chēhuò zhōng，zhèzhī kělián de xiǎogǒu sǐyú fēimìng。
This poor little puppy died in a traffic accident.
这只小狗的背部长了几根刚毛。
Zhèzhī xiǎogǒu de bèibù zhǎngle jǐ gēn gāngmáo。
The puppy has several bristles on its back.
你真是狗胆包天，公家的钱也敢挪用？
Nǐ zhēnshì gǒudǎn bāotiān，gōngjiā de qián yě gǎn nuóyòng？
You are monstrously audacious, how dare you misappropriate public funds?
我今天先饶你一条狗命，下次再犯在我手里决不客气。
Wǒ jīntiān xiān ráo nǐ yì tiáo gǒumìng,xià cì zài fànzài wǒ shǒulǐ juébú kèqì.
I\'ll let you off today, you piece of trash. But if you dare misbehave in front of me again,  I will not be that kind to you again.
她说她会游泳，原来是狗刨。
Tā shuō tā huì yóuyǒng，yuánlái shì gǒubào。
What she claimed as an ability to swim is actually dog paddling.
他就是个狗屎堆，没人愿意理他。
Tā jiùshì gè gǒushǐduī，méi rén yuànyì lǐ tā。
He is completely disdained by everybody.
他这样陷害朋友，简直是狗彘不若。
Tā zhèyàng xiànhài péngyou，jiǎnzhí shì gǒuzhì búruò。
Behavior like framing his friends makes him even worse that a dog or pig.
他就是狗嘴里吐不出象牙，什么难听说什么。
Tā jiùshì gǒuzuǐ lǐ tǔ bùchū xiàng yá，shénme nántīng shuō shénme。
He always says the worst thing.  Well, what can you expect from a dog but a bark.
挂羊头卖狗肉是那些奸商常用的伎俩。
Guà yángtóu mài gǒuròu shì nàxiē jiānshāng chángyòng de jìliǎng。
Palming off goods inferior to what they purport to be is a common trick of unscrupulous merchants.
妈妈总是教育我不要结交狐朋狗友。
Māma zǒngshì jiàoyù wǒ búyào jiéjiāo húpéng gǒuyǒu。
Mother always taught me not to make friends with scoundrels.
会场场面失控了，变得鸡飞狗跳，一片混乱。
Huìchǎng chǎngmiàn shīkòng le，biàn de jīfēi gǒutiào，yí piàn hùnluàn。
The assembly went out of control and became a scene of turmoil.
两只小狗躲在树后交合。
Liǎng zhī xiǎogǒu duǒzài shùhòu jiāohé。
Two pups were having intercourse behind a tree.
那只小狗紧随着主人在草地上散步。
Nà zhī xiǎogǒu jǐnsuí zhe zhǔrén zài cǎodì shàng sànbù。
The puppy closely follows its owner walking on the lawn.
狼狗的警惕性很高，任何风吹草动都躲不过它的眼睛。
Lánggǒu de jǐngtìxìng hěngāo，rènhé fēngchuī cǎodòng dōu duǒbúguò tā de yǎnjīng。
The demi-wolf is very alert - nothing can escape its eyes.
小狗总想把一个滚落在沙发底下的肉骨头抠搜出来。
Xiǎogǒu zǒng xiǎng bǎ yígè gǔnluò zài shāfā dǐxià de ròugǔtou kōusōu chūlái。
Dogs can always search out a bone out which rolls under the sofa.
刚给小狗穿上新的宠物装，它就尿了，把胯裆处尿湿了一大片！
Gāng gěi xiǎogǒu chuānshàng xīn de chǒngwùzhuāng，tā jiù niào le，bǎ kuàdāngchù niàoshī le yí dà piàn！
The minute the dog wore new pet clothes, it urinated and wet its crotch.
我养的小猫和小狗竟然可以款洽地同住一室。
Wǒ yǎng de xiǎomāo hé xiǎogǒu jìngrán kěyǐ kuǎnqià de tóngzhù yí shì。
The cat and the dog I raise can live in a room cordially and harmoniously.
他稂莠不分，整天结交一些狐朋狗友。
Tā lángyǒu bùfēn，zhěngtiān jiéjiāo yìxiē húpéng gǒuyǒu。
He can not distinguish good people from bad, and keeps depraved company all day long.
他经常凌虐自家的小猫小狗。
Tā jīngcháng língnüè zìjiā de xiǎomāo xiǎogǒu。
He often abuses the puppies, and kittens in his home.
六畜是马、牛、羊、猪、狗、鸡这六种家畜家禽的合称。
Liùchù shì mǎ、niú、yáng、zhū、gǒu、jī zhè liùzhǒng jiāchù jiāqín de héchēng。
The six domestic animals refer to the horse, ox, goat, pig, dog and chicken.
他家的狗是笼养的，你不用害怕！
Tā jiā de gǒu shì lóngyǎng de，nǐ búyòng hàipà！
Their dog is raised in a cage, so you need not be afraid.
他非常喜欢我怀里这只毛乎乎的小狗。
Tā fēicháng xǐhuan wǒ huáilǐ zhèzhī máohūhū de xiǎogǒu。
He really likes the little hairy dog in my arms.
小狗不住地磨烦着要我带它出去散步，可我正忙着呢！
Xiǎogǒu búzhù de mòfán zhe yào wǒ dài tā chūqù sànbù，kě wǒ zhèng máng zhe ne！
The dog keeps pestering me to take him out for a walk. But I am busy now.
他家大门口的木桩上拴着一只看门大狗。
Tā jiā dàménkǒu de mùzhuāng shàng shuān zhe yìzhī kānmén dàgǒu。
A big watch dog is tied to the wood pile in the front of his house.
她家的小狗染上了囊尾虫病，只好带它去看兽医。
Tā jiā de xiǎogǒu rǎnshàng le nángwěichóngbìng，zhǐhǎo dài tā qù kàn shòuyī。
Her dog was infested cysticercus. She has to take it to see a veterinarian.
两只小狗正怒目而视，它们各自的主人却不知是因为什么。
Liǎng zhī xiǎogǒu zhèng nùmù érshì，tāmen gèzì de zhǔrén què bùzhī shì yīnwèi shénme。
The two dogs are staring angrily at each other, but their masters don\'t know why.
他的小狗很听话，主人叫它趴下它就趴下。
Tā de xiǎogǒu hěntīnghuà，zhǔrén jiào tā pāxià tā jiù pāxià。
His dog is obedient; it will lie on its stomach when its master orders.
坐在狗拉的扒犁上在雪地里滑行，是北方冬季里最有趣的运动。
Zuòzài gǒulā de pálí shàng zài xuědì lǐ huáxíng，shì běifāng dōngjì lǐ zuì yǒuqù de yùndòng。
Sleighing over the snow is the most interesting sport in the north in winter.
我家小狗特别聪明，只用它自己的盆子吃饭。
Wǒjiā xiǎogǒu tèbié cōngmíng，zhǐyòng tā zìjǐ de pénzi chī fàn。
Our puppy is very smart, he only uses his own bowl to eat.
小狗在一个小时内尿了十多次，这样的频次不太正常吧？
Xiǎogǒu zài yígè xiǎoshí nèi niào le shí duō cì，zhèyàng de píncì bú tài zhèngcháng ba？
The small dog peed over ten times in an hour, is it natural to have such frequency?
这只机灵的小狗，真惹人喜爱。
Zhèzhī jīlíng de xiǎogǒu，zhēn rěrén xǐ\'ài。
The clever dog attracts people\'s love.
他穿上一身西服，也人模狗样的了。
Tā chuānshàng yìshēn xīfú，yě rénmó gǒuyàng de le。
Wearing a business suit, he looks good now.
宝宝穿上爸爸的衣服，人模狗样地走来走去。
Bǎobao chuānshàng bàba de yīfu，rénmógǒuyàng de zǒuláizǒuqù。
The baby put on his father\'s clothes and walked the way his father did.
这只小狗有一身长长的茸毛。
Zhèzhī xiǎogǒu yǒu yìshēn chángcháng de róngmáo。
The dog has long fine hairs all over its body.
古代人们不了解月食出现的原因，误以为是天狗把月亮吃掉了。
Gǔdài rénmen bùliǎojiě yuèshí chūxiàn de yuányīn，wù yǐwéi shì tiāngǒu bǎ yuèliàng chīdiào le。
People in ancient times knew nothing about how the lunar eclipse came into being. They falsely believed that it was because a dog in heaven swallowed the moon.
你顺着我手指的方向望去，就会看到天狗了。
Nǐ shùn zhe wǒ shǒuzhǐ de fāngxiàng wàngqù，jiùhuì kàndào tiāngǒu le。
Look in the way I showed you, and you\'ll see the star named &quot;heavenly dog&quot;.
妹妹正在给小狗喂食呢。
Mèimei zhèngzài gěi xiǎogǒu wèishí ne。
My little sister is feeding the puppy.
叔叔家的小狗总是把掉在地上的线团当玩具。
Shūshu jiā de xiǎogǒu zǒngshì bǎ diàozài dìshàng de xiàntuán dāng wánjù。
The puppy in my uncle\'s always plays with balls of thread which fall to the ground.
最近小区里野狗很多，你要小心点。
Zuìjìn xiǎoqū lǐ yěgǒu hěnduō，nǐ yào xiǎoxīn diǎn。
There are many stray dogs in the housing estate, watch out.
杂毛狗夹着尾巴从街角跑过。
Zámáogǒu jiā zhe wěibā cóng jiējiǎo pǎoguò。
The dog with a blend of different hair colours ran through the street with its tail between its legs.
狗的种属非常繁多。
Gǒu de zhǒng shǔ fēicháng fánduō。
Dogs have a variety of breeds.
你若是真做出抛妻弃子的事，那还不如猪狗呢！
Nǐ ruòshì zhēn zuòchū pāoqī qìzǐ de shì，nà hái bùrú zhūgǒu ne！
If you really do things like abandoning your wife and your son, you are no better than pigs and dogs.
这些贫农们认为庄头是地主的走狗。
Zhèxiē pínnóngmen rènwéi zhuāngtóu shì dìzhǔ de zǒugǒu。
These poor farmers consider land managers the servile followers of land owners.
这只小狗真惹人爱怜。
Zhèzhī xiǎogǒu zhēn rěrén\'àilián。
The puppy made everyone coo.
小事情可以成为大新闻，比如人咬了狗。
Xiǎoshìqing kěyǐ chéngwéi dàxīnwén，bǐrú rén yǎole gǒu。
Small things can become big news, for instance if a person bites a dog.
他踹到了狗屎。
Tā chuàidàole gǒushǐ。
He trod in dog\'s mess.
小狗在雪堆里打滚。
Xiǎogǒu zài xuěduī lǐ dǎgǔn。
The little dog rolled about in the snow.
人们经常把狗当作最忠实的朋友。
Rénmen jīngcháng bǎ gǒu dàngzuò zuìzhōngshíde péngyou。
People often regard dogs as their most loyal friends.
对面跑过来一只小狗。
Duìmiàn pǎoguòlái yìzhī xiǎogǒu。
A small dog ran up right in front of us.
他狗急跳墙，口不择言。
Tā gǒujítiàoqiáng，kǒubùzéyán。
He\'s really clutching at straws now – he\'ll say whatever it takes.
我要出去遛狗。
Wǒ yào chūqù liùgǒu.
I have to go out to walk the dog.
狗食
gǒu shí
dog food
狗的嗅觉很灵敏。
Gǒu de xiùjué hěnlíngmǐn。
Dogs have an acute sense of smell.
她总爱养很多狗。
Tā zǒng ài yǎng hěnduō gǒu。
She\'s always kept lots of dogs.
路上被狗袭击了。
Lùshang bèi gǒu xíjī le 。
I was attacked by a dog on the way to work.
哈巴狗的口吻比狼狗的口吻短。
狗坵脾气。
行同狗彘。

&quot;The dog\'s owner&quot; is written as &quot;the owner of the dog&quot; when using analysis.
Zài yìngyòng yǔfǎ fēnxī shí，“the dog\'s owner （gǒuzhǔrén）”bèi xiěchéng“the owner of the dog（gǒu de zhǔrén）”。
在应用语法分析时，“the dog\'s owner（狗主人）”被写成“the owner of the dog（狗的主人）”。

眼前的景物令人惊叹。
慨然而叹。
令人慨叹不已。
英年早逝，真是可叹。
奇幻的黄山云海，令人叹为观止。
无不真心叹服。
别总是唉声叹气的。
长长地叹了一口气。
叹赏不止。
摇头叹息。
诗人墨客到此不免要咏叹一番。
长吁短叹，终日忧悒。
观看儿童杂技表演，不时有人咂嘴赞叹。
他的枪法令人赞叹。
to bemoan one\'s fate
悲叹自身的命运
ejaculatory words
感叹话
an eloquent sigh
绘声绘色的叹息
to moan one\'s fate
哀叹某人的命运
a profound sigh
长叹
to repress a sigh
忍住叹息
to sigh one\'s youth away
叹息着度过青春年华
to weep one\'s misfortune
悲叹自己的不幸
He sighed deeply after learning he had no chance to win the contest.
得知自己无法赢得这场比赛时，他深深地叹了口气。
\'She doesn\'t want to marry me,\'  he said with a deep sigh.
“她不想嫁给我，”说着他深深地叹了口气。

大峡谷的景色简直令人叹为观止。
to heave a sigh
叹了一口气
to lament (the fact) that...
哀叹…(的事实)
&quot;prices have dropped,&quot; he lamented
“价格下跌了，”他哀叹道
with a sigh/laugh
叹了口气/笑着地
Gregory is a creative designer and his work always amazes us.
格雷戈里是个具有创造性的设计师，他的作品总是让我们惊叹。

他手劈砖头的绝活儿让我们叹为观止。

人们惊叹他在这个时候还能保持如此旺盛的精力。
His magic act will amaze and astonish you.

他的神奇表现将会令你惊叹不止。

Kate took a long pull on her cigarette and sighed.
Kǎi tè shēnshēn xīle kǒu yān，tàn le kǒu qì。
凯特深深吸了口烟，叹了口气。

“我甚至都不会穿针”，朱莉叹息着说。
In two minutes his eyelids closed, his chin fell on his breast, he gave a deep sigh, and instantly was in a profound sleep, breathing loudly.
Liǎng fēnzhōng hòu tā de yǎnpí héshàngle，xiàba chuídào xiōngkǒu，tā shēnshēn de tànle kǒu qì，suíhòu lìjí xiànrùle hānshuì，xiǎngliàng de dǎzhe hūlū。
两分钟后他的眼皮合上了，下巴垂到胸口，他深深地叹了口气，随后立即陷入了酣睡，响亮地打着呼噜。
He sighed, closed his eyes and drifted finally to sleep.
Tā tànle yì kǒu qì，bìshàng yǎnjing，zuìhòu mímíhūhú jìnrù mèngxiāng。
他叹了一口气，闭上眼睛，最后迷迷糊糊进入梦乡。

He heard his breath echo off the concrete walls and he sighed again.

英语中的感叹词该怎么用呢？
Yīngyǔ zhōng de gǎntàncí gāi zěnme yòng ne？
How do I use interjections in English?
感叹句的结尾应该使用叹号。
Gǎntànjù de jiéwěi yīnggāi shǐyòng tànhào。
An exclamatory sentence should be followed by an exclamation mark.
这篇文章一连用了二十多个感叹句。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng yìlián yòng le èrshí duō gè gǎntànjù。
This article has over twenty exclamatory sentences in a row.

He kept sighing and looked very downcast.

Zhèxiē fùyù de dìzhǔ qiángpò nóngmín zài Dìlǐ gōngzuò。
这些富裕的地主强迫农民在地里工作。
The confession was uncoerced.
Cǐ xiàng zhāogòng shì fēi qiángpò de。
此项招供是非强迫的。
My boss is a dictator who makes everyone work overtime.
Wǒ de lǎobǎn shì gè jīngcháng qiángpò dàjiā jiābān de dúcáizhě。
我的老板是个经常强迫大家加班的独裁者。
The teacher bludgeoned the students into learning the math formulas.
Zhè wèi lǎoshī qiángpò xuésheng xuéxí shùxué gōngshì。
这位老师强迫学生学习数学公式。
They sandbagged him to make dinner for everyone.
Tāmen cūbào de qiángpò tā wèi měi gè rén zuò wǎncān。
他们粗暴地强迫他为每个人做晚餐。
They didn\'t have to use coercion.
Tāmen bù xūyào qiángpò。
他们不需要强迫。
The high winds forced the sailboat to sail a tack.
Qiángfēng pòshǐ fānchuán zhuǎnbiànle hángxiàng。
强风迫使帆船转变了航向。
The movement, however, spread with an extraordinary sense of urgency.

然而，这个乐章充满一种强烈的紧迫感。

这个强盗殴打他，迫使他屈服。

迫于形势
pò yú xíngshì
under the stress of circumstances; under the pressure of events
他迫于压力，不得不让位给部下。
Tā pòyú yālì，bùdébù ràng wèi gěi bùxià。
He had to give up his position to a subordinate.
在秦朝的苛法逼迫下，终于发生了农民起义。

The peasants were constrained by the harsh laws of the Qin Dynasty and staged an uprising.
由于生活窘迫，她一直以卖春为生。

She has been living from selling sex due to poverty.

Because of limited time, we will discuss this subject later.

The situation lets us enter a more open dialogue, for mutual benefit.

pòshǐ jiùfàn
compel sb. to submit

pòshǐ fēijī jiàngluò
force the plane down

迫使某人作出诺言
make him behave

迫使某人做某事

迫使某人做某事

迫切性
pòqièxìng
urgency

迫切。
迫切

要求十分迫切。

迫切需要解决的问题

迫切的需要

[+changes etc] 迫切要求某事

Civilians were strafed in an effort to force the country\'s surrender.
Píngmín shòudào hōngzhà，yǐqī yāpò gāiguó tóuxiáng。
平民受到轰炸，以期压迫该国投降。
遭受惨无人道的迫害
zāoshòu cǎnwúréndào de pòhài 
be subjected to inhuman persecution
政治迫害
zhèngzhì pòhài
political persecution
蓄谋迫害
xùmóu pòhài
harbour a design of persecuting sb.
他曾经被扣上过红帽子，遭受了不公的迫害。
Tā céngjīng bèi kòushàng guò hóngmàozi，zāoshòu le bùgōng de pòhài。
He once was stigmatized as a Communist, and suffered unjust persecution.
为躲避法西斯的迫害，他不得不流徙到国外。
Wèi duǒbì Fǎxīsī de pòhài，tā bùdébùliúxǐ dào guówài。
In order to evade the persecution of fascists, he had to escape abroad.
他因乱党的罪名受到迫害。
Tā yīn luàndǎng de zuìmíng shòudào pòhài。
He was persecuted on the accusation of a rebellious subject.
他在“四清”运动中受到了迫害，是被冤枉的。
Tā zài“sìqīng”yùndòng zhōng shòudào le pòhài，shì bèi yuānwǎng de。
He was unfairly persecuted in the &quot;Four Clearances&quot;, which meant clearing of politics, clearing of organization, clearing of economy and clearing of ideology.
封建社会，某些奴隶主用枝解等残忍手段迫害百姓。
Fēngjiàn shèhuì，mǒuxiē núlìzhǔ yòng zhījiě děng cánrěn shǒuduàn pòhài bǎixìng。
In feudal society, some slave owners persecuted the common people with methods like dismemberment.
渣子洞是大革命时期国民党迫害共产党员的集中营。
Zhāzidòng shì dàgémìng shíqī guómíndǎng pòhài gòngchǎndǎngyuán de jí zhōng yíng。
The Zhazi Cave is a concentration camp where the Kuomintang persecuted our communist party members during the Great Revolution.
迫害
横遭迫害
一个酷虐的迫害狂
受到迫害
深受迫害
迫害致残。
被迫害致死。
They created incidents and committed outrages against Chse nationals.
他们制造事端残醋迫害华侨。
Many people still bear the scars of Nazi oppression.
Xǔduōrén réngrán chéngshòuzhe nàcuì pòhài liúxià de chuāngshāng。
许多人仍然承受着纳粹迫害留下的创伤。
He freely admits that he has persecuted his victims to the death.
Tā tǎnshuài de chéngrèn shì tā bǎ shòuhàirén pòhài zhìsǐ。
他坦率地承认是他把受害人迫害致死。
They had witch hunts here a generation ago，or more.
Yuē sānshí nián huòzhě gèng jiǔ yǐqián，tāmen zài zhèli shòudào guò zhèngzhì pòhài。
约三十年或者更久以前，他们在这里受到过政治迫害。
Jews were persecuted in the former Soviet Union.
Yóutàirén zài Qiánsūlián zāodào pòhài。
犹太人在前苏联遭到迫害。
The King ordained the persecution and expulsion of the Jews.
Guówáng mìnglìng pòhài hé qūzhú yóutàirén。
国王命令迫害和驱逐犹太人。
他们都迫不及待地想知道发生了什么事。
Tāmen dōu pòbùjídài de xiǎngzhīdào fāshēng le shénme shì。
They were too impatient to know what had happened.
迫不及待
pòbùjídài
cannot wait
她迫不及待地把房子卖掉。
Tā pòbùjídài de bǎ fángzǐ màidiào.
She couldn\'t wait to sell the house.
迫不及待
I can\'t wait to turn the tables and see what happens to him.
我迫不及待想要扭转时局，看看他会有什么下场。
Children can\'t wait for the summer to dive in the river.
孩子们迫不及待地希望夏天的到来，这样他们就能跳进河里游泳了。
The eager children can\'t wait to go to Disneyland.
这些兴奋的孩子迫不及待地想要去迪斯尼乐园。
I can\'t wait to fence against our rivals next week.
我迫不及待地要下周和对手一较高下。
I can\'t wait to spend the entire afternoon floating down the river.
我迫不及待地想要顺流而下，在河上度过整个下午。
She couldn\'t wait to leave, and neither could I.
她迫不及待地想要离开，我也是。
Sally couldn\'t wait to get home and see her husband, moreover, she wanted to see her children.
莎莉迫不及待地想回到家与丈夫团聚，而且她非常想见到自己的几个孩子。
He was desperate to have one final crack at winning.
Tā pòbùjídài de xiǎng yào qǔdé huòshèng de zuìhòu jīhuì。
他迫不及待地想要取得获胜的最后机会。
The teacher fell over backwards to accommodate the parents.
Lǎoshī pòbùjídài de pèihé jiāzhǎng。
老师迫不及待地配合家长。
He leaped at the chance to move to New York with his company.
Tā pòbùjídài de xiǎng chènzhe zhè cì jīhuì suí tā de gōngsī yìqǐ bāndào Niǔyuē。
他迫不及待地想趁着这次机会随他的公司一起搬到纽约。
She always runs to Italy，because she has a lover there.
Tā zǒngshì pòbùjídài de gǎnwǎng Yìdàlì，yīnwèi tā zài Nàlǐ yǒu gè qíngrén。
她总是迫不及待地赶往意大利，因为她在那里有个情人。
市长迫不得已向市民道歉。
Shìzhǎng pòbùdéyǐ xiàng shìmín dàoqiàn.
The mayor had no alternative but to apologize to the townspeople.
迫不得已
out of necessity
迫不得已
百无聊赖时我就随手抓过一本书来，强迫自己看下去。
Bǎiwúliáolài shí wǒ jiù suíshǒu zhuāguò yìběnshū lái，qiǎngpò zìjǐ kànxiàqù。
In times of sheer boredom I would pick up a book and force myself to read.
被迫承认错误
bèipò chéngrèn cuòwù 
be forced to admit one\'s mistakes
他们逼迫他辞职。
Tāmen bīpò tā cízhí。
They forced him to resign.
遭受惨无人道的迫害
zāoshòu cǎnwúréndào de pòhài 
be subjected to inhuman persecution
他从容不迫，面带笑容。
Tā cóngróngbúpò，miàn dài xiàoróng。
He was calm and unhurried and wore a smiling face.
时间紧迫，我不能多考虑。
Shíjiān jǐnpò，wǒ búnéng duō kǎolǜ。
Time is running out, I can\'t give it much thought.
他被迫躲藏起来。
Tā bèipò duǒcáng qǐlái。
He was forced to go into hiding.
他弃家出走，是对旧社会婚姻压迫的反动。
Tā qì jiā chūzǒu，shì duì jiùshèhuì hūnyīn yāpò de fǎndòng。
He finally left home in an effort to counter the tyranny of arranged marriage in the old society.
哪里有压迫，哪里就有反抗。
Nǎlǐ yǒu yāpò，nǎlǐ jiù yǒu fǎnkàng。
Where there is oppression, there is resistance.
谁也没有强迫他，是他甘愿这么做的。
Shuí yě méiyǒu qiǎngpò tā，shì tā gānyuàn zhème zuò de。
Nobody forced him to do it; he did it of his own free will.
那家工厂无人订货，被迫关闭。
Nà jiā gōngchǎngwú rén dìnghuò，bèipò guānbì。
The factory had to close down through lack of orders.
陷入饥寒交迫的困难境地
xiànrù jīhánjiāopò de kùnnan jìngdì 
suffer the terrible hardship of hunger and cold
这是当前最急迫的任务。
Zhè shì dāngqián zuì jípò de rènwu。
This is the most pressing task at present.
事情很急迫，得赶快处理。
Shìqinghěn jípò，děi gǎnkuài chǔlǐ。
The matter is urgent and something\'s got to be done about it at once.
时间紧迫
shíjiān jǐnpò
be pressed for time
我有更紧迫的事情要做。
Wǒ yǒu gèngjǐnpò de shìqingyào zuò。
I have more pressing things to attend to.
形势很紧迫。
Xíngshì hěn jǐnpò。
The situation is critical.

shēnghuó jiǒngpò

处境窘迫
chǔjìng jiǒngpò

pòshǐ jiùfàn
compel sb. to submit
他一辈子老实、无能，对环境的压迫逆来顺受。
Tā yíbèizi lǎoshi、wúnéng，duì huánjìng de yāpò nìláishùnshòu。
All his life he had been simple, ineffective, docilely accepting the worst his environment had given him.

pǎijī pàodàn

pò yú xíngshì

hūxī pòcù
be short of breath

Zài rénmen de pòcù xià，tā cái bǎ zhèjiànshì yìngchéngxiàlái。
She was pressurized into agreeing to do it.

Búyào qiǎngpò wǒ tóngyì nǐ de yìjiàn。

shēngyuán bèi yāpò mínzú de zhèngyì dòuzhēng

Rènwu jiānjù，tóngshí shíjiān yòu hěn jǐnpò。
The task is arduous; besides, there\'s not much time.

bèi xiépò cānyù fànzuì

The tumour constricts the nerves and causes pain.

cóngróngbúpò

Gémìngjūn cuīpò huángdì tuìwèi。
The revolutionary force forced the emperor to step down.
我国劳动人民最终推翻了官僚资本主义的压迫。
Wǒ guó láodòng rénmín zuì zhōng tuīfān le guānliáo zīběnzhǔyì de yāpò。
The working class of our country finally overthrew the oppression of bureaucrats.
他曾经被扣上过红帽子，遭受了不公的迫害。
Tā céngjīng bèi kòushàng guò hóngmàozi，zāoshòu le bùgōng de pòhài。
He once was stigmatized as a Communist, and suffered unjust persecution.
生活窘迫的他拿新衣服换了些红票。
Shēnghuó jiǒngpò de tā ná xīn yīfu huàn le xiē hóngpiào。
He was so poor that he had to exchange the new clothes for money.
他被迫在红契上签了字，接受了所有的不公平条约。
Tā bèipò zài hóngqì shàng qiān le zì，jiēshòu le suǒyǒu de bùgōngpíng tiáoyuē。
He was forced to sign on the title deed, and accepted all the unjust treaties.
被迫辍学的孩子们希望能回到学校读书。
Bèipò chuòxué de háizimen xīwàng néng huídào xuéxiào dúshū。
Children who are forced to drop out of school hope they can come back.
我因为家累，被迫放弃出国机会。
Wǒ yīnwèi jiālèi，bèipò fàngqì chūguó jīhuì。
Encumbered with a family, I have to give up the opportunity of going abroad.
解放后老百姓再也不用过饥寒交迫的日子了！
Jiěfàng hòu lǎobǎixìng zài yě búyòng guò jīhán jiāopò de rìzi le！
People did not have to suffer hunger and cold any more after the Liberation in 1949.
都快考试了他还是一点紧迫感也没有。
Dōu kuài kǎoshì le tā háishi yìdiǎn jǐnpògǎn yě méiyǒu。
He doesn\'t feel nervous at all about the coming exams.
科技创新既有重要性也有紧迫性。
Kējì chuàngxīn jìyǒu zhòngyàoxìng yě yǒu jǐnpòxìng。
Scientific innovation  is both important and urgent.
在秦朝的苛法逼迫下，终于发生了农民起义。
Zài Qíncháo de kēfǎ bīpò xià，zhōng yú fāshēng le nóngmín qǐyì。
The peasants were constrained by the harsh laws of the Qin Dynasty and staged an uprising.
他因多门考试不及格，被迫留班。
Tā yīn duō mén kǎoshì bùjígé，bèipò liúbān。
After failing in several exams, he was forced to stay in his grade.
为躲避法西斯的迫害，他不得不流徙到国外。
Wèi duǒbì Fǎxīsī de pòhài，tā bùdébùliúxǐ dào guówài。
In order to evade the persecution of fascists, he had to escape abroad.
他因乱党的罪名受到迫害。
Tā yīn luàndǎng de zuìmíng shòudào pòhài。
He was persecuted on the accusation of a rebellious subject.
由于生活窘迫，她一直以卖春为生。
Yóuyú shēnghuó jiǒngpò，tā yìzhí yǐ màichūn wéishēng。
She has been living from selling sex due to poverty.
他的辖区发生了刑讯迫供的事，他不得不引咎辞职。
Tā de xiáqū fāshēng le xíngxùn pògòng de shì，tā bùdébùyǐnjiù cízhí。
He had to acknowledge his mistake and resign because the use of torture to extort a confession happened within the area he administers.
我们不想用“以战迫和”的方式来解决政治矛盾。
Wǒmen bùxiǎng yòng“yǐzhànpòhé”de fāngshì lái jiějué zhèngzhì máodùn。
We don’t want to handle political contradictions by means of forcing compromise through fighting.
社区里发布了限期迫迁违章建筑的通知。
Shèqū lǐ fābù le xiànqī pòqiān wéizhāng jiànzhù de tōngzhī。
The community sent out a notice of compulsory evacuation of the substandard building before the deadline.
不要等到环境恶化了，才明白保护环境的迫切性和重要性。
Búyào děngdào huánjìng èhuà le，cái míngbai bǎohù huánjìng de pòqièxìng hé zhòngyàoxìng。
Don’t wait until the environment has deteriorated until we figure out the urgency and importance of environmental protection.
他迫于压力，不得不让位给部下。
Tā pòyú yālì，bùdébù ràng wèi gěi bùxià。
He had to give up his position to a subordinate.
历史上我国曾被迫签订了太多屈节辱国的条约。
Lìshǐshàng wǒguó céng bèipò qiāndìng le tài duō qūjié rǔguó de tiáoyuē。
In  history, China has been forced to sign too many humiliating treaties.
你不要强迫他做他不愿意做的事了，人各有志嘛。
Nǐ búyào qiǎngpò tā zuò tā bú yuànyì zuò de shì le，rén gè yǒuzhì ma。
Don\'t force him to do what he is unwilling to do, everyone has his own ambitions.
他在“四清”运动中受到了迫害，是被冤枉的。
Tā zài“sìqīng”yùndòng zhōng shòudào le pòhài，shì bèi yuānwǎng de。
He was unfairly persecuted in the &quot;Four Clearances&quot;, which meant clearing of politics, clearing of organization, clearing of economy and clearing of ideology.
时间紧迫，我们必须打速决战。
Shíjiān jǐnpò，wǒmen bìxū dǎ sùjuézhàn。
We must win a quick victory due to the shortage of time.
敌人想尽一切办法诱迫他说出情报。
Dírén xiǎngjìn yíqiè bànfǎ yòupò tā shuōchū qíngbào。
The enemy tried every means to cajole him into telling the information.
由于时间紧迫，这个问题我们以后再议。
Yóuyú shíjiān jǐnpò，zhège wèntí wǒmen yǐhòu zàiyì。
Because of limited time, we will discuss this subject later.
封建社会，某些奴隶主用枝解等残忍手段迫害百姓。
Fēngjiàn shèhuì，mǒuxiē núlìzhǔ yòng zhījiě děng cánrěn shǒuduàn pòhài bǎixìng。
In feudal society, some slave owners persecuted the common people with methods like dismemberment.
由于周转金不足，房产公司被迫倒闭。
Yóuyú zhōuzhuǎnjīn bùzú，fángchǎn gōngsī bèipò dǎobì。
With an insufficent turnover fund, the real-estate company was forced to declare bankruptcy.
那场洪水，让大家意识到了重新筑堤的重要性和迫切性。
Nà chǎng hóngshuǐ，ràng dàjiā yìshí dào le chóngxīn zhùdī de zhòngyàoxìng hé pòqiēxìng。
The flood made people realize the importance and urgency of rebuilding the dike.
渣子洞是大革命时期国民党迫害共产党员的集中营。
Zhāzidòng shì dàgémìng shíqī guómíndǎng pòhài gòngchǎndǎngyuán de jí zhōng yíng。
The Zhazi Cave is a concentration camp where the Kuomintang persecuted our communist party members during the Great Revolution.
警务人员凭直接经验得知案情的危险和紧迫。
Jǐngwù rényuán píng zhíjiē jīngyàn dézhī ànqíng de wēixiǎn hé jǐnpò。
The policemen realized the danger, and urgency of this case based on their direct experience.
奴隶社会中的奴隶受自由民的压迫。
Núlì shèhuì zhōng de núlì shòu zìyóu mín de yāpò。
In slave societies, slaves were oppressed by freemen.
她被迫卖掉首饰。
Tā bèipò màidiào shǒushi。
She was forced to sell her jewellery.
她被迫辍学。
Tā bèipò chuòxué。
She was forced to give up her studies.
反抗压迫
fǎnkàngyāpò
resist oppression
她小时候过着饥寒交迫的生活。
Tā xiǎoshíhòu guòzhe jīhánjiāopò de shēnghuó.
When she was young she experienced both hunger and cold.
迫不及待
pòbùjídài
cannot wait
市长迫不得已向市民道歉。
Shìzhǎng pòbùdéyǐ xiàng shìmín dàoqiàn.
The mayor had no alternative but to apologize to the townspeople.
她迫不及待地把房子卖掉。
Tā pòbùjídài de bǎ fángzǐ màidiào.
She couldn\'t wait to sell the house.
解决交通堵塞迫在眉睫。
Jiějué jiāotōng dǔsè pòzàiméijié.
A solution to the traffic jam problem is imminent.
囊肿压迫神经。
Nángzhǒng yāpò shénjīng。

It is strictly stated in our law that hunting is forbidden during the non-hunting period.
防止在枝节问题上纠缠不休
fángzhǐ zài zhījié wèntí shàngjiūchánbùxiū
avoid endless quibbling over side issues
休止。
争论无休止。

xiūzhàn zhuànɡtài

你休想逃脱。

Gōngrénmen zhèngzài gēqī，zhōng wǔ cáinéng xiūxi。
The workers are tapping lacquer trees, they won\'t have a rest until midday.
挂锄后，他坐下来喝水休息。
Guàchú hòu，tā zuòxiàlái hēshuǐ xiūxi。
After putting away the hoe, he sat down to have some water and some rest.
他有官差在身，过节也无法休息。
Tā yǒu guānchāi zài shēn，guòjié yě wúfǎ xiūxi。
He has work to do and can\'t even take a rest during the holidays.
这些日子很忙，我们好几天没休息了。
Zhèxiē rìzi hěnmáng，wǒmen hǎojǐtiān méi xiūxi le。
We are very busy these days, and haven\'t rested in several days.
她的脸上显示着劳倦的神情，但她却不能休息。
Tā de liǎnshàng xiǎnshì zhe láojuàn de shénqíng，dàn tā què bùnéng xiūxi。
She appears exhausted, but she can\'t rest.
他干的是累活儿，让他多休息一会儿吧。
Tā gàn de shì lèihuór，ràng tā duō xiūxi yíhuìr ba。

我休息片刻立马就出发。

短暂休息之后人们确实可以完成更多。
He felt better after a little sleep.
Shāoshìxiūxī hòu，tā gǎnjué hǎo yìxiē le。
稍事休息后，他感觉好一些了。
If the new teacher won\'t break, we\'ll add some stress.

你现在必须休息，因为战斗在破晓时就会开始。
I will tell my husband to stop at the next rest area.

Every 100 kilometers there will be a base camp you can have a rest at.
每100公里就会有一个大本营，你可以在那里休息。

Xiūbóěr hé wéisè’ěr fāxiànle yì zhǒng xìbāo，zhèzhǒng xìbāo huì gēnjù cjīwù wéirào shìwǎngmó yídòng de fāngxiàng ér zuòchū bùtóng de fǎnyìng。
休博尔和维瑟尔发现了一种细胞，这种细胞会根据刺激物围绕视网膜移动的方向而做出不同的反应。

等这个项目完成了，我准备长休一个月。

The stereo is so loud that it disturbs the old who are having rest.

There is still a week left for the confinement of my sister-in-law. She still needs to be in good relaxation now.
从打我到了这家公司，就一直没休过假。

I have never taken a day off since I came to this company.
从影以来，他就没有安心的休息过。

Since entering the film business, he has never had a real rest.
她穿了件粹白的休闲服。
Tā chuān le jiàn cuìbái de xiūxiánfú。
She is wearing pure white casual clothes.
我们最好还是错休，这样能提高工作效率。

We had better take staggered leave so as to increase working efficiency.
在这儿还需要搭建几个供游人休息的简易棚。

We shall put up some simply equipped sheds here so that tourists can have a rest.
连续忙了一个月，终于盼到大休了。
Liánxù máng le yígè yuè，zhōng yú pàndào dàxiū le。
After a whole month\'s work, the vacation has finally come.
能够来这里发挥余热，这些退休老人也得其所哉。
Nénggòu lái zhèlǐ fāhuī yúrè，zhèxiē tuìxiū lǎorén yě déqí suǒzāi。
These retired men are content to devote their remaining energy here.
由于最近业务繁忙，公司决定调休。
Yóuyú zuìjìn yèwù fánmáng，gōngsī juédìng tiáoxiū。
The company decided to delay its rest days due to heavy business.
母亲退休后，他顶职进入了那家工厂。
Mǔqīn tuìxiū hòu，tā dǐngzhí jìnrù le nàjiā gōngchǎng。
After his mother\'s retirement, he took her place and became a member of that factory.
这是一台在二战期间立过功的发报机，如今它“退休”到了博物馆。
Zhè shì yìtái zài èrzhàn qījiān lì guò gōng de fābàojī，rújīn tā“tuìxiū”dào le bówùguǎn。
This transmitter made great contribution during the World War II, and now it has retired and rests in the museum.
她休完产假，已经重新返岗。
Tā xiū wán chǎnjià，yǐjing chóngxīn fǎngǎng。
She has had her maternity leave and has now started to work again.
老王心脏不太好，有些房颤，医生建议他多休息。
Lǎo Wáng xīnzàng bùtài hǎo，yǒuxiē fángchàn，yīshēng jiànyì tā duō xiūxi。
Lao Wang has a weak heart with auricular fibrillation; the doctor advised him to take more rest.
工人们正在割漆，中午才能休息。
Gōngrénmen zhèngzài gēqī，zhōng wǔ cáinéng xiūxi。
The workers are tapping lacquer trees, they won\'t have a rest until midday.
我要利用工休出国旅游。
Wǒ yào lìyòng gōngxiū chūguó lǚyóu。
I will spend my holiday traveling abroad.
我建议大家利用工休时间做广播体操。
Wǒ jiànyì dàjiā lìyòng gōngxiū shíjiān zuò guǎngbō tǐcāo。
I suggest that everybody spends the work break in doing exercise to radio music.
挂锄后，他坐下来喝水休息。
Guàchú hòu，tā zuòxiàlái hēshuǐ xiūxi。
After putting away the hoe, he sat down to have some water and some rest.
他有官差在身，过节也无法休息。
Tā yǒu guānchāi zài shēn，guòjié yě wúfǎ xiūxi。
He has work to do and can\'t even take a rest during the holidays.
这些日子很忙，我们好几天没休息了。
Zhèxiē rìzi hěnmáng，wǒmen hǎojǐtiān méi xiūxi le。
We are very busy these days, and haven\'t rested in several days.
退休职工活动室的活动项目越来越丰富了。
Tuìxiū zhígōng huódòngshì de huódòng xiàng mù yuèláiyuè fēngfù le。
There are more and more activities in the amusement room for retired workers.
爷爷奶奶退休以后，就在家里看养孙子了。
Yéye nǎinai tuìxiū yǐhòu，jiù zài jiā lǐ kānyǎng sūnzi le。
After retirement, grandpa and grandma stay at home and look after their grandson.
老领导刚退休，很不习惯这种靠边儿站的生活。
Lǎolǐngdǎo gāng tuìxiū，hěnbùxíguàn zhèzhǒng kàobiānr zhàn de shēnghuó。
The old leader has just retired, he can\'t get used to a powerless life.
张老师退休后被多所大学聘为客座教授了。
Zhāng lǎoshī tuìxiū hòu bèi duō suǒ dàxué pìnwéi kèzuò jiàoshòu le。
After retirement, Mr. Zhang was employed as a visiting professor by several universities.
她的脸上显示着劳倦的神情，但她却不能休息。
Tā de liǎnshàng xiǎnshì zhe láojuàn de shénqíng，dàn tā què bùnéng xiūxi。
She appears exhausted, but she can\'t rest.
退休后，他每天乐悠悠的，读读书，写写字，看看戏，倒也惬意。
Tuìxiū hòu，tā měitiān lèyōuyōu de，dúdú shū，xiěxiě zì，kànkàn xì，dǎo yě qièyì。
After he retired he lived leisurely and comfortably, sometimes reading, sometimes writing, or watching a play.  More simply, he lived a happy life.
他干的是累活儿，让他多休息一会儿吧。
Tā gàn de shì lèihuór，ràng tā duō xiūxi yíhuìr ba。
The work he is doing is tiring.  Let him rest for a longer amount time.

Lítuìxiū rényuán de shèhuì bǎozhàng tǐxì zài rìqū wánshàn，qí mùdì shì shǐ lǎorén nénggòu āndù wǎnnián。
The social security system for employees who have left or retired from their posts is gradually established. Its purpose is to allow the elderly to live a comfortable, and peaceful life.
爷爷的离休金几乎都给我们这几个孙子孙女花了。
Yéye de líxiūjīn jīhū dōu gěi wǒmen zhèjǐgè sūnzi sūnnǚ huā le。
Grandpa\'s retirement fund is almost used up by us.
我休息片刻立马就出发。
Wǒ xiūxi piànkè lìmǎ jiù chūfā。
I will start off immediately after a short rest.
我真希望退休后可以终老林泉呀！

After I retire I wish to spend the rest of my life in the countryside.

他无休止地重复这一事件最终让人忍无可忍。

行动之前我们休息了片刻。

He decided to live a secluded life after retirement.

He devoted much energy to tea arts after retirement.
退休后他一直沉潜于京剧艺术的研究。

Wǔshí suì tuìxiū shí yǒu zúgòu duō de qián，zhège xiǎngfǎ tīng qǐlái shì hěn xīyǐn rén de。
五十岁退休时有足够多的钱，这个想法听起来是很吸引人的。
His retirement fund was set up to be paid as an annuity.
Tā de tuìxiūjīn àn nián fāfàng。
他的退休金按年发放。
He left the house...for the support of twelve superannuated wool carders.
Tā liúxiàle nà zuò fángzi …… wèile zhīchí shí\'èr gè tuìxiū de yángmáo gōngrén。
他留下了那座房子……为了支持十二个退休的羊毛工人。
His retirement was not allowed to go unmarked.
Tā de tuìxiū shì bùrónghūlüè de。
他的退休是不容忽略的。
He was brought out of retirement temporarily.
Tuìxiū de tā línshí huílái gōngzuò。
退休的他临时回来工作。
The nation\'s pediatrician laureate is preparing to lay down his black bag.
Quánguó zuì jiéchū de xiǎo\'érkē yīshēng zhǔnbèi tuìxiū le。
全国最杰出的小儿科医生准备退休了。
He could retire on his residuals.
Tā kěyǐ yīkào chóujīn wéichí tuìxiū hòu de shēnghuó。
他可以依靠酬金维持退休后的生活。
He\'s a retired army officer.
Tā shì yì míng tuìxiū de lùjūn jūnguān。
他是一名退休的陆军军官。
Some mute inglorious Milton here may rest.
Yǒuxiērén sīxià lǐ shuō，bù guāngcǎi de Míěrdùn zhèhuí kěnéng yào tuìxiū le。
有些人私下里说，不光彩的弥尔顿这回可能要退休了。
He was honorably discharged after many years of service.
Zài gōngzuòle duō nián yǐhòu，tā bèi tǐmiàn de tuìxīu le。
在工作了多年以后，他被体面地退休了。
His planning for retirement was hindered by several uncertainties.
Tā de tuìxiū jìhuà shòuzǔ yú duōzhǒng búquèdìngxìng yīnsù。
他的退休计划受阻于多种不确定性因素。
He oscillates between accepting the new position and retirement.
Tā zài jiēshòu xīn zhíwù yǔ tuìxiū zhījiān yáobǎibúdìng。
他在接受新职务与退休之间摇摆不定。

Most of the players backed down from a damaging dispute at a meeting.

líxiū gànbù
retired veteran cadres

原任已经离休。

I\'ll be away for one week, I really need a rest.
我得离开一周，我真的需要休息一下。

The company decided to delay its rest days due to heavy business.
从打我到了这家公司，就一直没休过假。

咱们干脆一不做，二不休，杀了他。

Let\'s kill him, whatever the consequences are.
他干的是累活儿，让他多休息一会儿吧。

他们干了没有两个小时就休息了。

They had been working for less than two hours when they took a rest.

Tā duì cǐ cìcìbùxiūde shuōle yíxiàwǔ。
He went on and on about it all afternoon.
他似乎一天到晚奔忙不休。
Tā sìhū yìtiāndàowǎn bēnmángbùxiū。
He seems to be on the move all day long.
争论不休
zhēnglùn bùxiū
argue endlessly; keep on arguing
他们俩各不相让，吵闹不休。
Tāmen liǎ gè bùxiāng ràng，chǎonào bùxiū。
As neither of them was willing to give ground, they quarrelled on and on.
防止在枝节问题上纠缠不休
fángzhǐ zài zhījié wèntí shàngjiūchánbùxiū
avoid endless quibbling over side issues
怒骂不休
nù mà bù xiū
cursing angrily without stopping
到这地步，一不做，二不休，我是打算拼一拼了！
Dào zhè dìbù，yībúzuò，èrbùxiū，wǒ shì dǎsuàn pīnyipīn le！
Now that we\'ve gone as far as this, we must either go the whole hog or else drop it altogether. I\'m in favour of putting up a fight, myself.
议论不休
yìlùnbùxiū 
carry on endless discussions
用不着为这些小事争论不休。
Yòngbu zháo wèi zhèxiē xiǎoshì zhēnglùnbùxiū。
There\'s no need to keep arguing about such triflings.
争吵不休
zhēngchǎobùxiū 
bicker (or squabble) endlessly
咱们干脆一不做，二不休，杀了他。
Zánmén gāncuì yī bùzuò，èr bùxiū，shā le tā。

Tā duì cǐ cìcìbùxiūde shuōle yíxiàwǔ。
He went on and on about it all afternoon.
他喋喋不休地谈着对未来的设想。
Tā diédiébùxiūde tánzhe duì wèiláide shèxiǎng。
He witters on and on about his plans for the future.
不达目的，决不罢休。
Bùdá mùdì，juébúbàxiū。
We\'ll not stop until we reach our goal.
我们不达目的决不罢休。
Wǒmen bùdá mùdì jué bú bàxiū。
We will never cease our efforts until we achieve our aim.
不试验成功，决不甘休。

We won\'t give up until the experiment succeeds.
不达目的决不罢休。
Bùdá mùdì juébúbàxiū。
We\'ll never give up until the goal is reached.
不达目的，誓不罢休。
Bùdá mùdì，shìbúbàxiū。
We\'ll never stop until we reach our goal.
我们之间的问题解决不了，休怪我到法院去起诉。
Wǒmen zhījiān de wèntí jiějué bùliǎo，xiū guài wǒ dào fǎyuàn qu qǐsù。
Don\'t blame me for going to court since we can\'t settle it between us.
她的脸上显示着劳倦的神情，但她却不能休息。

She appears exhausted, but she can\'t rest.

He swore not to give up until he had won the case.
老板不让我休假。

他过不惯清闲的退休生活。

He finds it difficult to get used to the idle life of retirement.

Why did the chief conductor go off duty without approval?
我们劝他休息，他怎么也不依。

We advised him to have a rest, but he simply wouldn\'t hear of it.
医生嘱咐他卧床休息，可他硬是不听。

The doctor advised him to stay in bed, but he just wouldn\'t listen.
时间不早了，我们也应该投店休息了。

It\'s getting late, so let\'s find a hotel and get some sleep.

to talk one\'s head off
【俚语】对某人唠叨不休
He was talking away about his plans when suddenly the lights went off.
他还在喋喋不休地讲着他的计划，这时灯突然灭了。　
What you need is a vocation at the beach, why don\'t you have a rest?
你所需要的就是去海边渡渡假，为什么不休息一下呢？
They had a quarrel about the project.
他们在项目问题上争执不休。

你觉得你能不休息连续开车10个小时到费城去吗？

他们全天24小时营业，周末不休息。

你为什么不休几天假？

他是个精力充沛的人，可以连续工作十八小时不休息。

His date never stopped talking.

他的约会者喋喋不休。

She was yakking away about her grandchildren.
Tā zǒngshì diédiébùxiū de tánlùn tā de sūnzi-sūnnǚmen。
她总是喋喋不休地谈论她的孙子孙女们。
My boss allowed me to take a week\'s unpaid leave.
老板批准了我可以不带薪休假一周。
Britain did not just sit back and lick her wounds.
Yīngguó bìng bú zhǐshì xiūzhěng yǐ chóngzhěngqígǔ。
英国并不只是休整以重整旗鼓。
I would not for the world keep him from his rest.
Wǒ wúlùnrúhé yě búhuì bú ràng tā xiūxi de。
我无论如何也不会不让他休息的。
If the new teacher won\'t break, we\'ll add some stress.

如果那位新老师不下课休息，我们将施加些压力。

没有什么可以贡献的，我又开始四下观望。
They think that I am making advances to such a young girl.
Tāmen yǐwéi wǒ zài xiàng zhèyàng yí gè niánqīng de nǚhái xiànyīnqín。
他们以为我在向这样一个年轻的女孩献殷勤。
He made contributions to world peace and development.
Tā wèi shìjièhépíng hé fāzhǎn zuòchūle gòngxiàn。
他为世界和平和发展做出了贡献。
She had offered up her life for her country.
Tā yǐjīng wèi tā de zǔguó xiànchūle shēngmìng。
她已经为她的祖国献出了生命。
We offered up a prayer to God.
Wǒmen wèi Shàngdì xiànshàng qídǎo。
我们为上帝献上祈祷。
Kevin and I rallied round and did the show for them.
Kǎiwén hé wǒ tuánjié qǐlái，wèi tāmen xiànshàng biǎoyǎn。
凯文和我团结起来，为他们献上表演。
This book is liberally sprinkled with such references.

这样的参考文献自由地穿插在这本书之中。
An investing company subscribed $100,000 for the project.
Yì jiā tóuzī gōngsī wèi zhège xiàngmù juānxiàn 10 wàn měiyuán。
一家投资公司为这个项目捐献10万美元。
Commitment and dedication remained, but tilting at windmills had to stop.
Chéngnuò hé xiànshēn jīngshén yīrán cúnzài，dàn yǔ èshìlì zuòzhàn de xiáxiǎng bìxū tíngzhǐ。

From time to time she contributed a personal comment on his account.
Tā shíbùshí de zài tā de gùshi lǐ gòngxiàn yìxiē gèrén de jiànjiě。
她时不时地在他的故事里贡献一些个人的见解。
The waiters around her aim to please.
Tā sìzhōu de shìzhě zhēngxiānkǒnghòu de xiànyīnqín。
她四周的侍者争先恐后地献殷勤。
The entertainers served up a lively show.

这些娱乐演员奉献了一场精彩的表演。
They distributed unlike (or unequal) sums to the various charities.
Tāmen gěi bùtóng de císhànjīgòu juānxiànle bùtóng shù\'é de shànkuǎn。

She wanted to buy his love with her dedication to him and his work.
Tā xiǎng tōngguò wèi tā hé tā de gōngzuò zuòchū gòngxiàn de fāngshì lái huòqǔ tā de ài。
她想通过为他和他的工作做出贡献的方式来获取他的爱。

They did much for humanity.
Tā wèi císhànshìyè zuòle xǔduō gòngxiàn。
他为慈善事业做了许多贡献。

Tā yīn zài jūnduì fúyì zhōng suǒzuò de gòngxiàn ér shòuxūn。
他因在军队服役中所做的贡献而受勋。

Tā bǎ nà běn shū xiàngěile tā de fùmǔ。

Tā xiànshēn yú Jīdūjiào shìyè。

我为地震受害者向红十字会献血。
Rural people show more devotion and unselfishness than do their urban cousins.
Xiāngxiàrén bǐ tāmen chénglǐ de qīnshǔ biǎoxiànchū gèngduō de fèngxiàn hé wúsī jīngshén。
乡下人比他们城里的亲属表现出更多的奉献和无私精神。
His documentary sources are demonstrably wrong.
Tā wénxiàn cáiliào de láiyuán quèshí shì cuòwù de。
他文献材料的来源确实是错误的。
The cardinal attended the consecration of the church.
Hóngyī zhǔjiào cānjiāle jiàohuì de xiànjì yíshì。
红衣主教参加了教会的献祭仪式。
He served his country meritoriously.
Tā wèi zìjǐ de zǔguó zuòchūle hěn dà de gòngxiàn。
他为自己的祖国做出了很大的贡献。
They were asked to rededicate themselves to their country.
Tāmen bùdébù wèi tāmen de guójiā zàicì xiànshēn。
他们不得不为他们的国家再次献身。
She refused to use insinuation in order to gain favor.
Tā jùjué yòng xiànmèi lái huòqǔ hǎochù。
她拒绝用献媚来获取好处。
The book is a workmanlike job with chronology and bibliography and index.

Slavish devotion to her job ruled her life.
Duì gōngzuò núlìbān de fèngxiàn zuǒyòuzhe tā de yìshēng。

study all available literature about earthquakes in ancient China
历史文献
lìshǐ wénxiàn 
historical documents
写论文时一定要参阅大量的文献。

One must consult a lot of reference books when writing a paper.

研究历史的人自然离不开古文献的帮助。

People researching into history can\'t do it without the help of ancient documents.

Shūshu shì Nánjīng túshūguǎn zhuānmén fùzé zhìwénxiàn jiǎnsuǒ de gōngzuò rényuán。
My uncle is responsible for file searching in the Nanjing Library.
重要文献
Zhòngyào wénxiàn
important document

Sīchóuzhīlù wéi wǒguó zǎoqī yǔ ōuzhōu dìqū de jīngjì wénhuà jiāoliú zuòchūle búkěmómiè de gòngxiàn。

He had no documents confirming his title to his father\'s estate.

他没有文件来证实他对其父亲的不动产拥有所有权。
To say they have priority is not to say they have complete hegemony.

说他们享有优先权并不是说他们拥有完全的霸权。
to lay claim to property

声明对某物拥有所有权
He set up a claim to jurisdiction over Byland on the ground of affiliation.

他拥有的巨大权力是一种滥用诱惑。

我仍将拥有该书的专属权利。

Gōngchéng-míngjiù de tā jiāng yōngyǒu wú kě-gūliàng de quánlì。
功成名就的他将拥有无可估量的权利。
He has taken away our right to keep and bear arms.

他剥夺了我们拥有和携带武器的权利。

法国对非洲的广袤区域拥有毋庸置疑的统治权。

管理员不能创建拥有超过他们自身访问权限的新管理员。
They protested that the nonproliferation treaty was just a plot to maintain the hegemony of those who already had nuclear weapons.
Tāmen biànchēng hé bú kuòsàn tiáoyuē zhǐshì wéihù nàxiē yǐjīng yōngyǒu héwǔqì de guójiā de bàquán de yí gè yīnmóu。
他们辩称核不扩散条约只是维护那些已经拥有核武器的国家的霸权的一个阴谋。
The United Nations must have the power to propose and organize action without being hobbled by irrelevant issues.
Liánhéguó bìxū yōngyǒu bú shòu bù xiāngguān wèntí de chèzhǒu ér tíchū bìng zhǔchí xíngdòng de quánlì。
联合国必须拥有不受不相关问题的掣肘而提出并主持行动的权利。

yōngyǒu héwǔqì 
possess nuclear weapons

yōngyǒu fēngfù de kuàngcáng 
have rich mineral resources; abound in mineral resources
如果拥有率上升到15%，电视机的需求量将达到4000万台左右。
Rúguǒ yōngyǒulǜ shàngshēngdào bǎifēnzhī shíwǔ，diànshìjī de xūqiúliàng jiāng dádào sìqiānwàn tái zuǒyòu。
If 15% of households have a TV set, the demand will be around 40 million.
我叔叔在澳洲拥有一个私人牧场。

My uncle has a farm in Australia.
只有善于擘画明天的人，才能真正拥有未来。
Zhǐyǒu shànyú bòhuà míngtiān de rén，cáinéng zhēnzhèng yōngyǒu wèilái。
Only those who are good at planning tomorrow can have a future in its real sense.
巴西拥有一支超一流的足球队。

Brazil has a first rate football team.

This shipping service company owns thousands of ships.
拥有五十万元固定存款是成为该银行高级会员的低限。
Yōngyǒu wǔshíwàn yuán gùdìng cúnkuǎn shì chéngwéi gāi yínháng gāojí huìyuán de dīxiàn。
A 500,000 yuan fixed deposit is a minimum requirement for the bank\'s advanced members.
豆奶拥有很高的营养价值，我们天天喝。

The Chinese phonemic system is complicated, only a few people can fully understand it.
他总是爱连书，弄得大家都看不懂。
Tā zǒngshì ài liánshū，nòng de dàjiā dōu kàn bùdǒng。
He always likes writing in linked script, and makes us unable to read.
弄懂经典著作的奥义。
to understand a question
弄懂一个问题的意思
I had to struggle with myself to work out what was right.
Wǒ bìxū shíshí nèixǐng，nòngdǒng shénme shì duì de。
我必须时时内省，弄懂什么是对的。
I can\'t work out why...
我弄不懂为什么…
We cannot apprehend the meaning of this document.
Wǒmen nòng bù dǒng zhè ge wénjiàn de yìsi。
我们弄不懂这个文件的意思。
这文章写得又长又难懂，真让看的人吃不消。
Zhè wénzhāngxiě de yòu chángyòu nándǒng，zhēn ràng kàn de rén chībuxiāo。
No reader can put up with such a long-winded article.
对我来说，这本书就跟天书一样难懂。
Duì wǒ lái shuō，zhèběnshū jiù gēn tiānshū yíyàngnán dǒng。
To me this book is as difficult as a book from heaven. or This book is all Greek to me.
专家们在校注《西厢记》中比较难懂的字句。
Zhuānjiāmen zài jiàozhù《Xīxiāngjì》 zhōng bǐjiào nándǒng de zìjù。
Experts are collating and annotating difficult sentences in The Romance of West Chamber.
这篇文章的论旨很清晰，没有什么复杂难懂的地方。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng de lùnzhǐ hěnqīngxī，méiyǒu shénme fùzá nándǒng de dìfāng。
The article has a clear argumentation, and contains nothing complicated.
教授正在为这段难懂的文字添加尾注。
Jiàoshòu zhèngzài wèi zhè duàn nándǒng de wénzì tiānjiā wěizhù。
The professor is adding endnotes to this difficult paragraph.
这本经籍是用梵文写的，很难读懂。
Zhèběn jīngjí shì yòng fànwén xiě de，hěnnán dúdǒng。
This scripture was written in Sanskrit and is very hard to understand.
汉语音系是个很复杂的系统，一般人很难弄懂。
Hànyǔ yīnxì shì gè hěn fùzá de xìtǒng，yìbān rén hěnnán nòngdǒng。
The Chinese phonemic system is complicated, only a few people can fully understand it.
粤方言外地人很难听懂。
Yuèfāngyán wàidìrén hěnnán tīngdǒng。
It is hard for people from other places to understand Cantonese.
简单的对话他尚且都不懂，更何况难的了。
Jiǎndān de duìhuà tā shàngqiě dōu bùdǒng，gèng hékuàng nán de le。
He can\'t even understand simple conversations, let alone difficult ones.
文字难懂，要加一点注。
理论玄奥难懂。
文中难懂的地方，一一加以标注。
文字隐晦难懂。
hard words
严厉的言词；难懂的话
His speech was deep with allegories.
Tā de yǎnjiǎng yīn yùyángùshì ér huìsènándǒng。
他的演讲因寓言故事而晦涩难懂。
The anthropologist was impressed by the reconditeness of the native proverbs.
Nà wèi rénlèi xuéjiā duì dāngdì yànyǔ de shēn\'ào nándǒng yìnxiàng shēnkè。
那位人类学家对当地谚语的深奥难懂印象深刻。
The professor\'s abstrusely reasoned theories were wasted on his students.
Xuésheng lǐjiě bù liǎo zhè wèi jiàoshòu de shēn\'àonándǒng de lǐlùn。
学生理解不了这位教授的深奥难懂的理论。
经过一段时间的学习，他能看懂常用的日文了。
Jīngguò yíduàn shíjiān de xuéxí，tā néng kàndǒng chángyòng de rìwén le。
After a period of study, he can read everyday Japanese now.
再复杂的线路图哥哥都能看懂。
Zài fùzá de xiànlùtú gēge dōunéng kàndǒng。
My brother can understand the most complicate circuit diagrams.
他连报也看不懂。
Tā lián bào yě kàn bu dǒng。
He can\'t even read a newspaper.
如果不是有注解，我根本看不懂这些白文。
Rúguǒ búshì yǒu zhùjiě，wǒ gēnběn kàn bùdǒng zhèxiē báiwén。
Without notes, I can hardly understand ancient Chinese prose.
小李又不是学理工科的，根本看不懂方框图。
Xiǎo Lǐ yòu búshì xué lǐgōngkē de，gēnběn kàn bùdǒng fāngkuàngtú。
Xiao Li is not a engineering student, so he can not understand the square diagram.
这张建筑图纸满是红线，我实在看不懂。
Zhèzhāng jiànzhù túzhǐ mǎnshì hóngxiàn，wǒ shízai kàn bùdǒng。
The construction blueprint is full of borderlines. I am really blind to them.
你最好写简笔字，让大家都看得懂。
Nǐ zuìhǎo xiě jiǎnbǐzì，ràng dàjiā dōu kàn de dǒng。
You\'d better write it in simplified Chinese so that everyone can read it.
他总是爱连书，弄得大家都看不懂。
Tā zǒngshì ài liánshū，nòng de dàjiā dōu kàn bùdǒng。
He always likes writing in linked script, and makes us unable to read.
这块牌匾是由满文写成的，我看不懂。
Zhèkuài páibiǎn shì yóu mǎnwén xiěchéng de，wǒ kàn bùdǒng。
The inscribed board is written in Man language, which I cannot understand.
这封信是用蒙文写的，我看不懂。
Zhè fēng xìn shì yòng méngwén xiě de，wǒ kàn bùdǒng。
This letter is written in Mongolian, and I can not understand it.
写文章时遣词不当，可能会令人看不懂文章的意思呢。
Xiě wénzhāng shí qiǎncí búdàng，kěnéng huì lìng rén kàn bùdǒng wénzhāng de yìsi ne。
Inappropriate wording may make people unable to understand the meaning of the article.
我一点也看不懂这本图谶的内容。
Wǒ yìdiǎn yě kàn bùdǒng zhèběn túchèn de nèiróng。
I can\'t understand the contents of this prophetic book at all.
这些文字是籀文，我看不懂。
Zhèxiē wénzì shì zhòuwén，wǒ kàn bùdǒng。
Idon\'t understand these characters from the Zhou Dynasty.
他看不懂说明书上的洋字码儿。
Tā kàn bùdǒng shuōmíngshū shàng de yáng zìmǎér。
He can\'t understand the foreign character codes in the manual.
纸上写着的是音素文字吧，可惜我看不懂。
Zhǐ shàng xiě zhe de shì yīnsù wénzì ba，kěxī wǒ kàn bùdǒng。
What is written on the paper is in a phonemic language, it\'s a pity I can\'t read it.
这文章写得又长又难懂，真让看的人吃不消。
Zhè wénzhāngxiě de yòu chángyòu nándǒng，zhēn ràng kàn de rén chībuxiāo。
No reader can put up with such a long-winded article.
别看他年龄不大，懂的可多了。
Bié kàn tā niánlíng búdà，dǒng de kě duō le。
Although he is young, he knows quite a lot.
我看他的表情是似懂非懂的，可他却说完全听懂了。
Wǒ kàn tā de biǎoqíng shì sìdǒng fēidǒng de，kě tā què shuō wánquán tīngdǒng le。
I thought he didn\'t catch it, although he seemed to have understood, but he said that he had understood completely.
我们听不懂闽剧，可对那些好看的服饰化妆很感兴趣。
Wǒmen tīng bùdǒng mǐnjù，kě duì nàxiē hǎokàn de fúshì huàzhuāng hěngǎn xìngqù。
We can not understand Fujian opera, but we are very interested in the beautiful clothes and cosmetics.
这本书他就拿去也看不懂。
这句话要加注说明，不然别人看不懂。
看不懂他信中的暗语。
Can you read Greek?
Nǐ néng kàndǒng Xīlàwén ma？
你能看懂希腊文吗？
I could never make heads or tails of these directions.
Wǒ wánquán kàn bùdǒng zhèxiē zhǐshì。
我完全看不懂这些指示。
他连报也看不懂。
Tā lián bào yě kàn bu dǒng。
He can\'t even read a newspaper.
如果不是有注解，我根本看不懂这些白文。

看不懂他信中的暗语。
I could never make heads or tails of these directions.
Wǒ wánquán kàn bùdǒng zhèxiē zhǐshì。
我完全看不懂这些指示。
这本小说，高年级的学生才能读懂。
Zhèběn xiǎoshuō，gāo niánjí de xuésheng cáinéng dúdǒng。
Only students in high grades can fully understand the novel.
想要读懂这本文言小说，必须有扎实的古代汉语功底。
Xiǎng yào dú dǒng zhèběn wényán xiǎoshuō，bìxū yǒu zāshí de gǔdài hànyǔ gōngdǐ。
In order to understand this novel written in classical Chinese, one must have a profound knowledge of archaic Chinese.
这本经籍是用梵文写的，很难读懂。
Zhèběn jīngjí shì yòng fànwén xiě de，hěnnán dúdǒng。
This scripture was written in Sanskrit and is very hard to understand.
这段文字中存在很多误码，根本无法读懂。
Zhè duàn wénzì zhōng cúnzài hěnduō wùmǎ，gēnběn wúfǎ dúdǒng。
There are many unrecognizable parts in this passage.
By the age of 70, he understood the play of the real world.
年届七十，他才读懂了现实世界的行动准则。
I had to consult a science dictionary to read this article.
我得靠查理科词典才能读懂这篇文章。
I could never understand how any one could read them with open eyes.
Wǒ yǒngyuǎn bù míngbai，zěnme kěnéng yǒurén kěyǐ wánquán dúdǒng zhèxiē dōngxi。
我永远不明白，怎么可能有人可以完全读懂这些东西。
The paintings in the church served an edifying purpose even for those who could not read.
Jiàotáng zhōng de huìhuà dōu yǒu jiào huà zuòyòng，jíshǐ duìyú dú bù dǒng tāmen de rén yě yǒu zhèzhǒng zuòyòng。
教堂中的绘画都有教化作用，即使对于读不懂它们的人也有这种作用。
She is very clever, as she only has to read something once before she gets it.
她很聪明，什么东西读一遍就能懂。
懂事的孩子
dǒngshì de háizi
a sensible child
你怎么这样不懂事？
Nǐ zěnme zhèyàng bùdǒngshì?
How can you be so thoughtless?
孩子懂事了，学会为妈妈分忧了。
Háizi dǒngshì le，xuéhuì wèi māma fēnyōu le。
The boy has really grown up and is beginning to share his mother\'s worries.
她年轻不懂事，您别记恨她。
Tā niánqīngbùdǒngshì，nín bié jìhèn tā。
She is young and ignorant, so you shouldn\'t bear her any grudge.
这孩子不懂事，稍有不遂就又哭又闹。
Zhè háizi bùdǒngshì，shāoyǒu búsuì jiù yòukū yòunào。
This naughty child cries, and kicks when he does not have his way.
你这黄口小儿，不懂事就别乱说话。
Nǐ zhè huángkǒuxiǎor，bùdǒngshì jiù bié luàn shuōhuà。
You green hand, don\'t speak nonsense when you don\'t know what is going on.
你也老大不小的了，该懂点事了。
Nǐ yě lǎodàbùxiǎo de le，gāi dǒngdiǎn shì le。
You are no longer a child and should show some sense.
不懂的事要向别人求教。
Bùdǒng de shì yào xiàng biéren qiújiào。
Ask other people about things that you do not know.
不懂人事
bù dǒng rénshì
not know the ways of the world
宝宝的好奇心很强，凡是她不懂的事，她总要盘根问底。
Bǎobao de hàoqíxīn hěnqiáng，fánshì tā bùdǒng de shì，tā zǒngyào pángēn wèndǐ。
The baby shows strong curiosity, she likes to find out the ins and outs of everything she can\'t understand.
他这么大了，应该懂点人事了。
Tā zhème dà le，yīnggāi dǒng diǎn rénshì le.
At his age, he ought to know the ways of the world.
亏得你长这么大，那么点事儿都不懂。
Kuī de nǐ zhǎngzhème dà，nàme diǎn shìr dōu bùdǒng。
Fancy a big boy like you not understanding such a simple thing!
你还是姑娘家，有些事你还不懂。
Nǐ háishi gūniangjiā，yǒu xiē shì nǐ hái bùdǒng。
You are still a young girl, there are many things that you don\'t understand.
现在什么都省事了，有不懂的词可以用机器翻译。
Xiànzài shénme dōu shěngshì le，yǒu bùdǒng dé cí kěyǐ yòng jīqì fānyì。
Now everything has become easier to do, we can use machines to translate unknown words.
对于自己不懂的或不明白的事情，不要妄加评论！
Duìyú zìjǐ bùdǒng de huòbùmíngbai de shìqing，búyào wàngjiā pínglùn！
Don\'t comment casually on things you don\'t understand!
我懂得他的弦外之音：这事儿总工程师也有责任。
Wǒ dǒng de tā de xiánwàizhīyīn：zhè shìr zǒnggōngchéngshī yě yǒu zérèn。
I\'m quite aware of the overtones of what he was saying: the chief engineer should also be held responsible.
这一事件使我们更清楚地懂得了问题的复杂性。
Zhè yí shìjiàn shǐ wǒmen gèng qīngchu de dǒngdé le wèntí de fùzáxìng。
This incident brought home to us the complex nature of the problem.
小王一向懂得明哲保身，从不做引火烧身的事。
Xiǎo Wáng yí xiàng dǒngdé míngzhé bǎoshēn，cóng búzuò yǐnhuǒ shāoshēn de shì。
Xiao Wang always keeps himself out of harm by being discrete, he will never do anything that brings trouble on his own head.
弟弟倒比哥哥懂事
你这个不懂事的小冤苦！
十分懂事
小乖乖，真懂事
老大不小的了，该懂事了。
没大没小的，太不懂事了！
孩子不懂事，让您受累了。
小儿不懂事。
孩子幼稚，不懂事。
这么大的孩子该懂事了。
自从进了幼儿园，孩子懂事多了。
不点儿年纪，懂的事还不少。
我那时也略略懂了点儿事
She\'s such a child if she doesn\'t get her own way.
她就像个不懂事的孩子，什么事情都得按着她的心意来。
He is always pronouncing about things he knows nothing about.
他总是对自己不懂的事情妄下定论。
His speech was deep with allegories.
Tā de yǎnjiǎng yīn yùyángùshì ér huìsènándǒng。
他的演讲因寓言故事而晦涩难懂。
An interior decorator must understand lighting.
Shìnèi zhuānghuángshī bìxū dǒngdé zhàomíng fāngmiàn de shìqing。
室内装潢师必须懂得照明方面的事情。
他不懂行情，很容易挨蒙。
Tā bùdǒng hángqíng，hěnróngyì áiméng。
Not knowing the normal prices, he gets easily taken advantage of.
我又不懂行，帮不了忙反而添乱。
Wǒ yòu bùdǒng háng，bāngbùliǎo máng fǎnér tiānluàn。
I\'m just a layman, which means that instead of helping you out, I may create trouble.
我的脑子不行，还不大懂。
Wǒ de nǎozi bùxíng，hái bú dà dǒng。
My mind is no good; I still don\'t quite understand.
海上航行时掌舵手要懂得把握风向，见风使舵。
Hǎi shàng hángxíng shí zhǎngduòshǒu yào dǒngdé bǎwò fēng xiàng，jiànfēng shǐduò。
The steered should be able to judge the direction of wind and trim the sails to it.
懂行(ｈáｎɡ)
懂行
要说办教育，他很懂行
I could not understand the technical jargon they were speaking.
Wǒ tīngbùdǒng tāmen shuō de hánghuà。
我听不懂他们说的行话。
By the age of 70, he understood the play of the real world.
年届七十，他才读懂了现实世界的行动准则。
这一事件使我们更清楚地懂得了问题的复杂性。
Zhè yí shìjiàn shǐ wǒmen gèng qīngchu de dǒngdé le wèntí de fùzáxìng。
This incident brought home to us the complex nature of the problem.
用群众所熟悉和懂得的词句
yòng qúnzhòng suǒ shúxī hé dǒngdé de cíjù
use words which are familiar and intelligible to the masses
这个词儿已经说开了，大家都懂得。
Zhè ge cír yǐjing shuōkāi le，dàjiā dōu dǒng de。
This word is in current use, and everybody understands it.
同样地懂得
tóngyàng de dǒng de 
know equally well
我懂得他的弦外之音：这事儿总工程师也有责任。
Wǒ dǒng de tā de xiánwàizhīyīn：zhè shìr zǒnggōngchéngshī yě yǒu zérèn。
I\'m quite aware of the overtones of what he was saying: the chief engineer should also be held responsible.
懂得如何做人处世
dǒng de rúhé zuòrén chǔshì 
know how to conduct oneself in society
我们懂得入乡从俗的道理，一切按你们的安排办。
Wǒmen dǒngdé rùxiāng cóngsú de dàolǐ，yíqiè àn nǐmen de ānpái bàn。
We understand the saying &quot;when in Rome, do as the Romans&quot;, so we will just follow your arrangements.
希望大家都能懂得积羽沉舟的道理，小问题也要及时解决。
Xīwàng dàjiā dōu néng dǒngdé jīyǔchénzhōu de dàolǐ，xiǎo wèntí yěyào jíshí jiějué。
I hope you all know that minor offences unchecked may bring disaster, so solve small problems in time.
小公司如果不懂得经营，会很快被挤垮的。
Xiǎo gōngsī rúguǒ bùdǒngdé jīngyíng，huì hěnkuài bèi jǐkuǎ de。
Small companies will go out of business if they are not well managed.
作为领导一定要懂得兼听则明，偏信则暗的道理，多听意见，不可偏信。
Zuòwéi lǐngdǎo yídìng yào dǒngdé jiāntīng zémíng，piānxìn zéàn de dàolǐ，duōtīng yìjiàn，bùkě piānxìn。
Leaders should follow the rule of listening to both sides and never be partial toward either side.
海上航行时掌舵手要懂得把握风向，见风使舵。
Hǎi shàng hángxíng shí zhǎngduòshǒu yào dǒngdé bǎwò fēng xiàng，jiànfēng shǐduò。
The steered should be able to judge the direction of wind and trim the sails to it.
他简直像个木头人，根本不懂得如何表达自己的感情！
Tā jiǎnzhí xiàng gè mùtourén，gēnběn bùdǒngdé rúhé biǎodá zìjǐ de gǎnqíng！
He is a blockhead, and has no idea about how to express his feelings.
他一个山野村夫怎么会懂得文学呢？
Tā yígè shānyě cūnfū zěnme huì dǒng de wénxué ne ？
How can the rustic understand literature?
当我们的利益受到侵害的时候，要懂得寻求司法援助。
Dāng wǒmen de lìyì shòudào qīnhài de shíhou，yào dǒngdé xúnqiú sīfǎ yuánzhù。
When our rights are obstructed, we should know to seek for judicial help.
小王是个懂得惜玉怜香的人，把女朋友照顾得很好。
Xiǎo Wáng shì gè dǒngdé xīyù liánxiāng de rén，bǎ nǚpéngyou zhàogù de hěn hǎo。
Xiao Wang is a considerate man, and takes good care of his girlfriend.
管理者应该懂得从众多管理方法中撷英。
Guǎnlǐzhě yīnggāi dǒngdé cóng zhòngduō guǎnlǐ fāngfǎ zhōng xiéyīng。
The managers should learn to pick the best of all the management methods.
王伯伯是个很懂得修身养性的人。
Wáng bóbó shì gè hěn dǒngdé xiūshēn yǎngxìng de rén。
Uncle Wang knows very wellabout how to cultivate moral character and develop temperament.
懂得易位思考的人往往拥有更多的朋友。
Dǒngdé yìwèi sīkǎo de rén wǎngwǎng yōngyǒu gèngduō de péngyou。
People who think from other people\'s perspectives will have more friends.
做人一定要懂得引水思源，知恩图报。
Zuò rén yídìng yào dǒngdé yǐnshuǐ sīyuán，zhīēn túbào。
People should bear in mind where their happiness comes from, and return the hospitality that they have received.
昨日的辉煌已经永逝，我们要懂得把握今天。
Zuórì de huīhuáng yǐjing yǒngshì，wǒmen yào dǒngdé bǎwò jīntiān。
The glory of the past has gone forever; we should learn to grasp today.
高明的摄影师懂得用光的技巧。
Gāomíng de shèyǐngshī dǒngdé yòngguāng de jìqiǎo。
A brilliant photographer knows how to use lights.
我们要懂得调理好生活中的油盐酱醋。
Wǒmen yào dǒngdé tiáolǐ hǎo shēnghuó zhōng de yóuyán jiàngcù。
We should know how to preserve the flavours of our life.
统治者们应该懂得与民更始的道理。
Tǒngzhìzhěmen yīnggāi dǒngdé yǔmín gēngshǐ de dàolǐ。
Rulers should understand the truth of cooperating with the people to exchange the old for the new.
我们要懂得学以致用，不能只停留在书本上。
Wǒmen yào dǒngdé xuéyǐ zhìyòng，bùnéng zhǐ tíngliú zài shūběn shàng。
We should learn to use in practice what we have learned rather than lingering on the books.
蚂蚁之间也懂得守望相助呢！
Mǎyǐ zhījiān yě dǒngdé shǒuwàng xiāngzhù ne！
Even ants know how to keep watch and help each other!
小王一向懂得明哲保身，从不做引火烧身的事。
Xiǎo Wáng yí xiàng dǒngdé míngzhé bǎoshēn，cóng búzuò yǐnhuǒ shāoshēn de shì。
Xiao Wang always keeps himself out of harm by being discrete, he will never do anything that brings trouble on his own head.
他懂得如何变弊为利。
Tā dǒngdé rúhé biàn bì wéi lì。
He knows how to turn a disadvantage into an advantage.
你最好写简笔字，让大家都看得懂。

You\'d better write it in simplified Chinese so that everyone can read it.
这几课书我并没弄懂，考试全得靠强记。
Zhè jǐ kè shū wǒ bìngméi nòngdǒng，kǎoshì quán děi kào qiángjì。
I didn\'t understand these lessons, so I had to rely on sheer memorization to pass the exam.
他讲得明白易懂。
Tā jiǎng de míngbai yì dǒng。
He spoke clearly and simply.

No reader can put up with such a long-winded article.
他总是爱连书，弄得大家都看不懂。
Tā zǒngshì ài liánshū，nòng de dàjiā dōu kàn bùdǒng。
He always likes writing in linked script, and makes us unable to read.
我不太懂这种雅言，你能讲得通俗点吗？
Wǒ bú tài dǒng zhèzhǒng yǎyán，nǐ néng jiǎng de tōngsú diǎn ma？
I can\'t understand literary language, can you make it more simple?
亏得你长这么大，那么点事儿都不懂。

他懂得这个道理。
懂得机器的装卸和维修。

他把儿子调教得很懂礼貌。

真正懂得如何去享受生活

她是个聪明的女孩，懂得人情世故，我不用为她操太多心。

她是一个懂得如何保持青春永驻的女人。

在人类（和动物）的漫长历史中，那些懂得有效协作与随机应变的往往占据着优势。

他解释得太快了，我都没太听懂。

我不懂你为什么扔石头打破窗户，但没关系，你得赔钱。
不懂就是不懂，不要装懂。
Bùdǒng jiùshì bùdǒng，búyào zhuāngdǒng。
If you don\'t know, there you stand. Don\'t pretend to know what you don\'t.
我看他的表情是似懂非懂的，可他却说完全听懂了。
Wǒ kàn tā de biǎoqíng shì sìdǒng fēidǒng de，kě tā què shuō wánquán tīngdǒng le。
I thought he didn\'t catch it, although he seemed to have understood, but he said that he had understood completely.
不要不懂装懂。
Búyào bùdǒngzhuāngdǒng。
Don\'t pretend to know (or understand) when you don\'t.
不懂装懂就会闹笑话。
Bùdǒngzhuāngdǒng jiùhuì nào xiàohuà。
If you pretend to know what you don\'t know, you\'ll only make a fool of yourself.
他装懂，实在并没懂。
Tā zhuāng dǒng，shízai bìng méi dǒng。
He pretends to understand, but as a matter of fact he doesn\'t.
似懂非懂
sìdǒngfēidǒng
have only a hazy notion; not quite understand
老学究满口之乎者也，教人半懂不懂。

The old pedant used so many archaisms that half of what he said was unintelligible.
半懂不懂
bàndǒngbùdǒng
not quite clear
听了他的解释，我还是懵懵懂懂。

I was still muddled, even after he had explained.
她没有懂我的暗示。
Tā méiyǒu dǒng wǒ de ànshì。
She didn\'t take my hint.
我的脑子不行，还不大懂。
Wǒ de nǎozi bùxíng，hái bú dà dǒng。

这些大道理人人都懂，真正做到可不容易啊！

dǒng yīngyǔ

This incident brought home to us the complex nature of the problem.

a sensible child

这句话不好懂，最好改换一个说法。

bù dǒng rénqíng shìgù

bù dǒng rénshì
not know the ways of the world

不懂世情
bù dǒng shìqíng

He explained and explained, but I still couldn\'t understand.
这个词儿已经说开了，大家都懂得。

This word is in current use, and everybody understands it.
对我来说，这本书就跟天书一样难懂。

tōngsúyìdǒng

tóngyàng de dǒng de

This sentence is too bookish to be readily intelligible.

Bù dǒnɡ jiù wèn。

他太幼嫩，根本不懂人情世故。

懂得如何做人处世
dǒng de rúhé zuòrén chǔshì 
know how to conduct oneself in society
他不懂行情，很容易挨蒙。
Tā bùdǒng hángqíng，hěnróngyì áiméng。

关于安培表的用法，我请教了电工师傅，可还是不懂。

I have consulted with the electrician about using an ampere meter, but I still don\'t get it.
如果不是有注解，我根本看不懂这些白文。

Although he is young, he knows quite a lot.
这孩子不懂事，稍有不遂就又哭又闹。

This naughty child cries, and kicks when he does not have his way.

He comes from a traditional family and is well-educated in manners.
我们懂得入乡从俗的道理，一切按你们的安排办。

We understand the saying &quot;when in Rome, do as the Romans&quot;, so we will just follow your arrangements.
你不懂就别乱答茬儿。
Nǐ bùdǒng jiù bié luàn dáchár。
You\'d better remain silent, because you don\'t know anything about this.
我还是不懂，你最好能打比方说明。
Wǒ háishì bùdǒng，nǐ zuìhǎo néng dǎ bǐfāng shuōmíng。
I\'m still puzzled, could you draw an analogy.
经过这么多年的学习，他现在对古董已经很懂眼了。
Jīngguò zhèmeduō nián de xuéxí，tā xiànzài duì gǔdǒng yǐjing hěn dǒngyǎn le。
Now he understands the antiques business after years of learning.
虽然他只是个贩夫，但却很懂诚信经营的道理。
Suīrán tā zhǐshì gè fànfū，dàn què hěn dǒng chéngxìn jīngyíng de dàolǐ。
Although only a peddler, he understands the importance of honesty in business.
小李又不是学理工科的，根本看不懂方框图。
Xiǎo Lǐ yòu búshì xué lǐgōngkē de，gēnběn kàn bùdǒng fāngkuàngtú。
Xiao Li is not a engineering student, so he can not understand the square diagram.
这本小说，高年级的学生才能读懂。
Zhèběn xiǎoshuō，gāo niánjí de xuésheng cáinéng dúdǒng。
Only students in high grades can fully understand the novel.
你还是姑娘家，有些事你还不懂。
Nǐ háishi gūniangjiā，yǒu xiē shì nǐ hái bùdǒng。
You are still a young girl, there are many things that you don\'t understand.
想要读懂这本文言小说，必须有扎实的古代汉语功底。
Xiǎng yào dú dǒng zhèběn wényán xiǎoshuō，bìxū yǒu zāshí de gǔdài hànyǔ gōngdǐ。
In order to understand this novel written in classical Chinese, one must have a profound knowledge of archaic Chinese.
这张建筑图纸满是红线，我实在看不懂。
Zhèzhāng jiànzhù túzhǐ mǎnshì hóngxiàn，wǒ shízai kàn bùdǒng。
The construction blueprint is full of borderlines. I am really blind to them.
你这黄口小儿，不懂事就别乱说话。
Nǐ zhè huángkǒuxiǎor，bùdǒngshì jiù bié luàn shuōhuà。
You green hand, don\'t speak nonsense when you don\'t know what is going on.
他在销售部门上班，却不懂回销是什么意思。
Tā zài xiāoshòu bùmén shàngbān，què bùdǒng huíxiāo shì shénme yìsi。
He is working in the marketing department, yet he doesn\'t know what reselling means.
现在什么都省事了，有不懂的词可以用机器翻译。
Xiànzài shénme dōu shěngshì le，yǒu bùdǒng dé cí kěyǐ yòng jīqì fānyì。
Now everything has become easier to do, we can use machines to translate unknown words.
希望大家都能懂得积羽沉舟的道理，小问题也要及时解决。
Xīwàng dàjiā dōu néng dǒngdé jīyǔchénzhōu de dàolǐ，xiǎo wèntí yěyào jíshí jiějué。
I hope you all know that minor offences unchecked may bring disaster, so solve small problems in time.
小公司如果不懂得经营，会很快被挤垮的。
Xiǎo gōngsī rúguǒ bùdǒngdé jīngyíng，huì hěnkuài bèi jǐkuǎ de。
Small companies will go out of business if they are not well managed.
作为领导一定要懂得兼听则明，偏信则暗的道理，多听意见，不可偏信。
Zuòwéi lǐngdǎo yídìng yào dǒngdé jiāntīng zémíng，piānxìn zéàn de dàolǐ，duōtīng yìjiàn，bùkě piānxìn。
Leaders should follow the rule of listening to both sides and never be partial toward either side.
你最好写简笔字，让大家都看得懂。
Nǐ zuìhǎo xiě jiǎnbǐzì，ràng dàjiā dōu kàn de dǒng。
You\'d better write it in simplified Chinese so that everyone can read it.
海上航行时掌舵手要懂得把握风向，见风使舵。
Hǎi shàng hángxíng shí zhǎngduòshǒu yào dǒngdé bǎwò fēng xiàng，jiànfēng shǐduò。
The steered should be able to judge the direction of wind and trim the sails to it.
专家们在校注《西厢记》中比较难懂的字句。
Zhuānjiāmen zài jiàozhù《Xīxiāngjì》 zhōng bǐjiào nándǒng de zìjù。
Experts are collating and annotating difficult sentences in The Romance of West Chamber.
这本经籍是用梵文写的，很难读懂。
Zhèběn jīngjí shì yòng fànwén xiě de，hěnnán dúdǒng。
This scripture was written in Sanskrit and is very hard to understand.
她们都是客家人，说的客家方言我听不懂。
Tāmen dōushì kèjiārén，shuō de kèjiā fāngyán wǒ tīng bùdǒng。
They are all Hakka people, and I could not understand their dialect.
这段语言拉丁化以后好懂了很多。
Zhè duàn yǔyán lādīnghuà yǐhòu hǎo dǒng le hěnduō。
This paragraph is easier to understand after having been translated into Latin.
我在中学学习棱锥的时候就总搞不懂计算其体积的方法。
Wǒ zài zhōng xué xuéxí léngzhuī de shíhou jiù zǒng gǎo bùdǒng jìsuàn qí tǐjī de fāngfǎ。
When I learned about pyramids in middle school, I  couldn\'t always understand how to calculate their volume.
他总是爱连书，弄得大家都看不懂。
Tā zǒngshì ài liánshū，nòng de dàjiā dōu kàn bùdǒng。
He always likes writing in linked script, and makes us unable to read.
这篇文章的论旨很清晰，没有什么复杂难懂的地方。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng de lùnzhǐ hěnqīngxī，méiyǒu shénme fùzá nándǒng de dìfāng。
The article has a clear argumentation, and contains nothing complicated.
这块牌匾是由满文写成的，我看不懂。
Zhèkuài páibiǎn shì yóu mǎnwén xiěchéng de，wǒ kàn bùdǒng。
The inscribed board is written in Man language, which I cannot understand.
这封信是用蒙文写的，我看不懂。
Zhè fēng xìn shì yòng méngwén xiě de，wǒ kàn bùdǒng。
This letter is written in Mongolian, and I can not understand it.
他虽然是个苗族人，但是已经听不懂苗语了。
Tā suīrán shì gè miáozúrén，dànshì yǐjing tīng bùdǒng miáoyǔ le。
Though he belongs to the Miao ethnic group, he can no longer understand the Miao dialect.
我们听不懂闽剧，可对那些好看的服饰化妆很感兴趣。
Wǒmen tīng bùdǒng mǐnjù，kě duì nàxiē hǎokàn de fúshì huàzhuāng hěngǎn xìngqù。
We can not understand Fujian opera, but we are very interested in the beautiful clothes and cosmetics.
他简直像个木头人，根本不懂得如何表达自己的感情！
Tā jiǎnzhí xiàng gè mùtourén，gēnběn bùdǒngdé rúhé biǎodá zìjǐ de gǎnqíng！
He is a blockhead, and has no idea about how to express his feelings.
宝宝的好奇心很强，凡是她不懂的事，她总要盘根问底。
Bǎobao de hàoqíxīn hěnqiáng，fánshì tā bùdǒng de shì，tā zǒngyào pángēn wèndǐ。
The baby shows strong curiosity, she likes to find out the ins and outs of everything she can\'t understand.
遇到不懂的问题，他总是喜欢刨根儿问底。
Yùdào bùdǒng de wèntí，tā zǒngshì xǐhuan bàogēnr wèndǐ。
He always like to get to the root of everything he doesn\'t understand.
他喜欢烟花的奇丽，但不懂它幻灭后的寂寞。
Tā xǐhuan yānhuā de qílì，dàn bùdǒng tā huànmiè hòu de jìmò。
He likes the extraordinary beauty of fireworks, but he doesn\'t understand the loneliness after they have been set off.
写文章时遣词不当，可能会令人看不懂文章的意思呢。
Xiě wénzhāng shí qiǎncí búdàng，kěnéng huì lìng rén kàn bùdǒng wénzhāng de yìsi ne。
Inappropriate wording may make people unable to understand the meaning of the article.
经过一段时间的学习，他能看懂常用的日文了。
Jīngguò yíduàn shíjiān de xuéxí，tā néng kàndǒng chángyòng de rìwén le。
After a period of study, he can read everyday Japanese now.
他一个山野村夫怎么会懂得文学呢？
Tā yígè shānyě cūnfū zěnme huì dǒng de wénxué ne ？
How can the rustic understand literature?
当我们的利益受到侵害的时候，要懂得寻求司法援助。
Dāng wǒmen de lìyì shòudào qīnhài de shíhou，yào dǒngdé xúnqiú sīfǎ yuánzhù。
When our rights are obstructed, we should know to seek for judicial help.
他贪求享受，从来不懂艰苦朴素。
Tā tānqiú xiǎngshòu，cónglái bùdǒng jiānkǔ pǔsù。
He is forever seeking after material comforts, and has no idea about hard work and plain living.
贪小失大的道理她不是不懂，可就是改不了爱占小便宜的毛病。
Tānxiǎo shīdà de dàolǐ tā búshì bùdǒng，kě jiùshì gǎibùliǎo ài zhàn xiǎopiányí de máobìng。
There is a saying that goes: covet a little and lose a lot. It\'s not that she doesn\'t understand the saying, it\'s just that she cannot get rid of her bad habit.
我又不懂行，帮不了忙反而添乱。
Wǒ yòu bùdǒng háng，bāngbùliǎo máng fǎnér tiānluàn。
I\'m just a layman, which means that instead of helping you out, I may create trouble.
我一点也看不懂这本图谶的内容。
Wǒ yìdiǎn yě kàn bùdǒng zhèběn túchèn de nèiróng。
I can\'t understand the contents of this prophetic book at all.
对于自己不懂的或不明白的事情，不要妄加评论！
Duìyú zìjǐ bùdǒng de huòbùmíngbai de shìqing，búyào wàngjiā pínglùn！
Don\'t comment casually on things you don\'t understand!
教授正在为这段难懂的文字添加尾注。
Jiàoshòu zhèngzài wèi zhè duàn nándǒng de wénzì tiānjiā wěizhù。
The professor is adding endnotes to this difficult paragraph.
他说的是吴方言，所以你会听不懂。
Tā shuō de shì wúfāngyán，suǒyǐ nǐ huì tīng bùdǒng。
He speaks Wu dialect, which is why you can not understand him.
这段文字中存在很多误码，根本无法读懂。
Zhè duàn wénzì zhōng cúnzài hěnduō wùmǎ，gēnběn wúfǎ dúdǒng。
There are many unrecognizable parts in this passage.
小王是个懂得惜玉怜香的人，把女朋友照顾得很好。

Xiao Wang is a considerate man, and takes good care of his girlfriend.
他一个小孩子家能懂什么？！
Tā yígè xiǎoháizijiā néng dǒng shénme？！
He is just a kid, what does he know?

Guǎnlǐzhě yīnggāi dǒngdé cóng zhòngduō guǎnlǐ fāngfǎ zhōng xiéyīng。
The managers should learn to pick the best of all the management methods.
王伯伯是个很懂得修身养性的人。
Wáng bóbó shì gè hěn dǒngdé xiūshēn yǎngxìng de rén。
Uncle Wang knows very wellabout how to cultivate moral character and develop temperament.
这首诗可是他的压卷之作，你不懂别乱说。
Zhèshǒushī kěshì tā de yājuàn zhī zuò，nǐ bùdǒng bié luànshuō。
Don\'t talk if you don\'t understand, this poem surpasses all his other works.
我不太懂这种雅言，你能讲得通俗点吗？
Wǒ bú tài dǒng zhèzhǒng yǎyán，nǐ néng jiǎng de tōngsú diǎn ma？
I can\'t understand literary language, can you make it more simple?
“言多必失，沉默是金”，这个道理谁都懂。
“Yánduō bìshī，chénmò shìjīn”，zhège dàolǐ shuídōudǒng。
It is known that &quot;he who talks too much is prone to error; silence is golden&quot;.
懂得易位思考的人往往拥有更多的朋友。
Dǒngdé yìwèi sīkǎo de rén wǎngwǎng yōngyǒu gèngduō de péngyou。
People who think from other people\'s perspectives will have more friends.
汉语音系是个很复杂的系统，一般人很难弄懂。
Hànyǔ yīnxì shì gè hěn fùzá de xìtǒng，yìbān rén hěnnán nòngdǒng。
The Chinese phonemic system is complicated, only a few people can fully understand it.
做人一定要懂得引水思源，知恩图报。
Zuò rén yídìng yào dǒngdé yǐnshuǐ sīyuán，zhīēn túbào。
People should bear in mind where their happiness comes from, and return the hospitality that they have received.
昨日的辉煌已经永逝，我们要懂得把握今天。
Zuórì de huīhuáng yǐjing yǒngshì，wǒmen yào dǒngdé bǎwò jīntiān。
The glory of the past has gone forever; we should learn to grasp today.
高明的摄影师懂得用光的技巧。
Gāomíng de shèyǐngshī dǒngdé yòngguāng de jìqiǎo。
A brilliant photographer knows how to use lights.
我们要懂得调理好生活中的油盐酱醋。
Wǒmen yào dǒngdé tiáolǐ hǎo shēnghuó zhōng de yóuyán jiàngcù。
We should know how to preserve the flavours of our life.
统治者们应该懂得与民更始的道理。
Tǒngzhìzhěmen yīnggāi dǒngdé yǔmín gēngshǐ de dàolǐ。
Rulers should understand the truth of cooperating with the people to exchange the old for the new.
粤方言外地人很难听懂。
Yuèfāngyán wàidìrén hěnnán tīngdǒng。
It is hard for people from other places to understand Cantonese.
我们要懂得学以致用，不能只停留在书本上。
Wǒmen yào dǒngdé xuéyǐ zhìyòng，bùnéng zhǐ tíngliú zài shūběn shàng。
We should learn to use in practice what we have learned rather than lingering on the books.
这些文字是籀文，我看不懂。
Zhèxiē wénzì shì zhòuwén，wǒ kàn bùdǒng。
Idon\'t understand these characters from the Zhou Dynasty.

Tā kàn bùdǒng shuōmíngshū shàng de yáng zìmǎér。
He can\'t understand the foreign character codes in the manual.
今天的物理课我们学的是连锁反应，大家都没怎么听懂。
Jīntiān de wùlǐkè wǒmen xué de shì liánsuǒ fǎnyìng，dàjiā dōu méi zěnme tīngdǒng。
Toaday we learned about chain reactions in physics class, but none of us quite understood it.
蚂蚁之间也懂得守望相助呢！
Mǎyǐ zhījiān yě dǒngdé shǒuwàng xiāngzhù ne！
Even ants know how to keep watch and help each other!
纸上写着的是音素文字吧，可惜我看不懂。
Zhǐ shàng xiě zhe de shì yīnsù wénzì ba，kěxī wǒ kàn bùdǒng。
What is written on the paper is in a phonemic language, it\'s a pity I can\'t read it.
小王一向懂得明哲保身，从不做引火烧身的事。
Xiǎo Wáng yí xiàng dǒngdé míngzhé bǎoshēn，cóng búzuò yǐnhuǒ shāoshēn de shì。

再复杂的线路图哥哥都能看懂。
Zài fùzá de xiànlùtú gēge dōunéng kàndǒng。
My brother can understand the most complicate circuit diagrams.
这孩子诚然懂礼貌。
Zhè háizǐ chéngrán dǒnglǐmào。
This child really does know how to be polite.
朋友不懂英语，我充当翻译。
Péngyou bùdǒng yīngyǔ，wǒ chōngdāng fānyì。
My friend doesn\'t understand English, so I act as interpreter.
别人都懂了，单单他不明白。
Biérén dōudǒngle，dāndān tā bùmíngbai。
The others all understood – only he didn\'t get it.
我假装不懂他的意思。
Wǒ jiǎzhuāng bùdǒng tā de yìsi.
I pretended not to understand what he meant.
他这么大了，应该懂点人事了。
Tā zhème dà le，yīnggāi dǒng diǎn rénshì le.
At his age, he ought to know the ways of the world.
简单的对话他尚且都不懂，更何况难的了。
Jiǎndān de duìhuà tā shàngqiě dōu bùdǒng，gèng hékuàng nán de le。
He can\'t even understand simple conversations, let alone difficult ones.
他懂得如何变弊为利。
Tā dǒngdé rúhé biàn bì wéi lì。
He knows how to turn a disadvantage into an advantage.
我真是搞不懂，他到底想干什么。

I really can\'t make out what on earth he\'s up to.
我听不懂。

我不会不懂装懂的

只一懂点西班牙语

bad manners

to understand a question
弄懂一个问题的意思
none the wiser
依旧不懂，还是不明白

我不懂经商，珍妮是学这个的，你去问她吧。

我能听懂中文，但不太会说。

她声音很小，我几乎听不懂她在说什么。

她很聪明，什么东西读一遍就能懂。

他解释得太快了，我都没太听懂。

这块牌匾是由满文写成的，我看不懂。

他虽然是个苗族人，但是已经听不懂苗语了。

He likes the extraordinary beauty of fireworks, but he doesn\'t understand the loneliness after they have been set off.
